name: B & B Stinger recipe
ingredients: [(u'2 1/2', u'B & B\xae benedictine', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white creme de menthe', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the benedictine and white creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: C & M recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Stolichnaya\xae vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'4 - 5', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions:
Pour 2 oz. of malibu rum into a glass filled half way with ice,
Proceed to pour in 2 oz. of Stoli Vanilla into the glass.,
Fill the remainder of the glass with Coca Cola to the brim and enjoy!

name: H-Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'12', u'beer', 'oz'), (u'6', u'water', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'alcohol', 'oz')]
directions: Dump out six ounces of beer, add alcohol, fill up the rest of the beer can with water, mix and let settle.

name: Cabaret Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Dubonnet\xae Rouge vermouth', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dashes'), (u'4', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'dashes')]
directions: Pour the gin, Dubonnet, Angostura bitters and Pernod into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'limes', 'oz'), (u'1', u'powdered sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: G Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', None), (None, u'1/2 shot Absolut\xae vodka', None)]
directions: Chill both ingredients by placing the bottles in the freezer for at least 1 hour. You should also chill the shot glasses you will be using the same way. Pour both ingredients into a chilled shot glass and enjoy.

name: Cabernet Cobbler recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 ozchilled Cabernet Sauvignon red wine', None), (None, u'1 tspfresh lemon juice', None), (u'1', u'superfine sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'2 ozchilled soda water', None)]
directions: Dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water in a large wine glass. Add cracked ice and pour the Cabernet Sauvignon wine. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Dammit PJ recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'lemon rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Fill a large shot glass half full of lemon rum, then fill the other half with lemon juice. Put a sugar cube in your mouth and bite down, then shoot, swish, and swallow!

name: Dambuster recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'ginger ale', 'oz'), (None, u'  milk', None)]
directions: In a highball glass with ice, pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua, a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, (Homo or 2%, never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy

name: Dancing Dana recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 canfrozen lemonade', None), (None, u'1/2 can Smirnoff\xae Raspberry Twist vodka', None), (None, u'1/2 can McGuinness\xae blue Curacao liqueur', None), (None, u'1 can ice cubes', None)]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add water to taste if required. Rim a margarita glass with sugar if desired. Pour the blended drink mixture into the margarita glass and serve.

name: I Blow Up recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Pour in Melon at the bottom of the glass.  Layer Baily's Irish Creme and then cover in Grenadine.

name: Damiana Golden recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Damiana\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake or stir. Enjoy.

name: J C recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'dash'), (None, u'2 - 3 drops Angostura\xae bitters', None), (u'6 - 10', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass over 3 - 4 ice cubes. Add a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Dancing Dutchman recipe
ingredients: [(u'25', u'vodka', 'tsp'), (u'5', u'ice cubes', 'cups'), (u'5', u'strawberry juice', 'cups'), (u'1', u'white wine', 'cup'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'cup'), (u'3', u'peach juice', 'cups'), (u'15', u'Scotch whisky', 'tsp'), (None, u'  rum', None)]
directions: Mix fruit juices together in one bowl, place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete, stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl, and float cherries in the bowl if desired.

name: Dancing Captain recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Captain Morgan\xae spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'15', u'root beer', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the captain into the glass and fill with root beer.

name: Queen's Park Swizzle recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1/2', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (None, u' juice of 1/2 limes', None), (None, u'4  mint', None), (u'2', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Squeeze lime juice into a highball glass. Add the shell, fill with crushed ice and add the mint. Pour in the rum, angostura bitters and sugar syrup. Swizzle until glass frosts. Add the soda, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve with a straw.

name: Queen's Cousin recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'3', u'sparkling white wine', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka, Grand Marnier, lime juice, bitters, Cointreau and wine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a large wine glass, and add the wine. Stir well, and serve.

name: Queen Soda recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u'  cream soda', None)]
directions: Stir and serve in a highball glass with three or four ice cubes.

name: Queen of Hearts recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add the melon liqueur and the amaretto to a highball glass first. Then add the blue curaco and cranberry juice.

name: Quick-Sand recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'25 ml black sambuca', None), (None, u'250 ml orange juice', None)]
directions: Pour the orange juice (with the fruit pulp) over the sambuca in a highball glass.

name: Queen Of Scots recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'water', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Green Chartreuse\xae', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Quick's Killaritas recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'cup'), (u'2/3', u'triple sec', 'cup'), (u'1 - 1/3', u'tequila', 'cup'), (None, u'12 ozfrozen limeade', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients together in a pitcher. Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass.

name: Quick Thrill recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 ozmedium red wine', None), (u'1/3', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (None, u'3 ozchilled cola', None)]
directions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

name: Ragged Company recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'benedictine herbal liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes'), (None, u'1 twist lemon', None)]
directions: Combine bourbon, vermouth, benedictine, and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Randy Andy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'creme de bananes', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'guava juice', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'passion-fruit syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Rainbow Snowball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cherry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake and serve with crushed ice. The blend will look like melted Rainbow Snowball and taste like it too!

name: Rainbow Road recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lemon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5', u'lemon-lime mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'splash'), (u'1', u'melon liqueur', 'splash'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Shake the first three ingredients and pour into a lowball glass filled with cracked ice. On the left side add the splash of grenadine, in middle the splash of blue curacao and on the right side add the melon liqueur. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Rainbow Julep recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 fresh mint', None), (u'1/2', u'Marie Brizard\xae Apry apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz')]
directions: Muddle one of the mint sprigs with apricot brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add bourbon and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Swirl with a barspoon until the outer glass frosts. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Rainbow Orgy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'strawberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, strawberry liqueur and banana liqueur into a cocktail shaker one-third filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour entire contents into a highball glass. Top with orange juice, and serve.

name: Raspberry Release recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'ginger ale', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a brandy snifter. Stir, and serve.

name: Rancho Santucci recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Peachtree schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'club soda', 'cup'), (None, u'2 drops grenadine syrup', None), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Mix 1/2 shot each of Everclear, triple sec, and Peachtree schnapps with 3 shots of pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Pour into glass and stir in club soda to taste. Garnish with a few drops of grenadine.

name: Ramshanked recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle Bacardi Breezer\xae', None), (u'2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None)]
directions: Place the lemon slice at the bottom of a highball glass. Add ice, and pour the rum and southern comfort. Finally, add the bottle of Bacardi. Stir and serve.

name: Raspberry Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'46 ozpink grapefruit juice', None), (u'12', u'raspberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'raspberry sherbet', 'qt'), (None, u'2 liters ginger ale', None)]
directions: Pour pink grapefruit juice and ginger ale into a punch bowl. Add raspberry juice or 12 oz frozen raspberries (stir to un-thaw). Add sherbet and stir until melted.

name: Raspberry Pancake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Amaretto Di Saronno\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'hard cider', 'oz')]
directions: First pour hard apple cider into a highball glass. Then add the amaretto and raspberry liqueur at the same time. Give the whole drink a good swirl and garnish with a raspberry and an apple slice.

name: Raspberry Muscle Relaxant recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Hpnotiq\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cranberry-raspberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Build over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Raspberry Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Razzmatazz liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail/martini glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Mango Daiquri recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2  tequila', None), (None, u'1 shot triple sec', None), (u'1', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'splash'), (None, u'  mango syrup', None), (None, u'  raspberry syrup', None)]
directions: Blend all this together and it is delicious

name: Raspberry Kiss recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'cream', 'oz'), (u'1', u'brown creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker, and shake three to four times. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Raspberry Kamikaze recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'2', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Mix all ingredients in a glass. Add ice and serve.

name: Raspberry Lime Smasher recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Absolut\xae Kurant vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz')]
directions: Lay Chambord on bottom of glass and float vodka on top of it. Drip the lime juice in the middle of the vodka and shoot.

name: Raspberry Limeade recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'raspberry', 'cups'), (u'3 1/2', u'water', 'cups'), (None, u'3/4 cupgranulated sugar', None), (None, u'1 cupfresh lime juice', None)]
directions:
In a blender or food processor purée 1 cup of the raspberries with 1 cup of the water and force the purée through a fine sieve set over a pitcher, pressing hard on the solids. Add the remaining 1 cup raspberries, the remaining 2 1/2 cups water, the sugar and the lime juice; stir the mixture until the sugar is dissolved.,
Divide the limeade among tall glasses filled with ice cubes and garnish each drink with some of the mint sprigs.

name: Raspberry Jello Spritzer recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'vodka', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'cup'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'cup'), (u'2', u'water', 'cups'), (None, u'1 package sparkling berry jello', None)]
directions: Mix Jello with 2 cups boiling water. Once disolved set in fridge to cool for 10 minutes. Add 7-up, vodka and Chambord (raspberry liquor) to and stir until blended. On a cookie sheet, line plastic 1 oz cups or dixie cups and pour into containers. Chill until firm and serve.

name: Raspberry Iced Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'white tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. This is basically a long island iced tea with raspberry liqueur instead of cola. Quite good.

name: Raspberry Hot Chocolate #1 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6 - 8', u'hot chocolate', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'splash')]
directions: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate.

name: Raspberry Felch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Stoli\xae Razberi vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'dark creme de cacao', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients into warmed old fashioned glass or shooter and drink through a straw. Garnish with cherries.

name: Raspberry Girl recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: On the rocks. Combine liquor and fill with sprite or 7-up. Pour into shaker and then back into the glass. (do not shake) Enjoy!

name: Raspberry Fancy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'creme de cassis', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'lemonade', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'raspberries', 'tsp')]
directions: Fill glass with ice. Mix creme de cassis, Frangelico, Chambord and sour mix together. Add lemonade and rasberries on top.

name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Stolichnaya\xae raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Deluxe recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tbsp'), (u'4', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: In a shaker filled with ice mix raspberry vodka, chambord, and grenadine pour into a highball glass filled with ice.  Add ginger ale.  Stir and garnish with a cherry

name: Raspberry Cream recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'raspberry yogurt', 'tbsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'raspberry ice cream', 'tbsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'2', u'heavy cream', 'oz')]
directions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Raspberry Cordial recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'raspberry juice', 'parts'), (u'2', u'vodka', 'parts'), (u'1 1/4', u'sugar', 'parts')]
directions: Combine all ingredients and stir until sugar is dissolved. Store in large bottles for 22 days. Pour into gift bottles and seal.

name: Raspberry Cooler recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Stoli\xae Razberi vodka', 'oz'), (u'4', u'lemon-lime soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Raspberry Colada recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/4', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/3', u'coconut cream', 'oz'), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'whipping cream', 'tsp')]
directions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Raspberry Cola recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'11', u'cola', 'oz')]
directions: Put ice into glass, pour vodka into glass then top with soda.

name: Raspberry Citrus Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'92 ozcanned pineapples', None), (None, u'8 cupsstrained orange juice', None), (u'4', u'water', 'cups'), (u'2', u'sugar', 'cups'), (u'1', u'raspberries', 'cup'), (None, u'46 ozcan grapefruit juice', None), (None, u'2 qtchilled soda water', None), (None, u'2 qtchilled ginger ale', None)]
directions:
1. Force raspberries through a sieve to remove the seeds.,
2. Combine sugar and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil until sugar is dissolved to make a simple syrup.,
2. Combine orange juice, raspberries, pineapple juice, grapefruit juice and simple syrup. Chill. When ready to serve, add soda water and ginger ale. (Serves 100.)

name: Raspberry Chocolate Truffle Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'dark creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Carefully layer Bailey's over Chambord then, layer Dark Cream de Cacao and Kahlua in shot glass. Bottoms up!

name: Raspberry Chocolate Smoothie recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3/4 cupchocolate soymilk', None), (None, u'3/4 cupchocolate Sorbet', None), (None, u'1 1/4 cupsfrozen unsweetened raspberries', None), (None, u'1/2 peeled banana', None), (None, u'1 fresh mint', None)]
directions: In a blender, blend the soy milk, sorbet, raspberries, and banana until smooth. Garnish with mint to serve.

name: Raspberry Chi Chi recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'12', u'pina colada mix', 'oz'), (None, u'1 scoop ice', None), (None, u'1/4 ozpureed raspberries', None)]
directions: Pour pureed raspberries into glass. Blend 1 1/4 oz. raspberry vodka, 12 oz. pina colada mix, and 1 scoop of ice until smooth, pour over pureed raspberries in glass - serve with straw and stir stick.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'black raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream cheese', 'tbsp'), (None, u'2 scoops vanilla ice cream', None), (u'1/2', u'crushed ice', 'cup')]
directions: Blend ingredients until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Bulldozer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'raspberry schnapps', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Red Bull\xae energy drink', 'oz')]
directions: Fill glass halfway with Red Bull, drop shot in and shoot. Tastes berry-licious!

name: Raspberry Champagne Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Champagne', 'cups'), (u'2', u'raspberry juice', 'cups'), (u'1', u'water', 'cup'), (None, u'12  lemon', None)]
directions: Fill a small ice tray with raspberry juice, garnishing each with a lemon twist and freeze until solid. Serve by putting one raspberry cube in a champagne flute and fill with champagne.

name: Raspberry Blush recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'raspberry syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Raspberry Bliss recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Stoli\xae Strasberi vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'5', u'lemonade', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'2 tbspfresh raspberries', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Raspberry Beret #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cream', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Blend all the ingredients with 8 ice cubes (like a mudslide). Pour in a glass rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

name: Raspberry Beret recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Blend all the ingredients with ice (like a mudslide). Pour in a mug rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

name: Raspberry Beer recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 can beer', None), (u'1 1/2', u'raspberry rum', 'oz')]
directions: Pour beer and rum into a beer mug. Stir and drink.

name: Raspberry Banana Tofu Shake recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'12 ozpackage of silken Tofu', None), (None, u'1 cupfat free soymilk', None), (None, u'1  banana', None), (u'1', u'raspberries', 'cup'), (None, u'1/4 cupfrozen orange juice', None)]
directions: In a blender, mix tofu, soy milk, banana, raspberries, and orange juice concentrate. Blend until smooth.

name: Raspberry Ass Licker recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sloe gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Malibu\xae passion fruit rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u'1 ozsweetened lime juice', None), (None, u'  Angostura\xae bitters', None)]
directions:
Mix all ingredients together minus the bitters in a large mason jar with some ice, pour into shot glasses when mixed completely. ,
Add one drop of bitters to each shot - it should kinda hang in the middle, slowly falling.

name: Raspberries Romanoff recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stolichnaya\xae raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (None, u'3 - 5 fresh raspberries', None), (u'4', u'Brut\xae Champagne', 'oz'), (None, u'3 - 5 drops Kirschwasser\xae cherry brandy', None)]
directions: Add chilled vodka, triple sec and fresh raspberries to a large, chilled stemmed glass and fill with cold champagne. Sprinkle a few drops of kirschwasser on top.

name: Rasmaretto recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'raspberry syrup', 'oz'), (u'5 - 6', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Pour over ice in a collins glass. Shake (or spindle mix for a nice foamy top). A real refreshing drink.

name: Rasmopolitan Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Absolut\xae Raspberri vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 ozfresh lime juice', None), (None, u'1/2 ozwhite cranberry juice', None)]
directions:
Combine all ingredients except for the raspberries in a cocktail shaker, cover and shake.,
Serve in a martini glass and garnish with 2 or 3 frozen raspberries. This is a luxurious drink that is very easy to prepare.

directions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add a speared cherry, and serve.

directions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled 3/4 with ice. Garnish with a cherry and a thin slice of lemon, and serve.

directions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

name: Old Fashioned (Sweet) #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'5 drops bitters', None), (u'2', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Add drops of bitters to bottom of glass and stir in sugar. Once bitters and sugar are combined, add ice and pour in brandy. Top off with 7-up/Sprite and add a splash of grenadine. Serve with cherry/orange slice. Also works with whiskey.

name: Old Fashioned Hot Buttered Rum recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'1', u'brown sugar', 'cup'), (u'1', u'butter', 'cup'), (u'2', u'vanilla ice cream', 'cups'), (None, u'  rum', None), (None, u'  water', None), (None, u'  nutmeg', None)]
directions:
1. Combine sugar, brown sugar and butter in a 2-quart saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until butter is melted (6-8 min). 
,
2. Combine cooked mixture with ice-cream in a large mixing bowl, and beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often until smooth (1-2 min). Store refrigerated up to 2 weeks or frozen up to one month. 
,
3. For each serving, fill one-quarter of a mug with mixture, add one ounce rum and three-quarters of a cup of boiling water. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Old Flame recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Bombay Sapphire\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Martini & Rossi\xae sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Campari\xae bitters', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 1/2 ozfresh orange juice', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients well to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Old Fashioned Manhattan recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'3', u'bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'club soda', 'splash')]
directions: Pour the whiskey, sweet vermouth, bitters and sugar into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda, and stir again gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Old Fashioned Raspberry Soda recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'16 ozfrozen unsweetned raspberries', None), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'2 tbspfresh lemon juice', None), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'12 vanilla ice cream', None), (u'12', u'club soda', 'cups')]
directions:
Combine raspberries, sugar, lemon juice and Triple Sec in 2-quart saucepan. Cook over medium heat for 7 to 10 minutes, or until raspberries are defrosted and sugar is dissolved, stirring occasionally.
,
Process raspberry mixture in food processor or blender until smooth. Strain through fine-mesh sieve into 4-cup measure. Discard seeds.
,
Place 2 tablespoons raspberry mixture and 1 scoop ice cream in 12-ounce glass. Add 1 cup carbonated water. Repeat with remaining mixture, ice cream and carbonated water.
,
Strawberry Soda:
,
Follow recipe, except substitute 1 (16 ounce) package frozen unsweetened strawberries for raspberries.
,
Black Raspberry Soda:
,
Follow recipe, except substitute 1 (10 ounce) package frozen unsweetened black raspberries for raspberries.
,
Microwave tip: Combine raspberries, sugar, lemon juice and Triple Sec in 2-quart casserole. Cover. Microwave at HIGH for 5 to 7 minutes, or until raspberries are defrosted and sugar is dissolved, stirring once. Continue as directed.
,
Very yummy!

name: Neon Green Punch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Hpnotiq\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients together in a chilled shot glass and serve.

name: Neon Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'splash')]
directions: Shake ingredients together with ice, strain into glasses.

name: Neon Fairy recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Absinth\xae King of Spirits Gold liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'superfine sugar', 'oz'), (u'5', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Filter herbs out of Absinth and pour Absinth into glass. Add baker's (superfine) sugar and stir until dissolved. Absinthe will take on a cloudy green color. Add Sprite and sweet and sour mix. Sit back, relax and enjoy.

name: Neon Ghost recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 cl vodka', None), (None, u'3 cl Pisang Ambon\xae liqueur', None)]
directions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass

name: Neo-Tokyo recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3/4 ozGekkeikan (or Ozeki) Traditional sake rice wine', None), (u'3/4', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Zen\xae green tea liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'dash'), (u'1/2', u'Bols\xae Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lime', None), (None, u'1  orange', None), (None, u'1  maraschino cherry', None)]
directions:
Use a bamboo skewer to elaborately connect an Orange twist, wrapped around a lime wedge, barely touching the Marachino cherry which covers the point.  Pull half of the lime-skin away from the fruit and use the lime vertically (like a paperclip) to perch the entire crane-like garnish on the edge of a chilled cocktail glass.,
Combine sake, Stoli, Zen, Pucker, sours and ice into a shaker.  Shake and strain into the glass, in front of the customer.  Pour Blue Curaçao into the glass and allow the drink to settle into two layers.  Slowly add the grenadine.  Do not stir!,
Encourage the customer to squeeze the lime into the glass for a more well-balanced flavour.  If left un-stirred, the drink will remain in layers as the customer imbibes.  (When stirred, it turns an unsettling violet-black.) Use a Bamboo skewer (approx. 5").

name: Neo-Tropical recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Jamaican dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nemesis recipe

directions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice into a highball glass. Top with coke, add Guinness, and serve.

directions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

ingredients: [(u'1', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'milk', 'oz')]

directions: Heat ingredients (with lemon thinly sliced into rings, and a heaped teaspoon of sugar). Strain into a heat-proof goblet when hot.

name: Paradise Punch recipe

name: Needle in Your Eye recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'lemon gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'5', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'dash'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'dash'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'dash')]
directions: Just put it all together in a glass with crushed ice, and mix well.

name: Need For Speed recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/3', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/3', u'Fanta\xae orange soda', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Ocean Spray\xae cranberry juice', 'oz')]

directions: In blender combine 1 oz. Grenadine, 2 cups vanilla ice cream, 1/2 cup milk, 1 fresh ripe peach, and 4 oz. peach flavored vodka. Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with peach wedge and cherry.

directions: Put ice into the bottom of any 20-oz. glass. Mix in the creme de cacao, the Parrot Bay, and the creme de banana. Fill with a can of Pepsi, or whichever cola suits you. Stir thoroughly and enjoy!

name: Paradise #2 recipe

directions:
Pour Captain Morgan and Malibu rum into an ice-filled beer pilsner. Fill the rest of the way with the pine-orange-banana juice, and serve. ,
Blend the above together with a banana in a blender for another great tasting drink.

name: Paradise Bliss recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour in vodka & rum. Follow with pineapple juice. Top off with cranberry. stir and enjoy! Try Dole's pineapple-banana juice for a great variation.

directions: Shake well with ice and serve in a highball glass with a slice of green lemon.

name: Magic Woman recipe

directions: Pour blue curacao, rum and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Blend briefly, fill with sprite and add a splash of lemon juice.

directions: Shake in a cocktail glass. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a crystalized fruit star-shape.

name: Magic Trick recipe

directions: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Magic Spritzer recipe
ingredients: [(u'6', u'Zinfandel\xae white wine', 'oz'), (u'6', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients over crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Magic Pixie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Watermelon Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Jacquin's\xae peach schnapps", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Ocean Spray\xae cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a 10-oz highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps, DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and Jacquins peach schnapps. Fill the remainder of the glass with an even amount of Sprite and Ocean Spray cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Magic Sam recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2/3  Absolut\xae vodka', None), (None, u'1/4  Tanqueray\xae gin', None), (None, u'1/5  Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'1/5  DeKuyper\xae Peachtree schnapps', None), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'splash'), (None, u'2  orange juice', None), (None, u'2  pineapple juice', None), (None, u'2  melon juice', None), (u'1', u'banana syrup', 'splash'), (u'1', u'strawberry syrup', 'splash')]
directions:
In a rock glass 11 3/4 oz. fill with ice. Squirt in a dash of banana and strawberry syrub in any order. (slightly more strawberry in order to give the drink an almost cosmopolitan fuxia colour after shaken later)  Pour in approximately less than 1/3 of the glass with vodka of any brand. Next add approximately less than 1/4 of the glass with tanqueray gin. 1/5 of cointreau next and 1/6 0f peachtree (peach shnapps) and the alcoholic content is complete. The remaining space to almost fill the rim involves equal splashes of Orange juice, Pineaple juice and melon juice. ,
Shake all with a shaker  and then reverse back the whole shaken stuff back into the rock glass. A sliced kiwi tucked over the rim and two tall straws and damn...thats a hell of a MAGIC SAM!!!!!

name: Magic Punch recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'guava juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'papaya juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'mango juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add ingredients to an ice-filled collins glass and shake.

name: Magic Mountain Dew recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with mountain dew, stir briefly and serve.

name: Magic Island recipe

directions: Chop up the two bananas and place in a blender with the creme de bananes, galliano and vanilla ice cream. Blend until frothy and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of banana, sit back and enjoy!

directions: Mix sugar, water and angostura bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Drop in a cherry and an orange wedge. Muddle into a paste using a muddler or the back end of a spoon. Pour in bourbon, fill with ice cubes, and stir.

name: Ola Homey! recipe

directions: Blend 1 cup of ice in a blender with the pina colada mix and rum. Set aside. Blend the raspberry vodka with 1 cup of ice. Rim a pina colada glass with sugar. Pour both mixtures one at a time into the glass. Top with a maraschino cherry. For an added effect, add a drop of red food clouring to the vodka portion before combining.

name: Ol' Dirty Bastard recipe

directions: Pour the Southern Comfort, Captain Morgan spiced, Absolut vodka and Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister recipe

directions:
1. Place both cans of cream of coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. ,
2. Pour the pineapple juice, orange juice, cream of coconut, and grenadine into a large punch bowl. Add the rum (to taste), or add it seperately to each drink later. (1 1/2 ounce per 12 ounce serving, kids will enjoy it without rum.) Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. ,
3. Serve in glasses over crushed ice. Garnish each drink with a pineapple and orange wedge, and a maraschino cherry on a tooth pick.

directions: Mix vodka, jagermeister and red bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

name: Jackson 5 recipe

directions: Mix the shots of rum, vodka, amaretto over ice, add a dash of sour mix, then fill the rest with cranberry juice.

directions: Fill the glass with ice. Pour Grand Marnier over ice. Add iced tea, garnish with lemon wedge.

directions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up or Sprite. Try to toss the lime wedge from behind your back and into the drink.

name: Karamozov Koffee recipe

name: Kappa Colada recipe

directions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a collins glass with ice.

name: Kangaroo Kicker recipe

directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Kangaroo recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vermouth', 'oz')]
directions: Stir with ice and strain into a chillled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

name: Kanaan recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'15 cl milk', None), (None, u'1  egg', None), (u'2', u'honey', 'tsp')]
directions: Prepare in a blender with a little ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kansas City Ice Water recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None)]
directions: Pour gin, vodka and lime juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Kanawful's Serum recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour 1 part Kahlua, then pour 1 part Cream de Cacao (white), then pour 1 part Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass. Top it off with a puff of whipped cream.

name: Kampai Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes')]
directions: Pour the rum, triple sec, pineapple juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Kanapeas Kick recipe

directions: Pour the Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the orange vodka and sweet and sour mix. Splash with Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Kamorita recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'White Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'tsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Kamora Vanilla Shake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de cacao', 'tbsp'), (u'5', u'Kamora\xae coffee liqueur', 'tbsp'), (u'4', u'milk', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vanilla ice cream', 'cup')]
directions: Blend everything until smooth. Serve with vanilla wafer cookies.

name: Kamora Tootsie Roll recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Kamora\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add ingredients to a tumbler with ice.

name: Kamora Sunrise Splash recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Kamora\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz')]

name: Lassi - Mango recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 ripe mango', None), (u'2', u'yoghurt', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1 cupiced water', None)]
directions: Add to a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

name: Lassi recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 cupplain yoghurt', None), (None, u'1 1/4 cupscold water', None), (u'1/2', u'cumin', 'tsp'), (u'1/4', u'salt', 'tsp'), (None, u'1/4 tspfinely crumbled mint', None)]
directions:
Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Serve cold.,
Lassi is a south indian drink, and one of the easiest things to make. There are many ways of making it, but essentially it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest.

name: Lash recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  ice', None), (None, u'  Sprite\xae soda', None)]
directions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vodka and amaretto. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Lasseman's Partysaver recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'ouzo anise liqueur', 'part'), (u'5', u'coffee', 'parts'), (None, u'1 scoop whipped cream', None)]
directions: Mix the black coffee with the ouzo (until you can't feel the ouzo taste anymore) and put a little blob of whipped cream on top. Drink and enjoy.

name: Lasky Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'grape juice', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Swedish punsch', 'oz')]

directions: Pour the Stoli Persik peach vodka and Ketel One into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add Coca-cola, orange juice and cranberry juice. Add a splash of lime, garnish with 2 lime slices and serve.

directions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a cherry, slices of orange and lemon, and serve.

directions: Combine the three liquors over ice, and top with vodka. Stir and serve.

name: Lara Croft recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'5 cl Jim Beam\xae bourbon whiskey', None), (None, u'2 cl white creme de menthe', None), (None, u'1 cl syrup of roses', None), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'dash')]
directions: Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Lanette recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'4  ice cubes', None), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'splashes'), (None, u' fill with orange juice', None)]

directions: Pour vanilla vodka over plenty of ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add goldschlager, peppermint schnapps, and top with Bailey's irish cream.

name: Indian Flag recipe

First pour Creme de Menthe into a shooter glass.,
Secondly add the peach schnapps and at last pour in the Cognac.

directions: Pour in order into an old-fashioned glass over ice, and serve.

name: Quikster's Delight recipe

directions: Blend all (very well) except the Kit Kat.  After pouring into glass, add Kit Kat as a decorative stirrer before serving.

directions: Pour vodka, cherry brandy, orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

ingredients: [(u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz')]

name: Maggie Girl recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Jameson\xae Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (None, u'1 fresh mint mint', None), (u'1/2', u'simple syrup', 'oz'), (None, u' top with soda', None)]
directions: Mull (crush) the fresh mint, as if you were making a mojito. Add mulled mint to Jameson's, add simple syrup and soda. Shake with crushed ice for 30 seconds. Pour onto fresh ice.

name: MagFest Mule recipe

directions: Mix equal amounts of each ingredient and pour into test tube chill before serving.

name: Mafia's Kiss recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Add amaretto, southern comfort, and sour mix to an ice-filled glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Mage's Fire recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'parts'), (u'1', u'cinnamon schnapps', 'part'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'part')]
directions: Mix the schnapps and curacao into a bottle with vodka. Chill for 24 hours, and serve as cold shots.

name: Maestro recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'anejo rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sherry', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, sherry, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice and top with the ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon twist.

directions: Pour cherry vodka into a whiskey-sour glass. Fill with 7-up, and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Maeek recipe

directions: Combine in a glass, add orange peel and serve.

name: Madison Avenue Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 ozfresh lime juice', None), (u'1', u'orange bitters', 'dash'), (None, u'3  mint', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Madison Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(u'12', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'48', u'beer', 'oz'), (None, u'12 ozfrozen pink lemonade', None)]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher. Mix together. Serve into collins glasses.

name: Madras recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lime', None)]
directions: Pour all ingredients (except lime wedge) into a highball glass over ice. Add the lime wedge and serve.

name: Madeleine recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cl Passoa\xae liqueur', None), (None, u'1 cl gin', None), (None, u'1 cl coconut liqueur', None), (None, u'12 cl pineapple juice', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients with four ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maddress recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the juices, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Madeira M'Dear recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'madeira', 'oz'), (u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour the Madeira wine, brandy and vermouth into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Mad Scientist #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'soda water', 'splash'), (None, u'  151 proof rum', None)]
directions:
Mix melon liqueur, sour mix, and soda water with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Top with rum and carefully ignite.,
Extinguish before serving.

name: Madame Rene recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'anejo rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Pour whiskey, rum, orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: OJ's Revenge recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 liter orange juice', None), (None, u'1/2 liter tequila', None), (u'2', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz')]
directions:
Drink out of an orange juice carton until about 3/4 or 1/2 full. Fill the carton the rest of the way with tequila (almost to the top), then pour just a little raspberry vodka in. Put the top back on the carton and mix very well. ,
Stand in a circle with friends, take a swig of it, and then pass it around the circle until it's empty.

name: Oil Spill #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 pint beer', None)]
directions: Mix whiskey and Jagermeister in a shot glass and then drop into a half glass of beer. Drink the entire mixture before it mixes and try to take it easy afterwards.

name: Oil Spill recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3/4 shot Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', None), (None, u'1/4 shot Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None)]
directions: Carefully layer jagermeister on top of the goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Oil Slick #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'15 ml black sambuca', None), (None, u'15 ml white creme de menthe', None)]
directions: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Using a teaspoon, carefully float the black sambuca on top. Shoot.

name: Oil Spill #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'tbsp')]
directions: Pour the schnapps and curacao into a shot glass. Carefully layer Jagermeister on top of drink, and serve.

name: Oil Rig recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 ozcheap Scotch whisky', None), (u'1', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a double shot glass (or whiskey sour glass, etc.) and serve.

name: Oi-Loa recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Myer's\xae dark rum", 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'almond syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'3/4 ozfreshly squeezed key lime juice', None), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1 1/2', u'ice', 'cups')]
directions:
Add all measured ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake ingredients for at least thirty seconds (watering down this drink a little bit is a good thing). Serve in a pint glass, a collins glass or a hurricane glass. Add a straw and garnish with a pineapple wedge or lime/lemon slice.,
If almond syrup is not readily available you may use the following,
substitute: 1/2 oz. of simple syrup and 1/2 oz. of almond liqueur. You can also use Mount Gay or Appleton Estate rum if Myer's is not available.

name: Ohranj Julius recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Stoli\xae Ohranj vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj), triple sec, sour mix and orange juice into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Oil Slick recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'1/2 shot Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', None)]
directions: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Ohranj Juice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Stoli\xae Ohranj vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]

directions: Mix all ingredients well and serve over ice.

directions: In a cocktail shaker, add ingredients and shake up. Pour over ice in old-fashioned glass. Serve with a coffee stirrer.

name: Ohio recipe

directions: Stir all ingredients (except champagne) in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Oh Yeah! recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'blackberry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Grape Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splash')]
directions: Mix blackberry brandy, triple sec, grape pucker schnapps and a splash of 7-up together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Oh My God recipe

directions: Fill glas with ice, add schnapps and Southern comfort, then fill glass full with pineapple juice.

name: Navel Caribbean Love recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'5', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour malibu into a hurricane glass, and slowly add the orange juice.

name: Ogre Piss recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 can Monster\xae energy drink', None), (u'2', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'1', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'dash')]
directions:
Ice is not recommended, but the Monster and Everclear should be refrigerated before use.  For best results, use standard-variety Monster, not other variations such as Khaos or Assault.,
Pour Monster into glass or cup, add Everclear and schnapps, and stir vigorously.  (Do *not* shake; given the volume of carbonated beverage involved, this will only create a mess.)  Enjoy.

name: Ogre Drink recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 scoops vanilla ice cream', None), (u'3', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a beer mug.

name: Naughty School Girl recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay mango rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Smirnoff\xae Watermelon Twist vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Naughty Nick recipe

directions: Fill a glass with cubed ice. Add McCormick's vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy.

name: Naval Destroyer recipe

directions: Thaw limeade concentrate and put in pitcher. Pour Bacardi rum into the empty limeade can until full, then transfer to pitcher. Add 3 beers to pitcher, and serve over ice in glasses.

name: Naughty Angel recipe

directions: Stir.

directions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

directions: Pour 1/3 Southern Comfort into the glass, then 1/3 Amaretto and finally 1/3 Sour Apple Schnapps

directions: Pour the rum, apricot brandy, pineapple juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Pour a can of Natural Ice lager into a pint glass, add cranberry juice, and serve.

directions: Pour chilled Tab Energy Drink into the glass.  Shake Rum, Contreau and lime juice w/ice and pour (w/ice) into glass.  Top of w/Sprite if necessary.  Garnish w/Lime.

directions: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into an ice-filled pint glass. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

name: Panther Sweat recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'6', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice, and strain into a whiskey-sour glass. Add crushed salt to the rim of the glass if desired.

directions: Stir the rum, triple sec and lime juice together in an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite, and serve.

name: Panther recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Panther Juice recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'5 LVladimir vodka', None), (None, u'2 L Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'5 L Hawaiian Punch\xae', None), (None, u'4 L Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', None), (None, u'2 L club soda', None), (None, u'3  lemons', None), (None, u'3  limes', None)]
directions: Combine Vodka, Jager, and Hawaiian Punch in Gatorade cooler/ dispenser. Slice lemons and limes in half, squeeze out juice and throw in with mixture. Let chill. Immediately before serving add Mountain Dew and Club Soda.

name: Pancake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'dash'), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None), (None, u'1 pinch sugar', None)]
directions: Pour the frangelico into a shot glass. Place a slice of lemon over the glass, pour some sugar over the lemon, then cover with a dash of Grand Marnier (so the sugar becomes sticky and partially dissolves). Drink, then bite the lemon.

name: Pansy Ass recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Potter's\xae vodka", 'oz'), (u'4', u"Stewart's\xae key lime juice", 'oz'), (u'4', u'cranberry-raspberry juice', 'oz'), (None, u'3 - 5 drops Pepsi\xae Diet', None)]
directions: Add ingredients to a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Panamaniac recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients except lime twist in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into glass. Squeeze lime peel over drink to release spray of oils and then drop it in.

name: Panama Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Panama Deluxe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'creme de cacao', 'part'), (u'2', u'cream', 'parts')]
directions: Shake all ingredients together, and serve in a tumbler over ice.

name: Panama Red recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Especial gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'dash'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash')]
directions: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Panama recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'151 proof rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dark creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients well and serve over ice.

name: Panama City Gin 'n' Juice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Gordon's\xae gin", 'oz'), (u'3/4', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz'), (u'6', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice. Slowly add the lime juice , then bulid with gin. Slowly fill with 7-Up leaving green and clear layers intact until just before drinking. Garnish with a twist of lime on a bamboo skewer, and serve.

name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'splash')]
directions: Place ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Consume as a shot.

name: Pan de Cafe Infectado recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'strawberries', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'bananas', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'mint', 'oz'), (u'1/2 - 1', u'crushed ice', 'cup')]
directions: Put ice, strawberrries, and bananas into a blender and blend for 5 seconds. Add malibu, and Bailey's and blend until there is a smoothie-like consistency. Finally add mint leaves into blender and stir, not blend. Pour into a suitable glass and serve.

name: Pamplemousse recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a small slice of grapefruit and a cherry.

name: Pan-Galactic Garble Blaster #4 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'light rum', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'gin', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'tequila', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'creme de menthe', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None)]
directions: Combine the gin, rum, vodka, tequila, creme de menthe, Galliano and ice in the container of a blender. Cover, and blend until slushy. Pour into a glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'35 ml Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'35 ml vodka', None), (None, u'17.5 ml cherry brandy', None), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'dash'), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None), (None, u'  dry cider', None)]
directions: Pour the tia maria, vodka and cherry brandy together into a pint glass. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill with equal amounts of dry cider and 7-up, and add ice cubes.

name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'4 - 6', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'splash')]
directions: Shake the orange juice, the Jack and the peach schnapps in a shaker 3/4 full with ice cubes. When it's chilled, strain into the highball glass and drizzle some of the blue Curacao liqueur over the top of it. Add a citrus twist (and, bizarrely, an olive if you're a DNA purist), sit back and be prepared to have your brain smashed out by gold bricks, lemons and allsorts.

name: Jackoff recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'ice', 'cup')]
directions: Mix liquids together starting with the liquor into a blender. Add the cup of ice and blend until it is like a smoothie. Serve.

directions: Pour the rum, lime juice and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar to taste, stir to dissolve, and serve.

directions: Pour the Yukon Jack whisky into a large shot glass to just below the rim. Float the peppermint schapps on the top, and serve.

directions: Pour the Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with canned pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add the spirits and orange juice. Splash with grenadine for taste/color. Shake with ice and pour into old-fashioned glass wihout the ice. Shoot and enjoy.

name: Jackhammer recipe

directions: Serve over ice.

name: Jackath recipe

directions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Barenjager\xae honey liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'butterscotch liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jackass recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'120 ml vodka', None), (None, u'20 ml gin', None), (None, u'60 ml Champagne', None), (None, u'50 ml soda water', None), (None, u'25 ml orange juice', None), (None, u'20 ml lemon juice', None)]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a red wine glass; swirl until mixed. Add several ice cubes and serve.

directions: Pour 2 ounces of Jack Daniel's into a collins glass. Add the Smirnoff Ice, then top with an extra ounce of Jack Daniel's. Drink slowly.

directions: Blend ingredients together until smooth and serve with cookies.

directions: Add Kamora to a highball glass with ice, fill with carbonated water and squeeze & drop in the lime wedge.

name: Jack-Off recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"1 shot Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None), (None, u'1/2 can Coca-Cola\xae', None), (None, u'2 shots iced tea', None), (None, u'  ice', None)]
directions: Pour in one shot of jack daniel's on ice, more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of coca-cola on top, leaving room for the iced tea. Finally, fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

name: Kamora Spanish Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Kamora\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'coffee', 'cup'), (u'1/2 - 1', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Add ingredients to mug of hot coffee; float puff of whipped cream on top.

ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Kamora\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'16', u'apple cider', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1/2 cupdried apple', None), (None, u'1  cinnamon', None), (u'1', u'butter', 'tsp')]

directions: Add Kamora to your cup of hot coffee. Float a puff of whipped cream on top, sprinkle with chopped hazelnuts.

name: Kamora Coffee Italiano recipe
