name: Odwits recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'mezcal', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'dash'), (None, u'  orange juice', None)]
directions: Mix tequila, vodka and southern comfort in a highball glass. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

name: Odin's Juice recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Captain Morgan's coconut rum and spiced rum into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice. Add the grenadine, and equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Octopus's Garden recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dry vermouth', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive, and serve.

name: Octopus recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (None, u"8 drops Bailey's\xae Irish cream", None)]
directions: Pour Absolut, Rumpleminze, and Bacardi 151 into a shot glass. Using a stir stick, drip in 8 drops of Bailey's Irish Cream one at a time to form the tentacles of the Octopus. Serve.

name: October 27th recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Rose's\xae grenadine syrup", 'oz'), (u'4', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the rums, Rose's grenadine and Coca-cola into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Ocho Cinco recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splash')]
directions: Mix in a shaker with ice and pour into shot glasses.

name: Octapussy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sloe gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a cocktail glass.

name: Ocean's Spray recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay mango rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Ocean Spray Monkey Drink recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'fruit punch', 'oz')]
directions: Add a few ice cubes to glass. Pour in 2 oz. banana liqueur, then fill with fruit punch. Stir.

name: Ocean Water recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'8', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour it all into a glass and stir. The blue curacao is mainly for color so not much is needed, and if you want it to be more alcoholic add a bit more of the rum, and then some vodka or white rum.

name: Ocean Drive recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Curacao orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 count orange juice', None), (None, u'1 count pineapple juice', None), (None, u'1 count cranberry juice', None)]
directions: Pour malibu rum and curacao into a cocktail glass. Add by pouring down the side of the glass, in order; orange juice, pineapple juice, and cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Nasty Mexican recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the tequila into a shot glass; add the Kahlua coffee liqueur and serve.

name: Nasty Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Wild Turkey\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'brown creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Wild turkey whiskey, brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nasty Bitch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Serve chilled tequila and cointreau straight up in a shot glass.

name: Nassau Paul recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'egg', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'simple syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Combine the white rum, Cointreau, lemon juice, egg white and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Nappy Rash recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'rye whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'2', u'iced tea', 'tbsp'), (u'12', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1/4  orange', None)]
directions: Pour the rye whiskey, spiced rum, peach schnapps and grapefruit juice into a blender. Add the iced tea powder mix, and 1/4 of an orange (including peel and rind). Blend very well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Narragansett recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'anisette', 'tsp')]
directions: Combine the bourbon, vermouth, and anisette in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Nappy Dugout recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Build ingredients over two ice cubes in a highball glass, and stir.

name: Napoleon's Mexican Winter recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Courvoisier\xae cognac', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'light cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mug, followed by the cream, and then the Courvoisier, and stir them together. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds, and serve.

name: Napotonic recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 cl Mandarine Napoleon\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'  Schweppes\xae tonic water', None)]
directions: Pour mandarine napoleon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, and garnish with orange peels.

name: Napoleon on the Back recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae black rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Napolean brandy', 'oz')]
directions: Serve straight on the rocks.

name: Naple's Old-Fashioned recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (None, u'1 ozfresh orange juice', None), (u'1', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dash'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Muddle a sugar cube with bitters in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the whiskey and the orange juice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, slices of orange and a maraschino cherry. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Napoleon recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Curacao orange liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'Dubonnet\xae French vermouth', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Napalm-Death recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'part'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'part'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'part')]
directions: Carefully layer into a shot glass, in equal parts, and in order; kahlua first.

name: Napalm Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'2/3', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass, and shoot.

name: Napalm #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'3', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (None, u'1/3 scoop Gatorade\xae orange soda', None), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None)]
directions:
Add ice to glass 1/2 full. Pour in Gin. Squeeze lemon juice over ice. ,
Add Gatorade mix. Slowly add 7-up to top. Gently stir until powder mix is dissolved.

name: Palmetto Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Napalm recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Aftershock\xae Hot & Cool cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'151 proof rum', 'splash')]
directions: Pour into a shot glass in order; aftershock, schnapps, rum. Ignite the rum, allow to burn for a few seconds, extinguish, and serve.

name: Pamoyo recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'part'), (u'1', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'part'), (u'1', u'grape juice', 'part')]
directions: Combine equal parts of gin, sprite, and grape juice in a large container. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Pam Super Juice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'non-alcoholic creme de menthe', 'oz')]
directions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into an aperitif glass, and serve. (Good for kids who wants to have a drink like grown ups.)

name: Paloma #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'silver tequila', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 - 3/4 ozfreshly squeezed lime juice', None), (u'6', u'Squirt\xae citrus soda', 'oz'), (None, u'2 pinches salt', None)]
directions: Fill a collins glass with ice to the top. Squeeze in juice of half of a small lime. Sprinkle salt over top. Add tequila. Fill with Squirt. Give a little stir, then sprinkle a little salt on the top before serving (optional).

name: Pammy Kay recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour the vermouth, gin, brandy and fruit juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pamir Peach recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stoli\xae Persik vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Amaretto Di Saronno\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'dash')]
directions: Pour the Stoli peach vodka (Persik). Amaretto Di Saronno, orange juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes, and serve.

name: Palmera recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Havana Club\xae white rum', 'oz'), (None, u'1 1/2 ozmedium white wine', None), (u'3/4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake and strain over one large ice cube in a wine glass.

name: Palmetto recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'Bacardi\xae white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u"Myer's\xae dark rum", 'oz'), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Float myer's rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

name: Palm Breeze recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'2 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'2 1/2 ozblue Hawaiian Punch\xae', None)]
directions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal amounts of orange juice and blue hawaiian punch, and serve.

name: Palmer Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palm Beacher recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the dark rum, amaretto and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Pall Mall Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'white creme de menthe', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'orange bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Stir the gin, vermouths, creme de menthe and orange bitters together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palm Beach Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'grapefruit juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pall Mall Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz')]
directions: Stir the gin, vermouths and creme de cacao together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Palamino recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Green Chartreuse\xae', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'creme de cassis', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'whiskey', 'oz')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass.

name: Pajama Jammy Jam recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'splashes')]
directions: Shake goldschlager, grenadine and raspberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Mix vodka and orange juice in separate container and float on top.

name: Palais Royal recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Champagne', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

name: Jack-in-the-Green recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'apple schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh lime wheel and a small slice of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Jack-In-The-Box recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'apple brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jack-Hammer II recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into a shot glass and slam it.

name: Jack's Vanilla Coke recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tsp'), (u'11', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the ingredients into a tall glass, and add 3 - 5 ice cubes. Stir with a stirrer to get the vanilla off the bottom.

name: Jack's Log Cabin recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'3', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'maple syrup', 'tbsp'), (None, u'  ice cubes', None)]
directions:
Put ice cubes into a highball glass or any kind of small drinking glass.,
Add 3 oz Jack Daniels Whiskey followed by 3 oz of Mr. & Mrs. T's Sweet & Sour Mix.,
Follow this up by a teaspoon of Maple Syrup.,
Stir in the ingredients with a spoon or knife (Mixing the syrup in).

name: Jack's Fruit Punch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'3', u'Minute Maid\xae fruit punch', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients with about a cup of ice. Strain into a cocktail glass with or without ice (whatever you feel), and serve. If not strong enough, make the harder version by doubling the amount of Jack Daniel's.

name: Jack's Jam recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apple schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'strawberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'powdered sugar', 'tbsp')]
directions: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Jack's Bagpipe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Gentleman Jack\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'6 1/2', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Gentleman Jack bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and add butterscotch schnapps. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Jack Your Melon recipe
ingredients: [(u'8', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz'), (None, u'2 shots watermelon schnapps', None), (None, u"1 shot Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None)]
directions: Pour the mountain dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Add the shots of watermelon schnapps and jack daniels to the glass, stir, and serve.

name: Jack's Apple recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Applejack\xae brandy', 'oz'), (u'4', u'apple cider', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slicebaked apple', None), (None, u'1 pinch cinnamon', None), (None, u'1 pinch nutmeg', None), (u'1', u'honey', 'tsp')]
directions: Put apple brandy, cider and honey in a small saucepan and heat, stirring until the honey dissolves. Pour immediately into a pre-warmed mug. Sprinkle ground cinammon and nutmeg on top. Garnish with a slice of baked apple.

name: Jack Withers recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jack Voigt recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', None), (None, u'1/4 shot amaretto almond liqueur', None), (None, u'1/4 shot creme de bananes', None)]
directions: Put in any order into a shot glass, preferably captain morgan's first.

name: Jack the Ripper recipe
ingredients: [(u'2 1/2', u'Crown Royal\xae Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Level ice to the top in a shaker, add crown royal and buttershots, then shake. Strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Kamikaze Version recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  sweet and sour mix', None)]
directions: Add vodka and mixers to a cocktail glass with ice. Fill with sour mix and shake.

name: Kamikaze Shooter recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (None, u'2 pinches sugar', None)]
directions: Pour ice cold vodka, triple sec, and sour mix into a chilled shot glass. Drop a pinch of sugar into the shooter and frost the glass with the remaining.

name: Kamikaze on the Rag recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'cranberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Kamikaze Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'3', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'margarita mix', 'oz'), (u'4', u'ice', 'cups')]
directions: Blend everything until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

name: Kamikaze Kool recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u"  Rose's\xae lime juice", None)]
directions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Simultaneously pour in the vodka and grand marnier. Add lime juice. Stir with a straw and serve.

name: Kamikaze Bomber recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Red Bull\xae energy drink', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Pour the Red Bull into an old fashioned glass, splash the grenadine to reddan the Bull. Pour a shot of Jagermeister and drop it into the glass. Consume that beverage kamikaze style.

name: Kamikaze #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Kameleon recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'151 proof rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u"Pimm's\xae gin", 'oz')]
directions: Firstly, build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

name: Kamikaze recipe
ingredients: [(u'1.25', u'Smirnoff\xae No. 21 Vodka', 'oz'), (u'0.25', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'0.25', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions:
Add lime juice, triple sec and Smirnoff No.21 Vodka.,
Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Kamel Drivare recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'sambuca', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass, and layer the bailey's by pouring over a spoon into the same glass. Do not allow to mix.

name: Kamakazie Razzberry recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"1 can Welch's\xae raspberry juice", None), (None, u'1 can Phillips\xae raspberry schnapps', None), (None, u'1 can Absolut\xae vodka', None)]
directions: Pour welch's concentrate into pitcher, then fill can with vodka and pour into pitcher. Finally fill can with raspberry schnapps and pour into pitcher. Add crushed ice and shake.

name: Kamakazie #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lime', None)]
directions: Pour absolut and cointreau over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Squeeze and drop in lime wedge to taste.

name: Kamakazie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'part'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'part')]
directions: Shake well with ice and strain mixture into a shot glass. Salute.

name: Kamakazi Deluxe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Adjust mixture to taste.

name: Kamakazi #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Crown Royal\xae Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz')]

Shake well. Fill collins glass with ice and strain the mix into it. Settle grenadine down the side of the glass and garnish with two cherries and a slice of orange.

directions: Build in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass over ice. Stir but do not shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Paloma recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'6', u'club soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'splash'), (None, u'1 pinch salt', None)]
directions: Pour the tequila into a salt-rimmed collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Splash lime juice on top, and serve.

name: Machu Picchu recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'pisco brandy', 'oz'), (None, u'4 ozfresh-squeezed orange juice', None), (u'1/4', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'creme de menthe', 'oz')]
directions:
Fill a tall glass with ice cubes. Pour in 1 ounce of the pisco, the orange juice and the grenadine. In a cocktail shaker, combine the remaining pisco, creme de menthe and three ice cubes and shake well (this will lighten the creme de menthe so that it floats on the top).,
Pour on top of the orange juice mixture in the tall glass and add a straw, but don't stir or the colors will blend together.

name: Machu Picchu recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'pisco brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'mint liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp')]
directions:
1. Fill a 12-oz highball glass half way up with orange juice. Pour some grenadine syrup carefully... it should go straight to the bottom, not mixing with the orange juice. ,
2. Gently place two ice cubes on the highball glass and then, in a mixing glass, mix the pisco with a mint liqueur. Pour the pisco/mint mixture very slowly over the ice cubes, so that it floats without mixing with the orange and/or grenadine.,
3. You should get a beautifull red-orange-green cocktail. When serving, instruct your guests to drink it from a straw, pulling it up as they drink, in order to get the three different flavours.

name: Mach 6 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet sherry', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Blend ingredients in a highball glass until smooth. Add three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: Machine Gun Joe recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cranberry-apple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'20  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Pour OJ into ice cube tray, freeze. Put cubes in blender, add 4 shots vodka (regular or flavored). Add 2 shots of apple-cranberry juice and blend.

name: Machine recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz')]
directions:
1. Pour the orange juice into a shot glass, take a napkin and place it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. (As far as it can go without touching the juice.) ,
2. Slowly pour the vodka so that it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice. Remove the napkin and drink.

directions: Combine ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass.

name: Oatmeal Cookie Rummy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie Shots recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Buttershots liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Hot Damn cinnamon schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: In a shot glass, layer the 100-proof Hot Damn first, then add the Buttershots, and slowly top with Baily's Irish Cream.

name: Oatmeal Cookie and Hot Chocolate recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'6', u'hot chocolate', 'oz'), (u'1', u'chocolate', 'dash'), (u'1/2 - 1', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Add liqueurs to a mug of hot chocolate. Stir, top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. Enjoy!

name: Oatmeal Cookie #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Buttershots liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in an aperitif glass, and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/4', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'splash')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nantucket Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'vodka', 'cups'), (u'5', u'lemonade', 'cups'), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'cups'), (None, u'3 tbspfresh lime juice', None), (u'2', u'ginger ale', 'cups'), (None, u'4 cupschilled ice', None), (None, u' frozen cranberry', None), (None, u'1  lemon', None)]
directions:
Combine the lemonade, cranberry juice, lime juice and vodka in the punch bowl and mix well. Just before serving, slowly pour in the ginger ale. Add the ice cubes. Garnish with the frozen cranberries and lemon slices and serve immediately.,
Notes: For non-alcoholic Nantucket Lemonade, substitute 2 cups additional ginger ale and 1 cup additional cranberry juice for the vodka. For a picnic or harbor cruise, mix the punch directly in a small insulated cooler for instant and easy transportability. ,
Serves 12.

name: Nantucket Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the white brandy, cranberry juice and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Nanogram recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/8', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with butterscotch schnapps, then sink the Midori slowly and float Baileys on top. Chug.

name: Nani's Aloha recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'vanilla schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cherry juice', 'splash'), (None, u'12 ozcan Coca-Cola\xae Cherry Coke', None), (None, u'3  cherries', None)]
directions: Fill glass with ice, add alcohol. Fill rest of glass with cherry coke, splash in cherry juice and don't forget the 3 cherries.

name: Nanc's Iced-Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6 ozhot black coffee', None), (u'2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'splash')]
directions: Pour coffee over crushed ice, or small ice cubes, in a blender. Add all other ingredients and blend on high speed until desired consistency.

name: Nan's Special recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'30 ml vodka', None), (None, u'30 ml 7-Up\xae soda', None), (None, u'60 ml soda water', None), (None, u' juice of 1/2 lemons', None), (u'1', u'salt', 'dash')]
directions: Mix the vodka, 7-up, and soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.

name: Namib special recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice orange', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Roll the orange slice in some sugar. Drink the Jack Daniel's whiskey, then chase with the sugar-coated orange slice.

name: Naked Waiter recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Mandarine Napoleon\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'4 ozsparkling bitter lemon soda', None)]
directions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Nalgaa recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 shots Campari\xae bitters', None), (u'2', u'cherry liqueur', 'tbsp'), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None)]
directions: Pour cherry liqueur over four ice cubes in a highball glass, and add the campari. Fill with 7-up, or sprite, and serve.

name: Naked Twister Shots recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Bacardi\xae Limon rum', None), (None, u'1 shot Pepsi\xae Twist cola', None)]
directions: Pour both ingredients into seperate shot glasses. Drink half the Pepsi, shoot the Bacardi Limon, then finish the Pepsi shot. Rinse and repeat.

name: Naked Yellow Bird recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'raspberry liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'part')]
directions: Mix equal parts over ice. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Pajama Jackhammer recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'guava juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass with shaved ice, and serve.

name: Paisley Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Scotch whisky', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (None, u'1 twist lemon', None)]
directions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Paisano recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  milk', None)]
directions: Pour vodka and frangelico into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with milk, and shake.

name: Painting Pink recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'5', u'cream soda', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Painter's Delight recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 cl gin', None), (None, u'2 cl Green Curacao liqueur', None), (u'1', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'tsp'), (None, u' juice of 1/2 lemons', None), (None, u'  soda water', None)]
directions: Pour gin, curacao, pernod and lemon juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda water, stir, and serve.

name: Paintball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'green creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Pour in order into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Painkiller recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Pusser's\xae dark rum", 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream of coconut', 'oz'), (u'4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake or stir ingredients, and pour over ice in a tall glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve,

name: Paint Can recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 fifth vodka', None), (None, u'2 liters Squirt\xae citrus soda', None), (None, u'1 canfrozen limeade', None), (None, u'1 canfrozen lemonade', None)]
directions:
Go to your local paint store and purchase a brand new paint can. Fill the paint can completely with ice. ,
Add the vodka, the frozen limeade & the frozen lemonade (do not mix these with water). Finish filling the paint can with Squirt. ,
Place the lid on the paint can very tightly. Wrap a towel around the paint can and shake the can vigorously. Keep shaking the paint can until the towel sticks to it (caused by frost). Open the can and pass it around. You drink it directly out of the paint can...

name: Pain Killer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  cranberry juice', None), (None, u'  orange juice', None), (None, u'  pineapple juice', None), (u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz')]
directions: Pour midori melon liqueur in an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill, with equal parts; cranberry, orange, and pineapple juice. Add rum, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Pain, Pain, Go Away recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'tbsp'), (None, u'6 pints Irish whiskey', None), (u'4', u'ginger ale', 'oz'), (u'5', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'splashes')]
directions: Pour tabasco sauce into a large container, add whiskey, cream, and mix well. Pour into appropriate glasses, drink and chase with ginger ale and lemon peel. (Drink the mixture, take a swig of ginger ale, and bite the lemon peel.)

name: Pai Nosso recipe

name: Pain d'Epices recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 2/3', u'Havana Club\xae Anejo Especial rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Pedro Ximinez sherry', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Monin\xae gingerbread syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'1 - 1 1/2 ozfreshly squeezed orange juice', None)]
directions: Chill a martini glass. Pour the rum, Pedro Ximenez and Monin pain d'epices (gingerbread) syrup over ice in a mixing glass. By hand, squeeze the juice from half an orange into the glass. Stir slowly and at length. Strain into a martini glass, and serve.

name: Pain in the Ass recipe

directions: Pour Midori melon liqueur, Bacardi 151, Sour Apple Pucker, and Malibu Rum into a highball glass. Top off with pineapple juice and 7-Up, stir and serve.

directions: Pour ingredients into a blender filled with crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy, and pour into a margarita glass, Sprinkle chocolate shavings on top, and serve.

name: Paddy's Caffeine recipe

directions: Add the tia maria first (before the guinness has settled and before you "head" it), as otherwise you will mess-up a perfectly well-settled pint.

name: Jack Sprite recipe

directions: Pour the jack daniels into a glass followed by sprite to taste. Add a slice of lemon. Stir the beverage and enjoy.

name: Jack Sour recipe

directions: Pour into a shot glass in order. Top with whipped cream and serve!

directions: Pour Jack Daniels, Bailey's and Kahlua over 3 ice cubes in an Irish coffee cup. Fill glass with Nesquik chocolate milk, and dash Tullamore Dew on top. Stir and serve.

directions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

directions: Pour jack daniels over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke, and lace with grenadine, to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional), and serve.

directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Kalimotxo recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'10 cl red wine', None), (None, u'10 cl Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Best served cold in a highball glass, but without ice.

name: Kalimocho recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle red wine', None), (None, u'75 cl Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of coke. Then simply pour red wine, cheap or not, into the bottle slowly, until full. Do not shake the bottle, but simply turn it over a couple of times.

name: Kali Fury recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with 1/2 pineapple juice', None), (None, u' fill with 1/2 orange juice', None), (u'1/2', u'creme de bananes', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Malibu Rum into a Lg. Rocks(Bucket)glass or Collins glass filled with ice then pour in juices and top with 1/2 oz. Creme de Banana.

name: Kalamazoo recipe

directions: Stir well with a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kalashnikov Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None), (None, u'1 pinch cinnamon', None), (None, u'1 pinch sugar', None)]
directions:
Almost fill a shot glass with vodka, then place a lemon slice across the top of the glass so that it covers half of the diameter. Fill the rest of the shot glass with absinthe, pouring so that is passes through the slice of lemon. ,
Add sugar and cinnamon (cinnamon is optional) to the lemon and finally, ignite it. When the flame extinguishes itself, take the shot and eat the lemon.

name: Kalabreeze recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'triple sec', 'oz')]

directions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur, vanilla schnapps, amaretto almond liqueur, vodka, DeKuyper Hot Damn! schnapps, apple juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Dust with cinnamon and sugar, and serve.

name: Kalamazoo Kicker recipe

directions: Add 1/4 can Red Bull to your beer.

name: Kai-agra recipe

directions: Easy built drink, Shot of Kai Lychee vodka over ice, fill almost to the top with guava rockstar and add a splash of cranberry. Squeeze the lime and give it a stir and youre set!

name: Lady Cello recipe

directions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar-rimmed highball glass. (Use limoncello and sugar.) Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

directions: Fill the glass with ice, add shot after shot of tantalizing liquors, top with a lemon wedge and enjoy!

name: IED (Improvised Explosive Device) recipe

directions: Combine Jagermeister (smoke), Goldschlager (fragmentation), and Jose Cuervo tequila (because we had 1 Mexican in the platoon) in a highball or old-fashioned glass. After all ingredients have been combined drop some lit Bacardi 151 rum into the glass and shoot. After a couple of seconds when the intital shock has wore off you yell BAM!!

name: Idaho Dimetapp recipe

name: Icy Ice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 pinch salt', None), (None, u'1 scoop lime ice cream', None), (None, u'1 pinch lemon', None), (None, u'  Pepsi\xae cola', None)]
directions:
1. Stir the juices together in a freezable container and freeze until ice. Crush the ice finely with the lemon zest, and mix salt into the crushed ice. ,
2. Pour the Pepsi into a highball glass, and quickly add the ice cream and cover with the crushed ice to prevent it flowing out. Serve.

name: Icy Clean Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Skyy\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Martini & Rossi\xae dry vermouth', 'oz'), (None, u'1 strip of lemon', None), (None, u'4 drops Fee Brothers\xae orange bitters', None)]
directions: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail pitcher, including the lemon peel.  Add 2 handfuls of ice.  Stir vigorously (40 stirs should do it).  Strain into an ICED cocktail glass and serve immediately, with NO garnish.  The lemon peel will have added its oils to the martini during stirring.  It needs no further embellishment.

name: Iconoclast recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 fresh lemon', None), (None, u' diet Vernors\xae Original ginger soda', None), (None, u' cubed or crushed ice', None), (None, u' premium gin', None)]
directions:
Fill an old-fasioned glass halfway with ice. Add the juice of 1/2 lemon and 2 oz. gin (I prefer Bombay Sapphire). Stir. Fill the rest of the way with diet Verners and gently stir. Enjoy.,
Nutrition Info: 156 calories and 3 g carbohydrates per glass(!)

name: Absolut 600 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'10 clfrozen orange juice', None), (None, u'1/2 fresh peach', None), (None, u'  raspberries', None), (None, u'2 - 3 drops grenadine syrup', None), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'tsp'), (None, u'2 tbspvanilla sugar syrup', None), (None, u'3 cl Absolut\xae Mandrin vodka', None), (None, u'  Champagne', None)]
directions:
Chop the peach and put into a blender. Blend together with the frozen orangejuice and a few raspberries. Add a few drops grenadine, the limejuice and the sugar syrup. Blend until it's smooth. ,
Pour the absolut mandarin into a highball glass. Fill the glass to half with the mix from the blender and fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine. Stir and serve.
