name: Naked Pretzel recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'creme de cassis', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur, creme de cassis and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Naked Sunburn recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'creme de noyaux', 'oz'), (u'2 - 4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'2 - 4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splash'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'splash')]
directions: Pour the melon liqueur, Malibu rum and creme de noyaux into a hurricane glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the 7-Up and sour mix. Fill with equal parts of pineapple and cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Naked Twister recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Tuaca\xae citrus liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  pineapple juice', None), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splash')]
directions: Pour midori, vodka and tuaca into a pint glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice, and top with 7-up. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Naked Pear recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Smirnoff\xae Green Apple Twist vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'4', u'pineapple juice', 'splashes'), (u'3', u'sweet and sour mix', 'splashes')]
directions: Mix apple vodka, melon liqueur and triple sec in a shaker. Fill a glass with ice. Pour the ingredients from the shaker into glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sour mix and pineapple, garnish with a cherry.

name: Naked on the Bathroom Floor recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Wild Turkey\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Hot Damn cinnamon schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Stir together in a short glass, and serve.

name: Naked Navel recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Both vodka and schnapps should be kept in the freezer prior to making. Pour vodka into a shot glass, and add the schnapps, forming a ball in the bottom of the glass.

name: Naked Barbie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'strawberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Naked Lady recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'4', u'apricot brandy', 'dashes'), (u'2', u'grenadine syrup', 'dashes'), (u'4', u'lemon juice', 'dashes')]
directions: Pour the white rum, sweet vermouth, apricot brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Naked Girl Scout recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Godiva\xae chocolate liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', 'part')]
directions: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

name: Naked in the Bathtub recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Svedka\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'6', u'DaVinci Gourmet\xae vanilla syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Pour over ice in your favorite glass, vodka first.

name: Nail Puller recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Dr. Pepper\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

name: Nagshead Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nagle recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'splash')]
directions: Pour Southern Comfort and Goldshlager in equal parts into a shot glass. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Nadir Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 2/3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'strawberry syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'tsp'), (u'3', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Nagermeister recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cl Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'2 cl Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'  coffee', None)]
directions: Pour kahlua into an irish coffee cup. Add jagermeister, fill with coffee and serve with cream on top.

name: Nadir Blue recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 2/3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'strawberry syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'tsp'), (u'2 1/2', u'soda water', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Pour the blue curacao into the middle. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Nagel Nectar recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 shots butterscotch schnapps', None), (None, u'3 shots milk', None)]
directions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: NA-4 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'Gatorade\xae energy drink', 'part'), (u'1', u'energy soda', 'part'), (u'1', u'Hawaiian Punch\xae', 'part')]
directions: Mix equal parts of all ingredients, varying depending on how strong you would like it and which of the flavors you like best. Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Padas Passoa recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Passoa\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'2 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2 1/2', u'grape soda', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Padas Battery recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Smirnoff\xae lemon vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Passoa\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'5 ozcold Red Bull\xae energy drink', None)]
directions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Paco Mix recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gold tequila', 'oz'), (None, u'1 can beer', None), (None, u'2 1/2 twists lemons', None), (None, u'2 pinches salt', None), (u'2 - 3', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dashes'), (u'2 - 3', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dashes')]
directions: In a beer mug add ice, lemon and salt, then add the beer, stir a bit, add the tabasco sauce and the worcestershire sauce. Finally add the tequila and vodka.

name: Pacifica recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'rosso vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Stir in a shaker with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Pacific Wet Dream recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Buttershots liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'3 - 5', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash'), (u'1/4', u'Hpnotiq\xae liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice, and serve.

name: Pacifist recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 3/4', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1 3/4', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'raspberry syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Pacific Dawg recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'750 ml Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay mango rum', None), (None, u'750 ml Malibu\xae coconut rum', None), (u'32', u"Welch's\xae grape-peach juice", 'oz')]
directions: Use white grape-peach juice from Welch's if you can find it. Mix a 32oz bottle with a 750ml bottle of each rum and serve chilled or over ice. Delicious and gets the job done. Enjoy!

name: Pac-Man recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'maraschino liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'strawberry schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'2', u'apple juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add the ingredients in the chronological "level" order (cherry > strawberry > peach > apple > pineapple), stir, and serve in a highball glass on the rocks. The glass is then garnished with a banana slice that has been cut to resemble Pac-Man's open-mouthed head!

name: Pac Man recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash'), (u'7 - 8', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: Add grenadine, lemon juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale, and slide an orange slice down the side of the glass.

name: Pabst-Smir recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2 - 1 1/2', u'Pabst\xae lager', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Smirnoff\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'fruit juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pack an 8-oz glass with ice. Add Smirnoff vodka and fruit juice concentrate. Fill glass with Pabst. Dump contents into a shaker. Shake gently, and strain. Makes one big shooter.

name: Pacific Sunshine recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Mix with cracked ice and pour, with ice, into a chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Pablo's Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kirschwasser\xae cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Dubonnet\xae French vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'mint syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour the scotch into a shot glass, add the kirsch and amaretto. Carefully add the dubonnet rouge trying not to mix the ingredients. Repeat with the mint syrup. Shoot.

name: P.T.O. recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the rum, vodka, triple sec, and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

name: P.S.U. Victory Dance recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vanilla liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'CocoRibe\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'club soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'powdered sugar', 'tsp')]
directions:
Mix all ingredients together in a blender. Pour contents into a beer mug filled with cracked ice. ,
Note: Add crushed ice to the blending process for a Frozen Victory Dance.

name: P'tit Caribou recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'port', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'creme de cassis', 'oz'), (u'1', u'maple syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Stir all ingredients together and serve in a chilled red wine glass.

name: Jack Leg recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Amaretto Di Saronno\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'splash')]
directions: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey, Amaretto Di Saronno, pineapple juice and Sprite over ice in a mason jar, and serve.

name: Jack Lemmon M.D. recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (None, u' juice of 1/2 lemons', None), (None, u' fill with Dr. Pepper\xae soda', None), (None, u'  ice cubes', None), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None)]
directions: Pour jack daniels and lemon juice over ice. Top off with dr. pepper. Garnish with a lemon slice. Stir.

name: Jack in the Summer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'cola', 'oz'), (None, u'1 handful strawberries', None)]
directions: Fill glass 1/3 of the way with strawberries. Pour 1 part Jack Daniel's over strawberries. Fill with cola, stir.

name: Jack Knife recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Must be equal parts. Shake in shaker over ice and strain into an old- fashioned.

name: Jack Honey Slushee recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'passion-fruit juice', 'oz'), (u'6', u'Jack Iron\xae strong Caribbean rum', 'oz'), (u'8', u'water', 'oz'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash'), (None, u'1 pinchfresh, grated nutmeg', None)]
directions:
Mix the first four ingredients together and store in a freezable container. Place in freezer for 24 hours until frozen to slush consistency.,
Make sure you use strong rum (140+), or it will freeze solid.,
Serve in a pina colada or old fashioned glass. Add a dash of bitters and some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Jack in the Green recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz')]
directions: In a shot glass, fill half way up with absinthe first, then jack daniels in the other half and wait for it to settle. Now drink, but dont overdo it! Very strong!

name: Jack Hammer #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'5', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Jack Hammer #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u' top with orange juice', None)]
directions: Build in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jack Gin recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'apple brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice orange', None)]
directions: Fill a collins glass with ice and dump it into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour contents of shaker into collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Jack Frost #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jack Hammer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Irish cream', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u' top with milk', None)]
directions: Pour the vodka, irish cream and peppermint schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with milk, to taste, and serve.

name: Jack Frost recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash'), (u'1/4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'orange juice', 'cup')]
directions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.

name: Jack D. My Passion recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"60 ml Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None), (None, u'5 ml passion-fruit syrup', None), (None, u'2 ml lime juice', None), (None, u' top with Sprite\xae soda', None)]
directions: Take some ice in shaker, put some lime juice and passion fruit syrup, shake it well, serve in highball glass with ice, top with Sprite, garnish of lemon slice

name: Jack Daniel's Lynchburg Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'part'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'part'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'part'), (u'4', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'parts')]
directions: Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.

name: Jack Colada recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'6', u'pina colada mix', 'oz')]
directions: Add Jack Daniel's to glass, then pour in pina colada mix. Top with a cherry and a pineapple wedge and enjoy.

name: Jack Brisk recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'9', u'Lipton\xae Brisk iced tea', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Jack Daniels into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, then fill with lipton brisk, stir and serve.

name: Jack Bauer recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Glenfiddich\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'rum', 'oz'), (None, u"1 bottle Alexander Keith's\xae India Pale Ale", None)]
directions: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker over ice, shake, strain into shot glasses. Drop glasses into mug of Keith's, as done with a depth charge. Chug beer and catch shot glass.

name: Jack Ass recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'151 proof rum', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey into a shot glass. Top with 151 proof rum, and serve.

name: Kahlua Toreador recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2  egg', None)]
directions: Shake everything with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua Mocha Milkshake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'chocolate syrup', 'splash'), (u'1', u'vanilla ice cream', 'cup')]
directions: Blend all ingredients together with chocolate syrup to taste. Optional garnish: Try to rim the inside of the glass with chocolate syrup, pour the shake, and lightly drizzle chocolate sauce on top.

name: Jack and The Dr. recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"3 ozpre-chilled Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None), (None, u'12 ozpre-chilled can Dr. Pepper\xae soda', None)]
directions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey and Dr. Pepper into a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Kahlua Sour recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Mix kahlua and lemon juice in a cocktail glass. Add sugar, and serve.

name: Kahlua Mudslide recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Shake everything with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Kahlua Peppermint Pattie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'club soda', 'splash'), (u'6', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Kahlua and peppermint schnapps into glass over ice, add cream, and top off with club soda. Stir with a straw.

name: Kahlua Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'coffee', 'splash')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Kahlua Madness recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (u'1', u'creme de noyaux', 'dash'), (None, u'  cream', None), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'tonic water', 'oz')]
directions: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add vodka and tonic water. Drink from the bottom with two straws.

name: Kahlua Fudge Shake recipe
ingredients: [(u'2 - 4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'3 scoops fudge ice cream', None), (u'3', u'milk', 'oz'), (None, u'  ice', None)]
directions: Just like making a milk shake, but add the kahlua and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua Kiss recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (u'1', u'creme de noyaux', 'dash'), (None, u'  cream', None)]
directions: Pour kahlua half-way in a champagne flute filled with crushed ice. Add creme de noyaux, top with cream, and serve.

name: Kahlua Egg Cream recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'8', u'club soda', 'oz'), (u'2', u'milk', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua Hot Chocolate recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'5 ozhot cocoa', None), (u'1', u'whipped cream', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Combine kahlua and cocoa in an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Kahlua Frost recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'cream of coconut', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'ice', 'cup'), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Blend everything until smooth. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Kahlua Earthquake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'white tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5', u'cola', 'oz')]
directions: Add Kahlua and Tequila to glass, add ice and top up with Cola.

name: Kahlua Cream Soda recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'whipping cream', 'oz'), (u'4', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Shake kahlua and cream, and strain into a highball glass. Add soda, and serve with a straw.

name: Kahlua Cookie recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 scoops vanilla ice cream', None), (None, u'3 chocolate cookies', None), (u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vanilla extract', 'dash'), (u'1', u'half-and-half', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'crushed ice', 'cup')]
directions: Combine all in a blender. Blend extremely well, pour into a large glass (ie. hurricane) and serve.

name: Kahlua Cognac recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'oz')]
directions: Serve in a brandy snifter.

name: Kahlua Coffee #4 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 cupsboiling water', None), (u'4', u'sugar', 'cups'), (None, u'1  vanilla', None), (None, u'2 ozinstant coffee', None), (None, u'1 fifth vodka', None)]
directions: Mix 3 cups water with 4 cups sugar, bring to boil and boil for 20 minutes. Set aside, add 1 whole vanilla bean split. Let mixture cool. Add 2 oz instant coffee to 1 cup boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Set aside and cool. When above are cool (important) put into a half gallon container and add the vodka. Let age for at least 3 weeks.

name: Kahlua Coffee #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'water', 'cups'), (None, u'5 tspinstant coffee', None), (u'2 1/2', u'sugar', 'cups'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'cups'), (u'1', u'chocolate syrup', 'tbsp')]
directions: Boil water, add coffee and sugar and simmer for 20 min. Remove from heat and add chocolate. Allow to cool, then add the vodka (or don't cool if you want some of the alcohol to boil off).

name: La Vida Loca recipe
ingredients: [(u'3 - 4', u'Absolut\xae pepper vodka', 'oz'), (u'3 - 4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1 - 2', u'chili peppers', 'tsp')]
directions: Cut the chili into small pieces. Put one or two teaspoons of chopped chili in the glass. Fill the glass with ice (not all the way up, gotta save some space for the vodka). Mix the ice and chili well. Pour vodka and pineapple juice in the glass, mix again. Serve with a straw.

name: La Tigre recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'whiskey', 'oz'), (u'4', u'apricot juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Kool-Aid\xae Cherry mix', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sugar', 'cup')]
directions: Mix into a glass and drink.

name: La Tamarinda recipe
ingredients: [(u'7', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'water', 'quart'), (None, u'12 fresh tamarinds', None)]
directions: Make sun tea with the tamarinds, squishing them before putting them into the water. Add the tequila. Add ice if you have some. Serve in cups.

name: La Stephanique recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'bitters', 'dash')]
directions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: La Pussy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Bacardi\xae white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'3', u'DeKuyper\xae Apple Barrel schnapps', 'dashes')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: La Rosa recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Ocean Spray\xae Cranberry Juice Cocktail', 'oz'), (None, u'1 squeezefresh lime juice', None)]
directions: Pour the Scotch whisky, Chambord raspberry liqueur and Ocean Spray cranberry juice cocktail into a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add a small squeeze of fresh lime juice and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: La Paz recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'rosso vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'tsp'), (None, u'2 ozchilled cola', None)]
directions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: La Mamila recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 liter tequila', None), (None, u'5 cans Caguamas Tecate\xae beer', None), (None, u'4  lemons', None), (u'32', u'clamato juice', 'oz'), (None, u'2 squirts Tabasco\xae sauce', None), (None, u'2 pinches salt', None)]
directions: Empty the beers into a large container, add the lemons, tabasco and the salt, and mix in. Add the tequila and clamato, then swirl.

name: La Panthere Rose recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Champagne', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'strawberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Dry Orange Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add champagne, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: La Jolla recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'creme de bananes', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'oz')]
directions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: La Mojita recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (None, u'5  raspberries', None), (u'4', u'club soda', 'oz'), (None, u'6 - 7  mint', None)]
directions: Tear up the mint leaves and add them to an old-fashioned glass containing the lime juice and sugar. Press the laves with the back of a spoon against the glass to release the aroma. Add vodka. Fill the glass with ice cubes and top off with club soda. Add the raspberries. Mix it with a spoon so that mint leaves and raspberries get distributed throughout the glass. Serve.

name: La Cucharacha recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Clasico silver tequila', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Smirnoff\xae Blue Label vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Mix all ingredients together in a small brandy glass or wine glass. Light drink on fire and drink as fast as possible through a straw! Caution...this is a very strong drink!

name: La Floridita Daiquiri recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'maraschino liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'sugar syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and pour unstrained into a frosted cocktail glass. Serve.

name: La Floridita Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'rosso vermouth', 'oz'), (u'2 - 3', u'white creme de cacao', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: La Charentaise recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Ricard\xae pastis', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orgeat syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'2 - 3 ozice cold, full fat milk', None)]
directions: Pour the anis liquor first in a chilled glass, on 2 ice cubes. Add the orgeat (almond) syrup, pouring from a height in order to mix better. Then pour the milk, also from a height. Do not stir.

name: La Carre recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'dry vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'Kummel\xae caraway liqueur', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Iced Mocha Fusion recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'milk', 'cup'), (u'1', u'vanilla extract', 'tsp'), (None, u'3 tbspgranulated sugar', None), (None, u'3 tbspmocha instant coffee', None), (None, u'1 cupcrushed ice', None)]
directions: In a blender or food processor, combine milk, vanilla, sugar, coffee powder and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

name: Iced Jim recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Jim Beam\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (None, u'12 ozcan Nestea\xae iced tea', None)]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a big highball glass, almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Iced Lemonade Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'10', u'tea', 'cups'), (u'3/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'6 ozfrozen lemonade', None)]
directions: Mix the sugar and lemonade together in a large bowl. Pour boiling tea over the top, let cool, and serve.

name: Iced Irish Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'8', u'milk', 'oz'), (u'1', u'water', 'oz'), (u'2', u'instant coffee', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 scoop chocolate ice cream', None)]
directions: Pour the water (about 1 oz./3 cL) into a cocktail shaker and add the instant coffee and some sugar (optional), then shake. When the coffee has dissolved, add milk and shake again. Pour into a cup and add Bailey's and a scoop of ice cream.

name: Iced Jack recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (None, u'6 oz(1/2 can) Nestea\xae iced tea', None)]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Iced Fritter recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'8', u'chocolate milk', 'oz')]
directions: Stir the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and chocolate milk together with 3 ice cubes in a highball or other tall glass. Serve.

name: Iced Comfort recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6', u'Nestea\xae iced tea', 'oz')]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Iced Coffee Fillip recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'tsp'), (None, u' chilled coffee', None)]
directions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

name: Iced Coffee a l'Orange recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'vanilla ice cream', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 tspinstant coffee', None), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz')]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Iced Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/4 cupinstant coffee', None), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1/4 cuphot water', None), (None, u'4 cupscold milk', None)]
directions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in a coffee mug.

name: Iced Captain recipe
ingredients: [(u'3 1/2', u'Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'12', u'Nestea\xae iced tea', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large highball glass and mix together. Serve.

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 shots Midori\xae melon liqueur', None), (None, u'2 shots banana liqueur', None), (None, u'1 scoop ice cream', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u' fill with pineapple juice', None), (None, u'1 shot Malibu\xae coconut rum', None)]
directions: Add ice-cream last. Enjoy!

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6 - 8', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Place all drinks into a glass and add ice-cream at the end.

name: Iceberg recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'peppermint schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with milk', None)]
directions: Pour ingredients over ice in a blender, blend, and pour into a frozen highball glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

name: Iceberg #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'light cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Layer the blue curacao on top, and the cream on top of that. Serve.

name: Iceball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'sambuca', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'2 - 3', u'cream', 'tsp')]
directions: Add ingredients and 3 oz. crushed ice to blender. Blend on medium speed for about 15 seconds, until smooth. Pour into glass.

name: Dark Side of the Force recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1.75 liters Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (None, u'24 cans lager', None), (None, u'4 cans Red Bull\xae energy drink', None), (None, u'4 cansfrozen lemonade', None), (None, u'  blackcurrant syrup', None)]
directions: Empty the 4 cans of frozen lemonade into a large container and pour in the Everclear, beer and Red Bull. Mix until all the lemonade has dissolved. Add blackcurrent syrup to taste (this will turn the mixture a dark purple colour). Serve on ice or chilled.

name: Ice-T recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot peach schnapps', None), (None, u'1 - 2 shots rum', None), (None, u'1/2 glass 7-Up\xae soda', None), (None, u' fill with cranberry juice', None)]
directions: Shake or stir. Serve with ice cubes.

name: Dark Side recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'coconut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae white rum', 'oz'), (None, u'  chocolate syrup', None)]
directions: Combine the coconut liqueur and Bacardi white rum in a shot glass, stirring to mix. Add just enough syrup to dissolve in it. The syrup should make the drink creamy but liquid enough to go down smoothly.

name: Dark Pussy recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/4 bottle beer', None), (u'1/3', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'16 2/3', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'16 2/3', u'milk', 'oz'), (u'8 1/3', u'tonic water', 'oz'), (u'1', u'chocolate ice cream', 'qt')]
directions: Mix well with blender.

name: Dark Pike recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Banker's Club\xae vodka", 'oz'), (None, u"  Hershey's\xae chocolate syrup", None), (None, u'3 ozwhole milk', None)]
directions: Pour vodka into the milk. Add chocolate flavoring as desired, and serve.

name: Dark Mark recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Mountain Dew\xae Pitch Black II', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Smirnoff\xae vodka', 'oz')]
directions:
Combine equal amounts of both ingredients. Serve cold to very cold in wine glass or similar "elegant" presentation. ,
NOTE: Mountain Dew Pitch Black original OR sour (type II) may be used, but sour/II gives a better effect.

name: Dark Nightmare recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'milk', 'oz')]
directions: Mix milk last. Stir. Enjoy.

name: Dark Lord recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Black Haus\xae blackberry schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Mix all ingredients with ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

name: Dark Horse recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'25 ml rum', None), (None, u'25 ml Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'5 ml rosso vermouth', None), (u'1', u'lemons', 'dash'), (None, u'  Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Pour the rum, Kahlua, vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca-cola. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Dark Lagoon recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'  pineapple wine', None)]
directions: Pour the blue curacao and grenadine into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple-flavored wine, to taste, and stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: Dark Fuzzy Navel recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with orange juice', None), (None, u' top with blackberry brandy', None)]
directions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

name: Dark Indulgence recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz'), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Blend all ingredients. Pour into poco grande glass.

name: Dark Eyes recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'blackberry brandy', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into snifter.

name: Dark Destroyer recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dark Blood recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Sour Puss\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cranberry soda', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Absmeister recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2 1/4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'2 1/4', u'grape juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour in equal parts of the absinthe and jagermeister to a highball glass filled with some ice. Fill with grape and cranberry juice.

name: Absinthe Without Leave recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'black sambuca', 'oz')]
directions: Layer ingredients carefully into a shot glass. Put Absinthe first, followed by Sambuca and then Bailey's. If done properly each will remain separate, forming an attractive green-based beverage.

name: Absinthtini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'splash'), (u'1', u'extra dry vermouth', 'splash')]
directions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Absinthe Suissesse recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Deva\xae absinthe', 'oz'), (None, u'2 - 3 drops anisette', None), (None, u'2 - 3 drops orange flower water', None), (u'1', u'white creme de menthe', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  egg', None)]
directions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Absinthe Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Use two separate glasses at first. Add 7-up to one, absinthe to the other. Light absinthe on fire, wait for 5 seconds, then pour it into 7-up glass. Be extremely careful while pouring! Set absinthe cup upside down with a straw underneath the edge and inhale through the straw. Then take the shot.

name: Absinthe Minded Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Bombay Sapphire\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Mari Mayans\xae absinthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  dry vermouth', None), (None, u'1  orange', None)]
directions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Absinthe Paralysis recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'lemon-lime soda', 'oz'), (u'3', u'milk', 'oz'), (u'2', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice in a collins glass.

name: Absinthe Olde-style recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Absente\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'granulated sugar', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1/2 tspliquid wormwood extract', None)]
directions: Pour the Absente liqueur (legal to import), granulated sugar, and 20 drops (approx 1/2 tsp) liquid wormwood extract (available from many health food stores -- Herb Pharm is a good choice) into a shaker with ice. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Absinthe Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

name: Absinthe Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'2', u'water', 'oz'), (None, u' Fresh lemons', None)]
directions: Combine all liquids in cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a margarita glass.  Garnish with lemon slices.

name: Absinthe Liqueur (Original) recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'750 ml Bacardi\xae 151 rum', None), (None, u'2 ozdried chopped wormwood', None), (u'1', u'angelica root', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'Hyssop', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'coriander', 'tsp'), (u'1/4', u'caraway', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 pinch cardamom', None), (None, u'1 pinch anise', None)]
directions:
Crush all ingredients in mortar and peste (or in a plastic bag with a rolling pin if you dont have one) except the Wormwood, Angelica root and Hyssop.  Put all ingredients into the bacardi 151 (you will need to put it all into a larger bottle so it fits) and let it sit (still in a cool dark place) for 4-7 days.  Strain out into a bottle and enjoy.,
Letting it sit for 4 days will do the trick, 7 days will make it slightly more potent but it will be much more bitter.  Using a weaker alcohol will work but it will turn brown instead of the usual green colour.

name: Absinthe Liqueur #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle vodka', None), (None, u'50 g sugar', None), (None, u'50 ml anise extract', None), (None, u'1 tbspchopped licorice', None), (None, u'1 twig wormwood', None)]
directions: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

name: Absinthe Flip recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Deva\xae absinthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  egg', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'  nutmeg', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Absinthe Liqueur recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 pint vodka', None), (None, u'2 tspcrumbled wormwood', None), (None, u'2 tspcrumbled anise', None), (u'1/2', u'fennel', 'tsp'), (None, u'4  cardamom', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground coriander', None), (None, u'2 tspchopped angelica root', None)]
directions: Steep wormwood in vodka for 48 hours. Remove, add the rest and steep for one week. Age.

name: Absinthe Daze recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'6 - 8', u'pink lemonade', 'oz')]
directions:
Just pour yourself 1.5 oz of Absinthe and mix in 6-8oz of Pink Lemonade.,
Stir up well and add some ice cubes.. ,
Add some grenadine syrup if you need it sweeter, or even some simple syrup.,
Makes a good valentines day drink.. nice Rosy red (green absinthe will cloud up white when water is added)

name: Absinthe Czech Ritual recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'brown sugar', 'tsp'), (u'2 - 4', u'water', 'oz')]
directions: Pour 3/4 of a full shot of absinthe in a sundae glass. put a brown sugar cube on a spoon with holes in it and rest it on the rim of the sundae glass. Pour the remaining 1/4 of the shot of absinthe onto the brown sugar cube, light the brown sugar on fire (put the flame under the spoon). Let the flame burn for a minute while the brown sugar drips into the glass and caramelizes. stir the caramelized sugar into the glass. Add the water to the glass, stir again. and serve.

name: Absinthe Drip recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 - 2', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Add absinthe and one large cube of ice to an old-fashioned glass. Place an absinthe spoon across the top of the glass with the sugar on it, and pour drops of water onto the spoon. The water will drop through the holes in the absinthe spoon.

name: El Negro recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (None, u'1/3 oz100 proof Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', None), (u'1/3', u'Captain Morgan\xae spiced rum', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum into a shot glass. Add the Southern Comfort and Captain Morgan spiced rum; the mixture should turn dark and obtain a fire smell. Serve; beware the delayed hard-hitting bite.

name: El Mahon recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Snapple\xae Lemonade soda', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: El Grito recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'70 cl gold tequila', None), (None, u'70 cl strawberry puree', None), (None, u'10 - 15 cl sugar syrup', None), (None, u'6 washed, sliced strawberries', None)]
directions: Add ingredients to a punch bowl with sufficient crushed ice to slush. Serve in wine glasses.

name: El Jefe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'white tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Amaretto Di Saronno\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

directions: Shake everything with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

name: El Diablo recipe

directions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: El Diego recipe

directions: Blend Tequila, Tamarind and Fresh Lime juice with the ice. Rim the highball glass with salt and chile piquin mixture. Garnish with Tamarind seed.

name: El Cid recipe
