directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: El Condor Pasa recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Peruvian Pisco brandy', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'5', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Tropicana\xae orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae grenadine syrup", 'splash'), (None, u'1  lime', None)]
directions: Add ingredients in the order given with the exception of the grenadine. Stir well. Add a splash of grenadine creating the illusion of a sunset; add lime wedge for garnish.

name: El Chupacabras recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Patron\xae silver tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Agavero\xae tequila liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'splash'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'splash'), (u'1/2', u'mango juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Dr. Pepper vanilla soda', 'splash'), (None, u'1 drop Tapatio\xae hot sauce', None)]
directions: Pour the mango juice and Dr. Pepper Vanilla to a cocktail glass. In two seperate mixing glasses, mix the Patron tequila with the lime juice, and the Agavero tequila with the lemon juice. Pour both into the cocktail glass. Top with Tapatio, and serve.

name: El Chupacabra recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'apple vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (None, u'2  maraschino cherries', None), (None, u'4  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Mix vodka, sour mix, and ice in shaker. Strain over ice in old fashioned glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: El Borak recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'apple schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'apple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: El Caribe (Caribbean Martini) recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Bacardi\xae Limon rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum, Cointreau, and blue Curacao in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: El Blanco Gato Chocolate recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/4', u'coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'chocolate syrup', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour 1/2 oz. of Kahlua, 1/4 oz. of coconut rum and a long strain of chocolate syrup to a mixing tin. Apply a small amount of whipped cream into tin, shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Felicia recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'apple vodka', 'oz'), (u'3', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Felching Banana recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'banana liqueur', 'splash'), (u'1', u'creme de cacao', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients into warmed old fashioned glass or shooter and drink through a straw.

name: Feiry Fairy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'arak', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Fernet Branca\xae bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Mix ingredients in glass, light on fire, blow it out and enjoy.

name: Felcher recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'whipped cream', 'oz'), (u'1', u'chocolate', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour Drambuie into a shot glass. Add some chocolate sprinkles or shavings. Top with whipped cream and add more chocolate sprinkles or shavings.

name: Feelin' Lucky recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bacardi\xae Limon rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Feel This recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sloe gin', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with pineapple juice', None), (u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Fill glass with ice. Next add absolut, sloe gin, pineapple juice, southern comfort, and last midori. Add pineapple and cherry garnish.

name: Feel Like Holiday recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 cl vodka', None), (None, u'1 cl grenadine syrup', None), (None, u'10 cl Champagne', None)]
directions: Stir vodka and grenadine with ice. Pour into a champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

name: Feeler Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'1/4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'passion-fruit syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Blend everything together in a blender and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Feel The Burn recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'ouzo anise liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Wild Turkey\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz')]
directions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

name: Feed Bag recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'5', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake everything with except grenadine with ice; strain into a highball glass. Slowly pour the grenadine into the center of the drink, and garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Federal Law recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Kurant vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'tonic water', 'splash')]
directions: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add the Absolut Kurant vodka, Chambord raspbery liqueur, sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir well. Splash tonic water; stir again. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Federal Punch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'caster sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Fedbergs Favorite Caipirinha recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Havana Club\xae white rum', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lime', None), (None, u'1 1/2 tbspCane sugar', None)]
directions: Slice a lime into eight slices and put two into a glass. Pour the tablespoons of cane sugar over it, and mash these together - if you don't have a long shafted mortar, the end of a ladle can be used. Pour coarsely crushed ice-cubes to the brim of the glass, and fill it with the Havana Club white rum. Serve with medium sized straight straws. Vary the lime / cane sugar ratio according to personal taste.

name: Fedberg's Woodstock recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Plymouth\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Especial gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'3', u'blood-orange juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Faxe Kondi\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, stir and serve. Substitute the Faxe Kondi for Sprite if necessary.

name: Backdraft recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz')]
directions:
Pour equal amounts into Brandy Snifter and light.,
Place hands over top of glass to form airtight seal that extinguishes flame. Slide straw between fingers keeping seal as tight as possible. Drink beverage through straw.,
Remove straw after drink is finished. Put glass to nose and remove hand to allow burnt fumes to be inhaled through nose. Definitely a one-a-nighter.

name: Backdraft #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'151 proof rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Add the rum and amaretto to a wine glass, and ignite the liquid. Cover the wine glass with the palm of your hand. Lift your hand off of the rim just a little on one side. Suck out the fumes, without exhaling take the shot and then exhale.

name: Back Street Romeo recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'whiskey', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Back Street Banger recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Back Stage Pass recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'8', u'Rockstar\xae energy drink', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Dip rim of a collins glass in sugar then fill 1/2 way with crushed ice. Pour 1oz each Vodka,Rum,and Peach Snapps. Add 8oz of Rock Star Energy Drink. Top with 1 packet of sugar. Serve with a stir straw.

name: Harakiri Shot recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cl ouzo anise liqueur', None), (None, u'2 cl Tabasco\xae sauce', None)]
directions: Mix the ingredients in a shot glass and serve with a pint of beer on the side.

name: M&M recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'creme de cacao', 'oz')]
directions: Serve straight up in a shot glass.

name: O & Cranberry recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Bacardi\xae orange rum', 'oz'), (u'5', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1  orange', None)]
directions: Stir together in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: P & P recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Safari\xae liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: N'awlins Mudslide recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Praline New Orleans-style pecan liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Add ice to an old-fashioned glass and add all three ingredients. Swirl the glass to blend the colors. Prolonged sipping is suitable or drink it like a shot. Savor the flavor!

name: Jack and Dewanne recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'5', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass (more or less mountain dew, to taste), and serve.

name: Jack and Ginger recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'10', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: Fill glass with ice. Pour jack daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

name: Jack and Coke recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'10', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Pour jack daniels into large glass filled with ice. Pour coca-cola into the glass. Stir lightly.

name: Jack and Cherry Coke recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'10', u'Coca-Cola\xae Cherry Coke', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Jack Daniels into a large glass half-filled with ice. Pour cherry coke into the glass. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jack and Cherries recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (None, u'12 ozcan Coca-Cola\xae', None), (u'1 1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'maraschino cherry juice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1  maraschino cherry', None), (None, u'4 - 5  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Put the ice cubes into a tall glass, and add Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey. Stirring continuously, add the Coca-cola, grenadine, cherry juice, and top off with a cherry.

name: Jacardi recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz')]
directions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jack 'N' Berry Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"2 ozblackberry infused Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None), (None, u'8 fresh blackberries', None), (u'9', u'lemonade', 'oz'), (None, u'1 tbspfine sugar', None)]
directions:
Muddle the blackberries and sugar in the bottom of a pint glass.,
Add blackberry infused Jack Daniels and Ice. Fill with lemonade.,
Shake 2-3 times. Enjoy

name: Jabroni Driver Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'root beer schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Add the Cognac brandy and rootbeer schnapps to a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Jacana recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'3/4 ozfresh lime juice', None), (None, u'1 ozfresh grapefruit juice', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: J.R.'s Wonderpunch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 3/4 liters Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (None, u'2 liters Sprite\xae soda', None), (u'1', u'Sunny Delight\xae California Style orange juice', 'gal'), (u'1', u'Minute Maid\xae fruit punch', 'gal'), (None, u'8 lb ice', None), (None, u'1/2 container Country Time\xae raspberry lemonade mix', None), (None, u'1.5 - 2.5 lb sugar', None)]
directions:
About 4 hours before punch is to be served, combine fruit of choice in a bowl with everclear. Stir. About 1 hour before punch is to be ready, add some Sunny Delight.,
When you are ready, put the fruit/everclear/SD mix into a large cooler and add rest of handle of Everclear. Then, add all of the ingredients and stir. ,
Variations on final taste can be added with the sugar and raspberry lemonade mix. Calculations make it roughly 1 complete shot of everclear per cup. Serve it up in those fancy red or blue solos.

name: J. R.'s Godfather recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavors.

name: J. R.'s Revenge recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes')]
directions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: J. R.'s Godchild recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'milk', 'oz')]
directions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the boubon, amaretto, and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: J. R.'s Dallas Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Belvedere\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Martini & Rossi\xae extra dry vermouth', 'splash'), (None, u' Reese Extra Large Green olives', None), (None, u' aged Roquefort cheese', None)]
directions: Splash the vermouth into chilled 10-oz martini glass, swirl and spill. Half-fill a cocktail shaker with cracked ice, add vodka and shake vigorously. Strain into glass. Garnish with several extra large green olives stuffed with aged Roquefort cheese, one will not be enough.

name: J-Unit's Wookie Surprise recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (None, u'1/2 bottle watermelon vodka', None), (None, u'1 pint sherbet', None), (None, u'1 liter Sprite\xae soda', None)]
directions: Mix everything together in a big bowl. Then fit as many people around the bowl with straws as possible, and drink as fast as possible.

name: J-Lu recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Dooley's Original Toffee & Vodka", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Tequila Rose\xae strawberry cream liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', 'dash')]
directions: Pour just under half a shot glass full of Dooleys, then add Tequila Rose, leaving enough room to add a dash of Tia Maria. Serve.

name: J-Pop Idol recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Alize\xae Bleu liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Gekkaikan sake', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Sunny Delight\xae orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Alize Bleu liqueur down the side of an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Allow it to sit before adding the Gekkaikan sake. Add Sunny Delight orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Kahlua Coffee #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'water', 'cups'), (u'4', u'sugar', 'cups'), (None, u'2 ozinstant coffee', None), (None, u'1  vanilla', None), (None, u'1 fifth bourbon whiskey', None)]
directions: Simmer water, sugar, and coffee until the sugar dissolves. Put vanilla bean and bourbon in a gallon jug and add the coffee syrup you just prepared. Cover and let sit for a month.

name: Kahlua Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'water', 'qt'), (u'3', u'sugar', 'cups'), (None, u'4 tbspinstant coffee', None), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tbsp')]
directions: Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. Let cool and add vanilla and either a pint or fifth of vodka. Drink and enjoy.

name: J face recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Kahlua in first followed by the Frangelico then lastly the Malibu.

name: Kahlua Cobweb recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Bundaberg\xae dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 scoop ice cream', None), (u'5', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Add the ice cream to a highball glass. Pour the Bundaberg rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur. Top with coke, and serve.

name: Kahlua Butterball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  butterscotch schnapps', None), (None, u'  milk', None)]
directions: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add butterscotch schnapps, to taste, and fill with milk. Serve.

name: Kahlua Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'1 shot peppermint schnapps', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u' fill with milk', None)]
directions: Mix all of the ingredients well. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua and Cream recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (u'1', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour kahlua into a glass over ice. Add cream and shake.

name: Kahlodster recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u'1 shot Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None)]
directions: Pour each shot into a cup filled with ice cubes. Shake three times and serve.

name: Kahlua and Iced Cream recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 scoops chocolate ice cream', None), (None, u'2 shots milk', None), (u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Mix in a blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then add the kahlua. Blend until smooth.

name: Kabuki recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'sake rice wine', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a salt-rimmed old-fashioned glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: KahBula recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'splash')]
directions: Layer tequila over bailey's over kahlua.

name: Kab-z Vanilla recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Bacardi\xae Vanil rum', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Pepsi\xae Vanilla cola', 'oz'), (None, u'1 drop lime juice', None), (None, u'2 drops lemon juice', None)]
directions: Pour the Bacardi Vanil rum into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add the Pepsi vanilla cola and lime juice. Stir well. Add the lemon juice, and serve.

name: Kaali's Envy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Continental\xae vanilla liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'5 - 6  pineapple', None)]
directions: In a cocktail shaker add pinepple pieces and muddle. Create as much juice as possible. Then add ice, midori, tequila and vanilla liqueur. Shake vigorously. Pour into hurricane glass and serve with a long teaspoon, straw and garnish with a piece of pineapple.

name: K-V-S Kaboom recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle Bacardi\xae 151 rum', None), (None, u"1 bottle Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None), (None, u'1 bottle Absolut\xae Kurant vodka', None), (None, u'1 bottle Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'gal'), (None, u'  fruit', None), (None, u'3 bags ice', None)]
directions: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl or ice chest. Slice fruit and add into mixture. More cranberry juice may be added if you are a bunch of light-weights. Stir vigorously with a paddle.

name: Ka-boom recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'4', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'limes', 'oz')]
directions: Mix lime, banana liqueur, and rum in glass. Add pineapple juice and stir. Add ice to fill glass. Add grenadine last and do not stir. Garnish with slice of lime and a cherry.

name: K.G.B. #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/3 shot Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'1/3 shot Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u"1/3 shot Bailey's\xae Irish cream", None)]
directions: Layer/float the ingredients in a shot glass. Make sure galliano is on top.

name: K.G.B. recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kummel\xae caraway liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'apricot brandy', 'tsp'), (u'1/4', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 twist lemon', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: K-Town Cherry Cola recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'3', u'cola', 'oz')]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Cover and shake; serve immediately.

name: K-Snap recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'2 - 3', u'lemon iced tea', 'oz')]
directions: Stir both ingredients together in a cocktail glass with/without shaven ice, as desired, and serve.

name: K-Dawg's Apple Pie recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with apple juice', None), (u'1', u'cinnamon schnapps', 'tbsp')]
directions: Pour the amaretto into a cup. Add a tablespoon of cinnamon schnapps, and fill with apple juice. Stir and serve warm.

name: K-Hole recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Belvedere\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Especial gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour Goldschlager, Jagermeister, Tequila and Vodka into double shot glass.

name: La Cafe recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Stoli\xae Kafya vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Marie Brizard\xae Chocolat Royal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'half-and-half', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'sugar syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: La Brea Tar Pit recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'clam juice', 'splash')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or lowball glass, and serve.

name: La Bomba Negra recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Mount Gay\xae Barbados rum', 'oz'), (None, u'1 small lime', None), (u'1', u'brown sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour the rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cubed or cracked ice. Add the sugar, and squeeze in the juice from the lime. Shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: La Bomba recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'grenadine syrup', 'dashes')]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except grenadine) with ice 3 times. Pour into sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add grenadine and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: La Belle Quebec recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'superfine sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: La Bella Blu'z recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Smirnoff\xae apple vodka', 'parts'), (u'2', u'Stolichnaya\xae vanilla vodka', 'parts'), (u'2', u'triple sec', 'parts'), (u'2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'parts'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'part')]
directions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Green Apple slice & Enjoy

name: L.S.E. recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'Stoli\xae Razberi vodka', 'cups'), (u'8', u'Chaser\xae 5-Hour energy drink', 'oz'), (None, u'1 package(large) lime jell-o', None), (u'2', u'water', 'cups')]
directions: Make the jello with 2 cups of boiling water. Mix in the 5 Hour energy drink and raspberry Stoli. Put in plastic shot cups and let sit overnight in the refrigerator.

name: L.I.E. recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'splash'), (u'2 - 3', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all liquors into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a small splash of orange juice, top with Coca-cola (or equivalent), and serve.

name: La Bang-Bang recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u"Grey Goose\xae L'Orange vodka", 'oz'), (None, u'3  lemon', None), (None, u'3  lime', None), (None, u'1  orange', None), (u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: Muddle lime and lemon wedges with orange wheel in bottom of collins or tall glass. Fill glass with ice, then pour Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka over ice and muddled fruit. Add the ginger ale followed by grenadine and stir. Serve.

name: L.A.P.D. Nightshift recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'part'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'tequila', 'part')]
directions: Layer into a shot glass.

name: L.A. Water recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'white tequila', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'splash'), (u'1 1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients in equal parts to a tall glass with some ice. Stir and serve.

name: L.A. Sunset recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple rum', 'oz'), (u'0.15', u'Amaretto Di Saronno\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'3 1/2 ozfull pulp orange juice', None)]
directions:
Add the Jagermeister, amaretto, triple sec, pineapple rum, and the Di Saronno (0.15 oz is an estimate, just use a small amount, mainly for color) to a collins glass. Swirl the ingredients together until mixed. Fill the remaining volume of the glass with pineapple juice and full pulp orange juice poured in the center of the glass. ,
If poured correctly the ingredients should mix so that the drink has an overall yellow/orangeish-brown color with the brown occupying the lower three-quarters of the collins glass. No extra mixing should be necessary. The pulp of the Orange Juice should swirl in the brown region of the drink giving it an overall "smoggy" appearance, not unlike a Los Angeles Sunset.

name: L.A. Sunrise recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'creme de bananes', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'rum', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka, creme de bananes, orange juice and pineapple juice into a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Float rum on top. Garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry, and serve.

name: L'aird Of Summer Isle recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: L'Aunisien recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Champagne', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Campari\xae bitters', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Pineau des Charentes\xae white wine', 'oz')]
directions: Serve in a champagne flute.

name: L.A. Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'superfine sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  egg', None)]
directions: Combine the whiskey, vermouth, lemon juice, sugar and egg in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Ice-Cream Flip recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'maraschino liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None), (None, u'1 whole egg', None), (None, u'  nutmeg', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Ice Pick #2 recipe
directions: In a large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

name: Ice Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'milk', 'oz')]
directions: Chill the ingredients, then mix in a highball glass and sprinkle some ground cinnamon on top if desired.

name: Ice Storm recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'151 proof rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'strawberry schnapps', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2  banana', None), (None, u'5  strawberries', None), (u'2', u'crushed ice', 'cups'), (None, u'3 scoops vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Take all the ingredients and place them in a blender. Pour into two 16 oz. glasses and relax.

name: Ice Palace recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice orange', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

name: Ice Pick recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'6', u'iced tea', 'oz'), (None, u'  lemon juice', None)]
directions: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

name: Ice House Highball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'5 ozfresh lemonade', None), (u'1', u'white creme de menthe', 'dash')]
directions: Build the vodka and lemonade in a large pint glass filled with ice, and top with a dash of creme de menthe. Garnish with an edible orchid flower.

name: Ice Cream Hogarth recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'4', u'vanilla ice cream', 'oz'), (u'3', u'maple syrup', 'tbsp')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a blend, and blend well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Ice Crystals recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lemon vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'green creme de menthe', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a shaker half full with ice cubes. Pour all ingredients into shaker and shake well. Strain drink into a Cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ice Cream Schnapps recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Coca-Cola\xae Vanilla Coke', 'cup'), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Scoop ice cream into glass, pour butterscotch schnapps and coke over top ice cream.

name: Ice Cream Genius recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'orange juice', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'vanilla ice cream', 'cup')]
directions: Blend all ingredients together in a blender.

name: Ice Cream Float recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vanilla schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream', 'oz'), (u'6', u'soda', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vanilla schnapps, fill glass with favorite soda (anything you would put on ice cream...root beer, dr. pepper, orange) leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Fill with cream.. not milk. Serve.

name: Ice Cream Flip recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'maraschino liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (None, u'1 pinch nutmeg', None), (None, u'1  egg', None), (None, u'1 scoop vanilla ice cream', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients (all except nutmeg) in a shaker with ice and strain into coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Ice Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'6 ozcold coffee', None)]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, and serve.

name: Ice Chest Lemonade recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'15 - 20  limes', None), (None, u'15 - 20  lemons', None), (None, u'5 lb sugar', None), (u'1', u'lemonade', 'qt'), (None, u'20 lb ice', None), (None, u'  vodka', None)]
directions: Microwave the limes and lemons for about 10 - 15 seconds in order to release the juice. Cut in half. Pour the ice into an ice chest. Add lemonade or limeade, sugar and squeeze in the juice from all the lemons and limes. Add vodka to taste. Grab the handles and shake.

name: Dark and Veiny recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/4', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Irish cream', 'oz')]
directions: Layer in order; butterscotch first, irish cream, jagermeister, vodka into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Ice Cappuccino recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'espresso', 'oz'), (None, u'1 tbspinstant coffee', None), (u'2', u'milk', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vanilla syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'caramel syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into a poco grande glass.

name: Ice Breaker #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'3 - 4', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Pernod and creme de menthe into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice and fill with lemonade; stir. Garnish with a sprig of mint (optional), and serve.

name: Dark and Stormy #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Gosling's\xae Black Seal rum", 'oz'), (None, u'1 bottle ginger beer', None), (None, u'1 slice lime', None)]
directions: Pour rum into a tall glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Serve.

name: Dark 'n Stormy recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Gosling's\xae Black Seal rum", 'oz'), (u'4', u'ginger beer', 'oz')]
directions: Mix ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice, and serve.

name: Dark and Stormy recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Gosling's\xae Black Seal rum", 'oz'), (u'8', u'ginger beer', 'oz')]
directions:
Pour rum over ice, add ginger ale, and stir.,
NOTE: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum.

name: Dark and Stormy #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u"Gosling's\xae Black Seal rum", 'oz'), (u'5', u"Barrett's\xae Ginger Beer", 'oz'), (None, u'1 squeezefresh limes', None), (None, u'1 pinchfresh nutmeg', None)]
directions:
Fill pre-chill a tall glass by filling with ice and water. Let sit for a moment.,
Toss out water and ice, fill with fresh ice.  ,
To this add 2 oz's of Gosling's Black Seal Rum.  ,
To this top with Barretts Ginger Beer. Ginger ale will not work. For this drink to succeed, use a strong, almost bitter ginger beer.,
Squeeze 1/4 lime into the libation.,
Top with freshly grated nutmeg.  Do not use powdered nutmeg.,
Stir with a slice of fresh ginger and serve.,
Prepare more glasses ...seconds and thirds may be ordered if it's a hot day.

name: Daring Dylan recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  crushed ice', None), (u'4', u'Mexican chocolate', 'oz')]
directions: Let the mexican hot chocolate cool to room temperature. Pour all of the ingredients into an irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Darien Librarian recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'whiskey', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cola', 'oz'), (u'2', u'ginger ale', 'oz')]
directions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Darb Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daredevil recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with 1/2 orange juice', None), (None, u' fill with 1/4 cranberry juice', None), (None, u' fill with 1/4 pineapple juice', None), (u'1/2', u"Myer's\xae dark rum", 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splash')]
directions: Pour ingredients as listed into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Daphrine Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2 - 4', u'lemon soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the vodka, curacao and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda, to taste, and serve.

name: Dante's Inferno recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Stoli\xae Strasberi vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Marie Brizard\xae watermelon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'splashes'), (None, u'2 - 3 squirts chocolate syrup', None)]
directions: Take a martini glass and rim with sugar. Then, draw a pentagram in the glass with the chocolate syrup. Combine the liquor and one splash of 7up over ice and shake. Pour carefully into the very center of the martini glass to not upset the syrup design. When finished, add another splash of 7up for effervescence. Garnish with a chocolate covered strawberry and serve.

name: Danny's Favorite recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (None, u'2 oz100 proof DeKuyper\xae peppermint schnapps', None)]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a short glass, and shoot.

name: Danny's Special recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'3', u'lemon juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Danny's Delight recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Tullamore Dew\xae Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Stone's\xae ginger wine", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dash'), (u'2', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Wash an old-fashioned glass with bitters and ice. Discard excess. Add vermouth, whiskey and wine. Top with lemonade, to taste, and serve.

name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Deva\xae absinthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Curacao orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 slice orange', None)]
directions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Absinthe Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Deva\xae absinthe', 'oz'), (u'3', u'benedictine herbal liqueur', 'dashes'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'water', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Absinthe Celestial Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (None, u' boiling water', None), (None, u'1 squirt lemon juice', None), (None, u'1  cinnamon', None), (None, u'  honey', None)]
directions: Pour the absinthe into the coffee mug. Add the cranberry juice and fill the mug up most of the rest of the way with the hot water. Add lemon juice and honey to taste (be prepared to use a lot of honey). Break the cinnamon stick in half and leave it in the mug to soak as you drink it.

name: Absinthe Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot absinthe herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'2/3 can Red Bull\xae energy drink', None)]
directions:
The same as a Jagerbomb but alot more dangerous.,
Poor redbull into tall glass and the Absinthe into a shot glass.,
When ready to drink, drop the absinthe shot into the redbull and throw it down!

name: Abrupt Realization recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'black sambuca', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

name: Absent Friend recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 msr gin', None), (None, u'1/3 msr grenadine syrup', None), (None, u'1/3 msr whipping cream', None), (None, u'1/2 msr egg', None)]
directions: Shake well and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Absinth Sour recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absinth\xae absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 ozclear water', None), (u'1', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients together and strain over ice into a old fashioned/rock glass. Garnish with lemon and anis star.

name: Abracadabra recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'mandarin juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'caster sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Abortion recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Pour the creme de cacao into a shot glass. Layer the amaretto and then the bailey's to create a 3 layer drink. Insert a toothpick to the bottom of the shot glass and dribble some grenadine so it floats in the bottom of the glass.

name: Abortion #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Layer into a shot glass in the following order: peach schnapps, irish cream, grenadine. Don't swish, just shoot. As described above, the coagulating of the irish cream combined with the grenadine creates an effect which gives rise to the name Abortion.

name: Abilene recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'peach nectar', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Abigail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'dashes'), (u'2', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'orange bitters', 'dash'), (None, u'1  lemon', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Aberfoyle recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz')]
directions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Aberdeen Angus recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1', u'honey', 'tbsp'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'tbsp')]
directions: Stir all but the drambuie into a coffee mug. Warm the drambuie, ignite it and pour the burning liqueur into the mug. Stir rapidly and drink.

name: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'parts'), (u'2', u'banana liqueur', 'parts'), (u'2', u'Godiva\xae chocolate liqueur', 'parts'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'part')]
directions: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

name: Abelito recipe
ingredients: [(u'5', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'5', u'club soda', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'splash'), (None, u'1 splashsweetened lime juice', None)]
directions: Combine equal parts of vodka and club soda in a highball glass. Add a splash of lime juice and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: El Bano recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'2', u'tonic water', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the tequila and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and top with tonic water. Stir briefly. Garnish with half of a Twix chocolate bar.

name: El Bastardo recipe
ingredients: [(u'5', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (u'4', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz'), (u'4', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'tbsp')]
directions:
Mix all at the same time into a blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds, fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. ,
Oh, it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes, but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream, put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.

name: Eight Seconds recipe

directions: Put 1 part of each ingredient into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake very well and strain into shot glasses.

name: Ekatherina Andreevna recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stolichnaya\xae vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'part'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'parts')]
directions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

name: ABC Pousse Cafe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into a pousse-cafe or cordial glass, in order; amaretto, bailey's irish cream, and cointreau.

name: Ejhazz recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Dole\xae orchard peach juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 - 3 drops vanilla', None), (None, u'  ice', None)]
directions: Add vodka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.

name: Egril recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Irish Mist\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2  lime', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Cut a lime into eight seperate segments and place into an old-fashioned glass. Add sugar and crush until the juice is released. Add remaining ingredients, ensure sugar has dissolved, and fill with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Add a short straw, and serve.

name: Ego's Tang recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Sailor Jerry\xae spiced navy rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Peachtree schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'splash'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'splash')]
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Eggnotini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'eggnog', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'nutmeg', 'dash')]
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker 1/2 full with ice, add ingredients, shake, shake, shake until cold and frothy. Pour into a well chilled martini / cocktail glass. Top with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Egghead recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1  egg', None)]
directions: Add ingredients with 4 ice cubes to blender. Blend well, pour into glass with ice.

name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6  eggs', None), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'salt', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'milk', 'qt'), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tsp')]
directions: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

name: Egg Nog Captain Morgan recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'4', u'eggnog', 'oz'), (None, u'1 pinch nutmeg', None)]
directions: Pour rum into a small highball glass, and add egg nog. Stir together, top with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Eggnog - Kentucky Style recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 qtwhipped heavy cream', None), (None, u'6  eggs', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'cups')]
directions: Separate eggs. Beat yolks, add sugar. Add bourbon slowly while beating. Beat egg whites until stiff. Fold whites into egg yolk mixture, then fold whipped cream into mixture. Refrigerate for more than 4 days. Stir frequently to avoid separation. Color will change to a pale Serve w/nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Eggnog - Spiked recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'12  eggs', None), (None, u'3 pints heavy cream', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'nutmeg', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'cup'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'salt', 'tsp')]
directions: Separate the eggs. In an electric mixer, beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac, while beating at slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff, or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream into the yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve, sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Egg Sour recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Dry Orange Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2  egg', None)]
directions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral, and serve.

name: Egg Nog - Katie's recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'12 seperated eggs', None), (u'2', u'milk', 'qt'), (u'1 1/2', u'powdered sugar', 'cups'), (u'1', u'half-and-half', 'qt'), (None, u'1 pint rye whiskey', None), (None, u'1 pint heavy cream', None), (None, u'1/3 pint rum', None), (None, u'1/4 pint peach liqueur', None)]
directions: Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon yellow, then beat in 1 cup sugar. Add slowly the rye, rum and peach liquer. Beat until smooth. Add the milk and half-and-half. Beat the egg whites until stiff but not dry, gradually adding 1/2 cup of confectioners sugar. Fold the egg whites into the batter. Just before serving, whip the cream and fold it into the other ingredients. Garnish with ground nutmeg. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl.

name: Egg Nog - Williamsburg recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6  eggs', None), (u'1/2', u'rum', 'cup'), (u'2', u'heavy cream', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'brandy', 'cup'), (u'1', u'milk', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'whisky', 'cup'), (u'3/4 - 1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'1', u'nutmeg', 'tbsp')]
directions: Separate the eggs (yolk and white) Set the white aside. Mix yolks well, gradually adding the cream, milk, and sugar. Get back to the egg white - WHIP IT (whip it good!) until "soft peaks" form. Fold the white into the rest. Gradually add the alcohol. Either add nutmeg right away, or sprinkle on top later. AGE for at least 2 hours in refridgerator, uncovered.

name: Egg Nog - Kahlua recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'eggnog', 'oz'), (None, u'  nutmeg', None)]
directions: Mix kahlua with eggnog in a wine glass and then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Fearless Redneck recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 - 3 ozchilled Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey', None), (None, u'16 ozchilled Sobe\xae No Fear energy drink', None)]
directions: Pour in above order into a large glass or cup.

name: Egg Nog - Healthy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'eggs', 'cup'), (u'3', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'3', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (None, u'  nutmeg', None), (None, u'13 ozskimmed condensed milk', None), (None, u'3/4 cupskimmed milk', None), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tsp')]
directions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

directions: Pour all ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, shake until completely cold then strain into several shot glasses. Make sure it's all equal parts based on how many people are taking it.

name: Fear the Flava recipe

directions: First add a good load of ice cubes to a punch bowl. Add the blackcurrant squash and then the Fanta, stir it. Then add the vodka and whiskey, stir it. Then add the cider and stir the punch. Finally add the beer and stir for the last time. Serve this punch in highball glasses out of the bowl.

directions: Pour gin, vodka, liqueur, tonic and pina colada into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Crack an egg and drop into shaker. Shake well and strongly. Garnish with two cherrys and a slice of lemon with puting it on the top of the egg foam so that it makes a happy face.

name: Caipirinha #2 recipe

directions: Cut the 1/4 lime into a few chunks. With the sugar, crush them against the bottom and sides of the glass with a spoon. Add a few ice cubes. Add two medium spoonfuls of crushed ice. Fill the glass to halfway with vodka. Fill the rest of the way with limeade. Stir well and serve with a straw.

directions: Cut the lime and crush it in a old-fashioned glass. Fill the glass with crushed iced (ice cubes can also be used). Pour the Licor Beirao into the glass and stir well. Note that no sugar is added.

The drink should taste almost exactly like Cool Aid if you've gotten it right.

directions: Blend everything with a cup of ice and pour into glasses. Add more ice for thicker consistency.

name: Egg Nog - Cooked recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'granulated sugar', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'vanilla', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (u'1/2', u'water', 'cup'), (u'1/8', u'nutmeg', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'lemon juice', 'tsp'), (u'1/8', u'salt', 'tsp'), (None, u'6  eggs', None), (u'3/4', u'heavy cream', 'cup'), (u'4', u'milk', 'cups'), (u'2', u'hazelnut liqueur', 'tbsp')]
directions: Here's an egg nog recipe using cooked eggs, so no one has to be paranoid about salmonella. Mix granulated sugar, 2 Tbl. of water, and lemon juice in a med. sized sauce pan. Let boil, cook 5 min, until it turns dark amber. Remove from heat, and slowly stir in remaining 1/4 c. of water. Beat eggs and milk together in a bowl. Stir into sugar mixture, cook over med.-low heat for about 10 to 12 minutes. (It should thicken enough to stick to spoon) Poor into a clean bowl (punch bowl or something), stir in vanilla, nutmeg and salt. Refigerate, covered, until cold. Before serving, beat together cream, liquer, adn 10x sugar, until soft peaks form. Pour chilled eggnog into a serving bowl, fold in whipped cream with a whisk.

name: A-Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Build this drink over ice and stir. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Egg Nog #5 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'12 seperated eggs', None), (None, u'3 pints heavy cream', None), (u'1', u'granulated sugar', 'cup'), (None, u' grated nutmeg', None), (u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'cup'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'salt', 'tsp')]
directions: In an electric mixer, beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac, while beating at a slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff, or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream intothe yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve, sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve in punch bowl. If desired, add one or two cups of milk to the yolk mixture for a thinner eggnog.

name: Egg Nog - Country Style recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Applejack\xae brandy', 'cup'), (u'2', u'sugar', 'cups'), (None, u'1 pintwhole milk', None), (None, u'1 pint heavy cream', None), (None, u'6  eggs', None)]
directions:
Mix eggs and sugar together until well blended. SLOWLY add brandy. (If added too fast, eggs will break) Add whole milk. Add 1/2 of the heavy cream. ,
In a seperate bowl whip the other 1/2 of the heavy cream until stiff. (soft peak stage will work as well) Fold whipped cream into mixture. ,
Chill and enjoy!

name: Egg Nog #4 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6  egg', None), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tsp'), (None, u' ground nutmeg', None), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'salt', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'milk', 'cups'), (u'1', u'whipping cream', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'light rum', 'cup'), (None, u'6  egg', None), (u'1/2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup')]
directions: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

name: Egg Nog #3 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6 large eggs', None), (None, u' freshly ground nutmeg', None), (u'1', u'powdered sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'750 ml dark rum', None), (u'4', u'whipping cream', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'cup')]
directions: Separate eggs and refrigerate the whites. Beat ylks until light in color. Gradually beat in sugar, then slowly beat in 1 cup of rum. Let stand covered for atleast 1 hr. Add rest of liquor, cream, and peack brandy, beating constantly. Refrigerate, covered, for 3 hours. Beat egg whites until stiff, fold in. Serve sprinkled with nutmeg. Serve in a punch bowl or another medium sized bowl.

name: Egg Nog #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6 seperated eggs', None), (u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1 pint heavy cream', None), (None, u'1 pint milk', None), (None, u'1 pint bourbon whiskey', None)]
directions: Separate 6 eggs. Beat yolks well. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Clean/degrease beaters and bowl. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Fold in yolks to whites. Gently stir in 1 pt heavy cream, 1 pt milk, 1 pt bourbon, and 1 oz rum. Serve as is or well chilled. Double recipe to fill a punch bowl.

name: Egg Crusher recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'eggnog', 'cup')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a large brandy snifter, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Egg Cream recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'chocolate syrup', 'tbsp'), (None, u'6 ozwhole milk', None), (u'6', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Mix syrup and milk in a tall glass. Add soda water, and serve with a straw.

name: Egg Nog recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'12  eggs', None), (None, u'3 pints heavy cream', None), (u'1', u'granulated sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'  nutmeg', None), (u'1', u'bourbon whiskey', 'cup'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'salt', 'tsp')]
directions: Beat yolks until light in color. Slowly add bourbon, cognac, while beating at slow speed. Chill 3 hrs. Add salt to whites, beat to peaks. Whip s cream until stiff. Fold whipped cream into yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. Serve with nutmeg sprinkled on top. For thinner mixture add 1 or 2 cups of milk. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl.

name: Eerie Witch's Brew recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'cranberry juice', 'cups'), (None, u'1 cupchopped, candied ginger', None), (None, u'3  oranges', None), (None, u'12 ozfrozen apple juice', None), (None, u'6 ozfrozen limeade', None), (u'2', u'grapes', 'cups'), (u'4', u'water', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'ginger ale', 'gal')]
directions:
Step 1.,
In a 1 to 2 quart pan, bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil, uncovered, about 2 minutes, set aside. ,
--,
Step 2.,
With a vegetable peeler, pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture (Step 1.). Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. ,
--,
Step 3.,
Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture (Step 2.), the 3 cups cranberry juice, apple concentrate, limeade, grapes and water. If made ahead, cover and chill up to 2 hours. ,
--,
Step 4.,
Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. ,
--,
Step 5.,
Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.

name: Eenytini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions:
Pour blue curacao, gin and 7-up/sprite into a shaker tin filled with ice, swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into a cocktail glass. Repeat this with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. ,
Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

name: EDO Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stolichnaya\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bols\xae Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

name: Edward's Purple Medicine recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Avalanche\xae peppermint schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Aftershock\xae Hot & Cool cinnamon schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Pour either ingredient into a shot glass first, then slowly pour in the other, mixing half and half. Admire the effects, then consume.

name: Fat Frog recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle Smirnoff\xae Ice', None), (None, u'1 bottle Bacardi Breezer\xae Orange', None), (None, u'1 bottle WKD\xae Original Vodka Blue', None)]
directions: Get 2 pint glasses, pour one half of Smirnoff Ice into one pint glass and the rest in the other glass, then do the same with the orange breezer, then followed by the Blue WKD. Mix, and the drink should turn green. Add ice as desired, and serve.

Add Amaretto and rum, fill with coke, and stir.,
Consume slowly, this drink packs a punch.

Using a swizzle stick, stir the ingredients together so that the rum, lime and mint layers through the drink. Top up with apple juice. Serve with a mint garnish.

directions: Hell, just pour it all together! your already smashed at the conference, party, or event and the open bar is nearing depletion thus you can't get your favorite drink mixed, so ask your bartender for a Gaudi Johann; they'll not necessarily know it so ask their name, then order a Gaudi "insert their name" telling them that's a drink made of anything that they can find, noting even an available "clean glass" may be in short supply at bar closing. This drink is also known as:  Gaudi Steve, Gaudi Matilda, Gaudi (insert bartender's name), Hodgepodge, Last Ass Kick'r, Maid-on-Spot, Spotting Maiden, and Barcelona Tony's Gaudi Surprise which was first mixed by Johann at the Casa Batllo house designed by Antonio Gaudi in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Happy Birthday Motherfucker recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Tanqueray\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Raspberry Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'rum', 'oz')]

name: Hangman's Blood recipe

Add all five shots to a pint glass.,
Top to desired level with stout beer, 5 oz is just about right.,
Fill to top of glass with champagne.,
Note:  No room for ice.  You don't need it if you chill most of the ingredients.  Highly suggested.

name: Eddie Metal's Black Cherry recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle Guinness\xae stout', None), (None, u'2 Sam Adams beer', None), (None, u'3-6  maraschino cherries', None)]
directions: This drink is made just like a Black & Tan however, the ratios are slightly different. This is my personal preference. I use a 34oz Beer mug, (a beer pilsner, pint, 12oz or 22oz mug may be used, but you need to keep the ratio the same). Fill a 34oz mug 2/3 full with Sam Adams Cherry Wheat. Using a spoon, or some other way of diffusing the Guinness, fill the mug the last 1/3 until full. Allow to separate. Serve and enjoy. If you want an extra little something, add approx. 5 Maraschino cherries after separation for an extra kick of cherry flavor as you near the end of the glass. When the beer is gone, you now have sweet, drunken cherries you can eat!

name: Ed-Mans Blues recipe

directions: Pour midori and rum over ice, and top off with sweet and sour mix.

name: Gator Juice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'gal'), (None, u'1 fifth raspberry schnapps', None), (None, u'1 fifth DeKuyper\xae Watermelon Pucker schnapps', None), (None, u'2 cans(large cans) fruits', None), (None, u'2 cansred Hawaiian Punch\xae', None)]
directions:
Drain fruit (if using canned fruit) or use fresh fruit if desired, and set juice aside. Place fruit in a bowl or container, add half of each bottle of alcohol, and allow to soak for as long as possible (overnight works best).,
The following day, or whenever ready, add the fruit juice you saved to the marinated fruit. Add hawaiian punch to strength of your liking, then add ice. Serve in punch cups or suitable glasses.

Top with Sprite (or you may substitute Mountain Dew).  Garnish with a lemon twist, using the pithy, bitter part of the peel to rub around the rim of the glass just before serving.

name: Hammer & Nail recipe

directions:
Mix ingredients in any old glass.  Drink.  Repeat several times.  Enjoy!,
The Crown is the Hammer.  The Seagrams 7 is the nail.  The cola is the board.  Congratulations!  You've just gotten schnookered!

name: Hamlet recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Campari\xae bitters', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Halloween Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  grape juice', None), (None, u'  soda', None), (None, u'  orange sherbet', None), (None, u'  lime sherbet', None)]
directions:
1. Use grape juice and a variety of carbonated soft drinks (club soda, ginger ale, lemon-lime, etc). Mix them in a punch bowl. ,
2. Take scoops of the orange and lime sherbet and float them in the punch. Let them melt a little, so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch. (There should still be "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops.),
Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

name: Hallenbeck Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3/4 literbottle Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (None, u'1.75 litersbottle vodka', None), (None, u'3 red Hawaiian Punch\xae', None), (None, u'4 liters Canada Dry\xae ginger ale', None), (None, u'1/2  rainbow sherbert', None)]
directions: Leave the rainbow sorbet in a fridge for a few hours to allow to melt and add to a 5-gallon sports cooler container (the kind that stand up and have a spout on the bottom). Add all other ingredients. Shake it up good before serving to a healthy amount of party guests.

directions: Combine with ice, strain, and serve in a hollowed-out pineapple.

name: Halle Berry recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'orange vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'raspberry vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'  Sprite\xae soda', None), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'splashes'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'splash'), (None, u' garnish with cherry', None)]
directions:
Halle Berry,
fill a hurricane or highball glass, (with ice), with the following,
¾ oz orange vodka,
¾ oz raspberry vodka,
mix: sprite leaving enough room for 2 splashes of,
cranberry, and 1 splash lime juice.,
garnish with a cherry and lime, ...and an umbrella if you have one.

directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, top off with tangerine juice. Pour in grenadine over a spoon like a tequila sunrise. Garnish as desired, and serve.

directions: Pour the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and vodka into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Layer the cappucino on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon; this should then sink to the bottom leaving a swirling marble effect. Serve.

directions:
Shake and strain into a collins glass filled ,
with broken ice. Add grenadine, garnish with fruit, and serve unstirred with a straw.

directions: Warm liquors in a heat-proof cup, stir in sugar, and add espresso. Stir again, top with cream, and serve.

directions: Place all ingredients in martini shaker in order. Shake with ice. Pour into martini glass and serve.

name: Cafe Kirsch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Kirschwasser\xae cherry brandy', 'oz'), (None, u'2 ozcold black coffee', None), (u'1', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'egg', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

directions: Combine ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and coconut shavings.

directions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top, and serve.

directions: Pour advocaat, rum and vodka into a shaker with ice. Shake well, pour over ice in a highball glass, and top with lemonade.

name: Dalton recipe

name: Dalloness recipe

directions: Combine Jagermeister, Red Bull and Crown Royal in a highball glass and throw it down shot-style.  Enjoy.

name: Dallas Stars recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'green creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Dali Lama recipe

directions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle the chocolate syrup into an old-fashioned glass, coating the edges and leaving a pool of chocolate in the base of the glass. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker through a strainer into the chocolate-lined glass, and serve.

name: Dale's Long Island Iced Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'simple syrup', 'oz'), (u'3 - 4', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Shake all the ingredients, except the cola, with ice and strain into a collins glass filled 3/4 with ice. Top with coke and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Dale's Bloody Mary recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dashes'), (u'4', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dashes'), (None, u'1 pinch salt', None), (None, u'1 pinch peppers', None), (u'1/4', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'tomato juice', 'oz')]
directions: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and roll back and forth to gently mix. Strain into a large goblet or pint glass over ice, and serve.

name: Dakota recipe

name: Daisy Dueller recipe

directions: Shake the tennessee whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill to taste with club soda. Garnish with fruit slices, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Natural recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4 - 1/2', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Liqueur recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4  limes', None), (u'3', u'light rum', 'cups'), (u'1 1/2', u'superfine sugar', 'cups')]
directions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the limes (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups of the rum. Close the jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until rum has absorbed the flavor. Remove the peel and add the sugar. Shake vigorously until the sugar dissolves and add remaining cup of rum. Close jar and store in a cool, dark place at least 1 month to age

name: Daiquiri Party Punch recipe
ingredients: [(u'26', u'gold rum', 'oz'), (u'12', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'2 cansfrozen limeade', None), (None, u'20 slices limes', None), (None, u'12 handfuls ice', None)]
directions: Thaw the two cans of limeade until they are liquid. In the party punch bowl, mix the limeade, rum, and cointreau. Slice in the fresh lime and muddle it with the punch. Throw in the ice and stir again. Taste and optionally dilute with ice water or soda water. Serves 4 serious cocktail drinkers or about a dozen pre-dinner guests.

name: Daiquiri Liberal recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Amer Picon\xae orange bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail #2 recipe

directions: Shake ingredients with shaved ice, strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

directions: Combine all ingredients in a goblet with a sugared rim. Hold up to light and swirl contemplatively.

name: A Piece of Ass recipe

directions: Pour liquors over ice in a glass. Fill with sour mix and serve.

name: A Night In Old Mandalay recipe

directions: Place the skittles, or other fruity chewy candy in the bottom of a shot glass then pour 7-up and vodka.

name: A Nap at Charlie's recipe

directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Garnish rim of glass with shredded coconut. Strain into glass and serve.

directions: Remove the stem from one mint green maraschino cherry and drop into a large shot glass. Pour in the jagermeister and rumple minze and serve.

directions: Pour the shots into a glass of ice, and fill the glass with equal parts orange juice, cranberry juice, and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice, and an umbrella.

name: Easy Sodas recipe

directions:
Dissolve soft drink mix and sugar in water in nonmetal bowl or pitcher. Stir in club soda. Place a small scoop of ice cream in each of 6 tall glasses. Stir in soda mixture; top with a second scoop of ice cream.
,
Makes about 2 quarts or 6 large servings.

name: Easy Rootbeer Float recipe

directions: Add brandy to a glass (little less than half). Fill to top with Dr. P.

name: Easy Access recipe

directions: Stir over ice cubes in aperitif glass. Add a slice of orange and lemon, and serve.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old fashioned glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

directions: Stir with ice to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

directions: Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Fancy Brandy recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Famous Dwayne recipe

name: False Whiskey Sour recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 bottles beer', None), (None, u'2 cansfrozen lemonade', None), (None, u'1 fifth whiskey', None), (None, u'1 scoop ice', None)]
directions: We always use equal parts beer, whiskey, and frozen lemonade. Thaw and pour the lemonade concentrate into a pitcher, then fill up the cans with the whiskey and mix into the pitcher. Gently fill the cans with the beer, avoiding too much foam, and mix into the pitcher. Add the ice and stir.

name: Falling Star recipe

directions: Pour white sambuca into shot glass 3/4 of the way full. Slowly pour a little jack daniels on top almost dripping it into glass. This will cause the Jack to slowly fall to the bottom of the glass, giving the appearance of a "Falling Star".

directions: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

directions: Stir together in a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Fallen Angel recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Fallen Angel recipe

name: Fallen Angel #2 recipe

name: Fall Spice Cordial recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 cuplight brown sugar', None), (None, u'1/2 cupwhite sugar', None), (u'2 1/4', u'apple juice', 'cups'), (None, u'1 tspreal vanilla extract', None), (None, u'1 tspground cinnamon', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground ginger', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground nutmeg', None), (None, u'1/4 tspground cloves', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground allspice', None), (None, u'1/2 tspdried, chopped orange', None), (None, u'1 cupwhite brandy', None), (None, u'1/2 cup100 proof vodka', None)]
directions: Bring brown sugar, white sugar and apple juice to a boil over medium-high heat. Add cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, cloves, allspice and orange peel. Boil for 4 minutes and remove from heat. Let stand until just warm. Transfer to a clean 1 qt aging vessel. Add vanilla, brandy and vodka. Cover tightly and let stand for 1-4 weeks. Filter out solids before bottling.

directions: Pour vermouth and brandy into a glass, add lime and fill with orange juice. Stir, add a splash of brandy on top, and serve with a straw.

directions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass on the rocks.

name: BabyDoll recipe

directions:
Combine All,
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish the drink with a cherry!

name: Baby V.O.X. recipe

directions: Blend with ice and serve with a cherry on top.

directions: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass.

directions: Poor in 1oz Galliano, mix in Amaretto, stir 7 times. Top with a fruit juice, works best with apple, and add a couple of ice cubes last. After all ingredients are in, stir again 7 times.

name: Half of Everything We Gots recipe

directions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Hakunna Matada recipe

directions: Mix everything in a pitcher with ice.

name: Hakkespett recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'5 cl Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'5 cl Green Chartreuse\xae', None)]
directions:
Layer cointreau and chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match, lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it.,
Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside, shoot the entire contents, put two fingers in your mouth, inhale sharply and deeply, and then try to say: "Hakkespett!" (In English: "Woodpecker!") Good luck!

name: Haitian Gold recipe

name: Hairy Lemon recipe

directions: Rub salt onto the back of your hand. Bite the lemon, drink a good two mouthfuls of vodka, and lick the salt.

name: Cafe Extraordinaire recipe
