directions: Place coffee and chocolate into a mug . Add boiling water; stir well. Top with large spoonful of whipped topping and chocolate curls if desired.

name: Cafe Grande recipe

directions: Pour coffee and liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Cafe Foster recipe

name: Cafe Don Juan recipe

Rim an irish coffee cup with lemon juice and sugar. Pour coffee and liquors into the cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream,
on top, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Cafe Disaronno recipe

directions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream, and place three coffee beans on top.

name: Cafe de Paris recipe

directions: Shake ingredients over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cafe D'Amour recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'cognac', 'oz'), (None, u'5 ozhot black coffee', None), (None, u'1/2  lemon', None), (None, u'1  cinnamon', None), (None, u'  sugar', None)]
directions: Rim a coffee cup with lemon juice and sugar. Simmer coffee, zest of half a lemon, cinnamon stick and sugar (to taste) in a small saucepan. Heat and ignite cognac in a soup ladle, add to coffee, and extinguish. Strain into the cup, and serve.

name: Cafe Caen recipe

directions: Heat liquors in a heat-resistant glass. Pour in the hot coffee, stir, and top with cream. Add sugar, and serve.

name: Cafe Cappuccino Mix recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 cupinstant coffee', None), (u'3/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1 cupnonfat dry milk', None), (None, u'1/2 tspdried orange', None)]
directions: Mash orange peel with a mortar and pestle. Stir ingredients together. Process in a blender until powdered. Use 2 Tablespoons for each cup of hot water. Makes about 2 1/4 cups of mix.

name: Cafe Con Miel recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cupsprepared coffee', None), (u'1/2', u'milk', 'cup'), (u'4', u'honey', 'tbsp'), (u'1/8', u'cinnamon', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  nutmeg', None), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'dash')]
directions: Heat ingredients in a saucepan, but do not boil. Stir well to combine. Serve as a light dessert.

name: Cafe Au Lait - Country Style recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'milk', 'cups'), (None, u'1/3 cupheavy cream', None), (None, u'4 cupsfreshley brewed strong Louisiana coffee', None)]
directions:
1. In heavy 1-quart saucepan, heat milk and cream just until bubbles appear around the side of pan. (Do not boil.) Pour milk mixture into warmed serving pot or pitcher.,
2. Pour about 1 inch of freshly brewed Louisiana coffee. into each of 4 serving cups. Then, simultaneously pour coffee and warm milk mixture into each cup to desired level.,
To make strong coffee, use 2 tablespoons ground Louisiana coffee witb chicory for 3/4 C of water.

name: Cafe Cabana recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3', u'club soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cafe Brulot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 - 1 1/2', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1 - 2', u'triple sec', 'dashes'), (None, u'1 cuphot coffee', None), (None, u'1 twist lemon', None), (None, u'1 twist orange', None), (None, u'1  clove', None), (None, u'1 pinch cinnamon', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Warm cognac in a heat-resistant glass. Pour in the hot coffee, and add dashes of triple sec. Add twists of lemon and orange peel, a clove, and sprinkle with cinnamon. Sweeten to taste, and serve.

name: Cafe Au Lait recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'milk', 'cup'), (None, u'1 cuplight cream', None), (None, u'3 tbspinstant coffee', None), (None, u'2 cupsboiling water', None)]
directions: Over low heat or in double boiler, heat milk and cream till hot. Meanwhile, dissolve coffee in boiling water. Before serving, beat milk mixture with rotary beater-till foamy. Pour milk mixture into one warmed pitcher or server, and coffee in another. To serve: Fill cups from both pitchers at the same time, making the streams meet en route. Makes 6 servings.

name: D.N.A. Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2/3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2 - 3', u'lime juice', 'tbsp'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'8  strawberries', None), (None, u'2 - 3 tbsppowdered sugar', None)]
directions:
Freeze the strawberries and chill the gin and blue curacao. Use a test tube or if not available, a shot glass. Moisten the rim with lime juice, then dip the rim into icing sugar.,
Add blue curacao. Tilt the tube/glass with great care, then pour chilled gin down the side to form a layer above the blue curacao. PuríƒÂ©e the strawberries and pineapple juice in a bar blender for 10 seconds, then add the puríƒÂ©e on top of the gin. Wisps of strawberry D.N.A. will precipitate down into the drink.

directions: Shake rum, amaretto, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Add grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.

directions: Combine dry gin, bitters, coffee liqueur, and orange juice in a mixing glass and stir. Decant contents into a microwave-safe container and microwave for 30 seconds. Add ice to a blender and pour contents of container into it. Add clamato juice and brown sugar, cap container, and turn blender on. When mixture has the consistency of a frozen drink, pour into highball glass. Garnish with straw, a dash of kosher salt, and peppermint leaves.

name: A Captain's Paradise recipe

directions: Combine them how ever you want in whatever you want.  I always pour the orange juice first then the rum but its up to you.  This actually makes a great punch too.  The ratios can be changed depending on how strong you want it, but I find this has a relatively solid balance.  Both guys and girls will really enjoy this.

directions: Pour the tropical gatorade into a jug. Add 3-4 oz of vodka, shake, and add Captain Morgans Original spiced rum. Serves about 4 in cocktail glasses.

name: Fahrenheit 151 recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Red Bull\xae energy drink', 'oz'), (u'8', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: First, add the Bacardi 151 into the Collins glass. Then, pour the half can of Red Bull, and proceed to add about 4 or 5 pieces of ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Coca-Cola and serve.

name: Face First recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'sloe gin', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Jim Beam\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

directions: Mix evenly in a shot glass and serve cold.

name: Fabulous Fake recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 cl grenadine syrup', None), (None, u'12 cl grapefruit soda', None)]
directions: Add the grenadine at the bottom of the glass, then put crushed ice so half of the glass is filled on top of it, and blend it a bit(not much). After that you just simply fill rest of the glass with grapefruit soft drink(about 12 cl, but it depends on the glass).

name: F-69 recipe

directions: Chill ingredients beforehand. Carefully layer the ingredients into a shot glass in order: Rum, Kahlua, Amaretto, Bailey's.

name: Baby Aspirin recipe

directions: Pour equal parts into cup, mix and pour into shot glass.

name: Babbie's Special Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'light cream', 'tbsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ba-dew-si recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (None, u'5 ozchilled Pepsi\xae cola', None), (None, u'5 ozchilled Mountain Dew\xae lime soda', None)]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: B2 C2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'benedictine herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Champagne', 'oz')]
directions:
Pour into a glass.,
Alternatively multiply the amounts and use a large jug with chopped fruit.

name: B52-Slovak recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cl Absinth\xae absinthe herbal liqueur', None), (None, u"2 cl Bailey's\xae Irish cream", None), (None, u'1 cl Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', None)]
directions:
Fill in Kahlua, then slowly put Baileys on top. Take a tea-spoon reverse in the glass and slowly put the Absinth on top (in Slovakia typically 70% is green, 80% is red). Take a straw and cut it in the middle so that it is 50% inside and 50% outside of the glass. ,
DO NOT PUT THE STRAW IN THE GLASS.,
TRANSPORT THE GLASS WITH CARE.,
Set the Absinth on fire. Take your hair out of your face, remove your glasses! Take the straw in your mouth, and then head down and straw INTO THE STILL BURNING DRINK. Drink fast enough in one go - otherwise the straw is set on fire and you will just burn your lips or even your eyebrows!,
Europe wide: 112 is emergency (fire and ambulance) on all mobile and fixd-line networks!

name: B.V.D. #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'blackberry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2 - 2', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2 - 2', u'cola', 'oz')]
directions: Add the shots to a large cocktail glass and fill with equal parts cola and 7-up.

name: B.V.D. recipe
directions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

directions: Pour southern comfort into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Top off with the mountain dew, and serve.

name: B.B. Bomb recipe

directions: Pour the Sea Dog Blue Paw Wheat Ale into a pint glass or beer mug and fill about half way. Then pour 1/2 shot of Irish cream (any brand of choice) into a shot glass, and 1/2 shot of Vodka of choice and drop into the mug/pint and chug. Just be sure to drink it all right away or the Irish Cream will curdle.

directions: In a shaker with ice, pour in rum, brandy, apple syrup, squeeze from half of a lemon wedge, and 2 dashes of bitters. Shake hard, and pour into a frosty martini cocktail glass. directions: Use a clean highball glass, fill with ice cubes, add Bombay Sapphire Gin, and top off with some Sprite. A twist of lemon or lime adds color. For the advanced bartender, a curl of orange peel gives this drink a final salon touch.

name: Hairball recipe

directions: Fill 1/3 of a collins glass with cider, then float the guinness on top, to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour bushmill's irish whiskey in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!

name: Hair of the Dog recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'salt', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Tabasco sauce, tequila and whiskey into a shot glass. Lay the salt on top, and serve.

name: Hair Gel recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'3', u'lemonade', 'oz'), (None, u'1 package candies', None)]
directions: Add the blue curacao, vodka, lemonade and candy (jelly tots) to a blender with crushed ice. Blend until slushy. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, top with a dash of blue curacao, and serve.

name: Hair of the Dog recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'2', u'honey', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions:
The original recipe said to shake the ingredients togeather with the ice cubes, but I usually stir the whisky and the honey with a spoon until they're mixed, and then add the cream and add the Ice Cubes. It workes just fine. ,
I've tried this drink with Burbon and Tennessee whiskey instead of Scotch, and it is really great! It becomes a totally different drink. ,
I've also tried to add ~1 oz cold coffee, and I liked it.

name: Hair Dryer recipe
ingredients: [(u'12', u'Coca-Cola\xae Vanilla Coke', 'oz'), (u'2', u'hazelnut liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Stir ingredients together in a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Cafe Anna recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'water', 'cup'), (None, u'1/3 cupinstant coffee', None), (u'1/4', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1/4 ground cinnamon', None), (None, u'4  milk', None), (None, u'1/2 cupwhipping cream', None), (None, u' ground nutmeg', None)]
directions: Pour water into 2 quart microwave safe casserole. Microwave at high setting 1 minute, then stir in instant coffee granules until dissolved. Blend in sugar and cinnamon then pour in milk, stirring constantly. Microwave, uncovered, at medium setting 5-9 minutes, stirring every 3 minutes, or until heated through. Serve in mugs topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkling of nutmeg.

name: Cafe Antrim recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cognac', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'powdered sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'  coffee', None)]

directions: Fill a mug almost full with hot coffee. Add amaretto and stir well. Layer cognac on top and add a puff of whipped cream.

directions:
Add in blender in any order, and blend until desired texture. ENJOY! Makes 4 to 5 large servings.,
Fresh fruit: grapes, blueberries, peaches, bananas, or any kind of fruit you like, add as much as desired.

name: G Spot #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 ozfresh lime juice', None), (None, u'3  mint', None), (None, u'1 pinch sugar', None), (None, u' cloudy apple juice', None), (None, u'  Schweppes\xae raspberry ginger ale', None)]
directions:
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice.,
Pour one shot of Midori into the glass. Squeeze the lime so that the juice goes into the glass and add 3 mint leaves, crushing them a little bit.  And a pinch of sugar.,
Pour in the cloudy apple juice, and then add schweppes slowly (so that it goes to the bottom).,
Garnish with a lime wedge and/or suger rim around the glass.

name: G-Spot recipe

name: Hailey Rose recipe

directions:
Fully Ice Up High Ball Glass, combine 1 once each of Sour Rasp. & Armaretto. ,
Top off Glass with the White Cran-Strawberry Juice. Garnish with any slice of,
Citrus. Obviously smaller Glasses use only half once of each. If you find the drink a little tarty, splash in more Armaretto and cut back on the Sour Rasp. That's what the Guys prefer, where as the Ladies seem to like more Sour Rasp.

directions: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

name: C4 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/4 oz100 proof Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', None), (u'1/4', u'DeKuyper\xae Hot Damn 100 cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Layer ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass; Rumple Minze bottom, then Hot Damn!, then Jagermeister, and finally Midori on top. Serve.

directions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

name: c/p Crockery Cocoa recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 1/2 cupsnonfat powdered milk', None), (u'1/2', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1/2 cupunsweetened cocoa', None), (u'6', u'water', 'cups'), (u'1', u'vanilla', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 dashground cinnamon', None)]
directions: Combine dry milk powder, sugar, and cocoa powder. Add water and vanilla; stir well to dissolve. Cover; cook on low setting for 3 to 4 hours or or high setting for 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Before serving, carefully beat cocoa with rotary beater to make frothy. Ladle into mugs; top with marshmallows and sprinkle with cinnamon, if desired. Makes 9 (6 oz. each) servings.

name: C.R. Sun Tan Lotion recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'DeKuyper\xae Peachtree schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add ingredients, and stir. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: C-MOB recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'whisky', 'oz'), (None, u'2  ice cubes', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u' fill with Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Two ice cubes, 2 oz of whisky, 1 shot of vodka, and fill the rest with coca cola.

name: C&M recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Fill cocktail glass with ice about halfway. Pour 2 - 3oz. of Malibu rum into the glass depending on the size of the glass. Pour 2 - 3oz. of Stoli Vanil depending on the size of the glass. Fill rest of glass with Coke (either regular or Diet your preference).

name: C-Dot's Pina Colada Jello Shot recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 package island pineapple jell-o', None), (None, u'3/4 cuphot water', None), (u'3/4', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'cup'), (u'1/2', u'Cruzan\xae pineapple rum', 'cup')]
directions:
Boil water and mix with (1) 3-oz package of Island Pineapple Jello. Mix until jello is completely dissolved. Add 3/4-cup of Malibu coconut rum. Add 1/2-cup of Cruzan pineapple rum. Mix again and pour into 2-oz plastic cups. ,
NOTE: I found the cups at party city and a similar retailer. I also prefer plastic versus paper. Each package of jello makes approx. (16) 2-oz cups. Fun for the whole family...

name: S'Mores Milk recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 cuplow-fat milk', None), (u'1/8', u'vanilla extract', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'chocolate syrup', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1 crushed graham cracker', None), (None, u'10-15 mini Marshmellow', None)]
directions:
Shake all ingredients in a container with tight-fitting lid or stir in glass until well blended. Sip milk with straw and spoon marshmallows to eat.,
Makes 1 glass.

name: U.D. recipe

directions: Fill glass with ice add ingredients and shake and serve with a cherry.

name: Saint Paul recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'part'), (u'1', u'white rum', 'part'), (None, u' fill with bitter lemon soda', None), (None, u'2 - 4  ice cubes', None), (u'1', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dash')]
directions: Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass. Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

name: Saint Clemence recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 partfresh orange juice', None), (u'1', u'bitter lemon soda', 'part')]
directions: Mix with ice, serve. "Oranges and lemons say the bells of St Clemence"

name: Sailor's Delight recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'part'), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'parts')]
directions: Stir together. Serve.

directions: Shake white rum, charleston follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with champagne, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Sailor Venus recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'120 ml white wine', None), (None, u'15 ml Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'30 ml white rum', None), (None, u'20 ml lemon juice', None), (None, u'  ice', None)]
directions: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

directions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Add ginger ale, and garnish with a slice of lemon and a blue cherry. Serve with a short straw.

directions: Pour the lemon juice, egg and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with apple cider, stir well, and serve.

directions: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

directions: Mix vodka and passion fruit juice in a old fashioned glass, Drambuie on top. Decorate with a wild Orchid or Rose.

name: Walking Dead recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Smirnoff\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Johnnie Walker\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Jim Beam\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'2 ozpremium lager', None), (u'2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'absinthe herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Wild Turkey\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz')]
directions:
Mix all ingredients into a large container - eg. Vase, large boot (clean, waterproof diving boot preferable) or a huge mug. Once all mixed together, drink as fast as possible.,
*N.B if the above ingredients aren't available, pretty much anything else can be substituted - Although we've found these ingredients to work the best*

name: Wa-Hoo-Wa recipe

directions: Shake all on ice and strain into a highball glass.

directions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

directions: Combine all ingredients and serve hot, in an small irish coffee glass or coffee cup.  This recipe produces a drink that is about 40 proof, so please use care in it's consumption.

directions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add cola, garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Zorro recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 cl sambuca', None), (None, u"2 cl Bailey's\xae Irish cream", None), (None, u'2 cl white creme de menthe', None), (None, u'  coffee', None), (u'1 1/2', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into an irish coffee cup. Add hot black coffee, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Zorbatini recipe

directions: Serve in a cocktail glass, and garnish with a green olive.

name: Zoot recipe

directions: Pour gin and 7-up over ice cubes in a glass, and float the jack daniel's on top. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Zool recipe

directions: Pour peach schnapps into a shot glass, and add vodka. Add amaretto until vodka turns to a light brown, and serve.

directions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Zombie (UK Style) recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'gold rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'overproof rum', 'oz'), (None, u'1 dashor drizzle grenadine syrup', None)]
directions: Shake first 7 ingredients hard and strain over fresh ice into large glass. Float overproof rum then drizzle grenadine. Garnish with pineapple flag/leaf and orange wedge

name: Zombie #6 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 cl lemon juice', None), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash'), (None, u'2 cl orange juice', None), (None, u'2 cl Heering\xae cherry liqueur', None), (None, u'2 cl Bacardi\xae white rum', None), (None, u'6 cl Bacardi\xae black rum', None), (None, u'2 cl 151 proof rum', None)]
directions: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a tumbler on crushed ice.

name: Yukon Cornelius recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Yukon Jack\xae Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager, filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

name: Yukka Flux recipe
ingredients: [(u'26', u'flavored rum', 'oz'), (None, u"1 bottle Seagram's\xae Raspberry Cooler", None), (None, u'1  cantaloupe melon', None), (None, u'1 small watermelon', None), (None, u'1 can pineapple', None), (None, u'1 container, halved fresh strawberry', None), (None, u'1 container fresh blueberry', None), (None, u'1  honeydew melon', None), (None, u' all fruit', None), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None)]
directions:
Cut up all your fruit and place in a fridge friendly container that has a good sealing lid.  Top with booze of choice and let sit for at least 24 hours before serving, can sit as long as three days, but fruit starts to get mushy if it sits too long.  You can really use any booze you like, but if you use straight rum, vodka, whatever, it is really strong.,
To serve:  scoop some of the fruit into your glass, top with some of the liquid, and top off with sprite/ 7-up.  Add a straw and plastic spoon/fork  and you are set.

name: Zone 23 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'creme de cassis', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill 2/3rds a Libby's # 11 water glass or large red wine goblet  with ice cubes. Pour each ingredient in the order given without stirring or shaking.  The orange juice should be  drizzled over the top. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.  A wedge of fresh orange or lime on the rim is optional.

name: Yukka recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'7  lemons', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'  vodka', None)]
directions: First, slice the lemons up and throw them into the gallon jug. Then fill the jug up with ice. Pour 1 cup of sugar in. Then put as much vodka as you can get in. Put regular vodka, not flavored. SHAKE VERY VERY WELL(at least 20 minutes for best taste). It tastes just like Lemonade and it will get you messed up!

name: Yucca recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'10 sliced lemons', None), (None, u'10 sliced limes', None), (None, u'3 lb sugar', None), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'gal'), (None, u'8 lb ice', None)]
directions: Put the Vodka and the sugar into a container. Slice 10 lemons and 10 limes and add them to the Vodka. Mix for 10 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved.

name: YoYo Blow Out recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'light rum', 'part'), (u'2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'parts'), (u'1', u'crushed ice', 'part')]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

name: Young Grasshopper recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Bols\xae peppermint liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz')]
directions: Take shot glass. Add Bols. Slowly add Triple Sec. Admire the myriad shades of green. Drink.

name: Yolanda recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'anisette', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash'), (None, u'1 twist orange', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Yoghurt Cooler recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'yoghurt', 'cup'), (u'1', u'fruits', 'cup')]
directions:
Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.
,
Note: Use lots of ice. To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

name: Yoda recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'part'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'part'), (u'2', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'parts'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'splash'), (None, u'1/2 handful ice', None)]
directions:
Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker, or if you don't have a shaker, two identical glasses will work if you are careful. ,
Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour Mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color, add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

name: Ying Yang recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Rumple Minze\xae peppermint liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Serve with alcohol pre-chilled. Can be served as a drink or a double shot.

name: Yo Mama Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Stoli\xae Ohranj vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'  soda water', None), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'splash')]
directions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add soda, top with a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Yin Martini recipe

directions: Shake with ice and strain.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

ingredients: [(u'4', u'orange juice', 'parts'), (u'3', u'vodka', 'parts'), (u'6', u'white wine', 'parts'), (u'6', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'parts')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a bowl, and mix them together.

name: Virgin Pina Colada recipe

directions: Add the pineapple juice, coconut cream and crushed ice to a blender; blend at high speed. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a pineapple wedge, and serve.

directions:
Drop an ice cube into a shot glass, pour vodka, rum/amaretto and cream over the top, and garnish with a cherry.,
Shoot the booze, eat the cherry, lick the ice!

name: Virgin Mudslide recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vanilla ice cream', 'quart'), (None, u'1/2 cupcold coffee', None), (u'1', u'hazelnut syrup', 'tsp'), (u'1/4', u'chocolate syrup', 'cup'), (u'1 1/2', u'heavy cream', 'cups'), (u'2', u'milk', 'cups'), (None, u'1/4 ozReady whip topping', None), (None, u'1  maraschino cherry', None), (None, u'1 pinch chocolate', None), (None, u'1 pinch cinnamon', None)]
directions:
Place ice cream, cold coffee, milk, chocolate syrup and hazel nut syrup in blender, blend until smooth. Add heavy cream blend until well mixed. ,
Chill parfait or martini glasses. While holding only the stemms or bases of the glasses rim the insede of the glasses with chocolate syrup. Place a swirl of ready whip on top with a marchiano cherry and chocolate sprinkles and cinamon for garnish. ,
TIP: Shaved chocolate will make the presentation more dramatic, perfect for a romantic evening.

name: Tequila Collins recipe

name: Tequila Cocktail recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

directions: Pour first 3 ingredients over ice into collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juices. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve with a straw.

directions: Throw everything in a glass. Put a towel over the glass slam it on the bar. Before the foam hits the edge off the glass you must have finished it .

name: Tequila Bom-Bom recipe

directions: Place a coaster on top, pound on table twice, guzzle it!

name: Tequila Boom recipe

directions: Before drinking, put a napkin on top of the glass and your hand over that. Bang it on the table (so that the gases rise to the top) and shoot.

directions: Put salt on some part of somebody else's body. Hold shot glass in left hand and lemon in right hand. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

directions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Zombie #2 recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

name: Zombie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Bacardi\xae 151 rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'oz')]

name: Zolezzi recipe

directions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add liquor shots blue, green, white then add the pineapple and Sprite to fill glass finish with twist and a cherri.

directions: Pour dark rum, tequila, pineapple juice and grapefruit juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda and stir well. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge, and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Zoksel recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  beer', None), (None, u'  root beer', None), (None, u'  lemonade', None), (None, u'  Coca-Cola\xae', None), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None), (None, u'  creme de cassis', None), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None)]
directions: No specific mixing instructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass, experiment to taste. The lemon goes with it.

directions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and Amaretto. Shake well to dissolve the sugar into the Kool-Aid. Serve cold.

directions: Pour 5 cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2 cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

directions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

name: Zipperhead recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u' fill with soda water', None)]
directions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, then soda on top).

name: Zio Joe's Traffic Lights recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2/3 shot Coca Buton\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'1/3 shot Alcohol-95\xae grain alcohol', None), (None, u'1 shot limoncello lemon liqueur', None), (None, u'1 shot strawberry vodka', None)]
directions:
Traffic Lights is made up of 3 single shots:,
The first one, green, is a Zio Joe's "Pallottola" (Bullet). It is made up filling the shot glass with 2/3 Coca Buton and 1/3 95Â° Alcohol, do not mix.,
The second one, yellow, is a Limoncello shot.,
The third one, red, is a full shot glass of strawberry flavored vodka.,
Start from the red, then yellow... and the green will make you go :-)

name: Zip Drive recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u"Gosling's\xae black rum", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 ozfresh lemon juice', None), (u'1/2', u'sugar syrup', 'oz')]
directions:
Shake all ingredients over ice and strain into a Martini glass. No garnish.,
Cheers!,
Note:  Sugar syrup is a solution of sugar and water that is cooked over low heat until clear, then boiled for a minute or so.  I can be made in various densities:,
Thin: 3 parts water to 1 part sugar.,
Medium: 2 parts water to 1 part sugar.,
Heavy: Equal parts water and sugar.

name: Zinger recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 shots DeKuyper\xae Peachtree schnapps', None), (None, u'4 shots Surge\xae citrus soda', None)]
directions:
Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the Schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.,
*Add 1 shot Strawberry Schnapps for an alternate taste.

name: Zimartini recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u'1 bottle Zima', None)]
directions: Pour together over 2-3 ice cubes and serve.

name: Zimaretto recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'12', u'Zima', 'oz')]
directions: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

name: Zimamazing recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'2', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (None, u'1 bottle Zima', None)]
directions:
Put the first six ingredients in a shaker glass without ice and shake until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker glass at the time so it is a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.(depending on the ice),
Tastes like an Electric Lemonade with Zima instead of lemon-lime soda and more sour mix. Instead of triple sec, you can also use blue curacao. It makes it a pretty blue-green drink.,
Also, keep a LOT of extra ice on hand because this drink has so much alcohol it melts the ice immediately, which is why you should not put ice in the shaker, it will dilute the drink.

name: Yellow Rattler recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1 cocktail onion', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except cocktail onion) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onion and serve.

name: Yellow Motherfuckers recipe

directions: It is best to use a large cooler with a spout. The amount of Vodka and Gin you use depends on the size of your cooler. Add the ingredients to your prefered taste.

directions:
Yellow Jacket,
Shake:,
½ oz 99 Bananas, ½ oz Peach Schnapps, and a ,
splash of pineapple juice.,
strain into an old-fashioned glass or similar.,
Sink Razzmatazz,
Float Jagermeister

name: Yellow Peril recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Finlandia\xae lime vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bols\xae creme de bananes', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all 4 ingredients into a brandy snifter and swirl.  This is powerful stuff - named after English traffic wardens! After two you'll sleep like a dream.

directions: Mix Bacardi Limon with gin, then lime juice and fill rest of shot with Mountain Dew.

directions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Fingers recipe

directions: Shake all but the curacao and lemonade very well and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Add lemonade, and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Using a thin straw, place drops of blue curacao in neat rows across the frothy white surface, and serve immediately.

directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Yellow Cake recipe

name: Yellow Boxer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 3/4', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'lemon juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Yellow Birdie recipe

directions:
Pour Vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.,
*Can substitute Light Rum for Vodka.

name: Weep-No-More Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Dubonnet\xae French vermouth', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'maraschino liqueur', 'tsp'), (None, u' juice of 1/2 limes', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Combine all ingredients in an ice shaker, half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into glass.

name: Yellow Bird recipe

directions: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass. Stir sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.

name: Wedding Bells Cocktail recipe

directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wedding Cake Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lemon', None), (u'1', u'granulated sugar', 'tbsp')]
directions: The drink can be made in any proportion, though if a shot totals more than an ounce people start to have problems shooting it. Mix the Stoli Vanil and the Frangelico together in a shot glass.   Before taking the shot, dredge the lemon slice in the granulated sugar.  Drink the shot, and directly after swallowing bite the lemon.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange slices and strawberries. Makes 32 (6-ounce) punch cups.

directions: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Webster Cocktail recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

directions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Top with champagne. Squeeze and drop another wedge of lemon into the drink. (the other two should still be in the tin).

directions: Fill the shot glass about 2/3 full of jager, and then top it off with the sambuca.

directions: Pour the orange juice, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale, stir well, and serve.

directions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

name: Watermelon-Kazi recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Watermelon Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'3', u'DeKuyper\xae triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir, and serve. Add water if too strong, until just right.

name: Virgin Mimosa recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 cupgranulated sugar', None), (None, u'1/4 cupsparkling cider', None), (None, u'1/4 cupfresh orange juice', None), (None, u'1/2  lemon', None), (None, u'1  lemon', None)]
directions: Pour a small amount of sugar onto a saucer. Wet rim of a champagne glass and press glass, upside down, into the sugar, "frosting" the rim. Pour in cider, orange juice and lemon juice. Garnish with lemon zest, if desired.

name: Virgin Mary recipe

directions: Fill a large wine glass with ice. Add tomato juice, then the rest of the ingredients. Stir and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Virgin Mary recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'tomato juice', 'oz'), (u'2 - 3', u'lemon juice', 'dashes'), (None, u'1 pinch celery salt', None), (None, u'4 - 6 drops Worcestershire sauce', None), (None, u'1 pinchcoarse peppers', None), (None, u'2 - 3 drops Tabasco\xae sauce', None), (None, u'1  celery', None)]
directions: Pour tomato juice over ice cubes in a large highball glass. Season to taste, stir, and garnish with celery.

name: Virgin Manhattan recipe

directions: Shake ingredients with ice, and strain; either into a chilled cocktail glass, or on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Virgin Flamingo Cocktail recipe

directions: Pour the cranberry juice, pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with the club soda and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Virgin Hot Sex recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Finest Call\xae triple sec', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash')]
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add triple sec. Drizzle the grenadine syrup over the ice. Add orange juice. Stir with a spoon. Garnish as desired (orange, lemon, cherry), but I recommend a white daisy for effect.

name: Virgin Colada recipe

directions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add a straw, and serve.

name: Virgin Clamato Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'5', u'tomato juice', 'oz'), (u'3', u'clam juice', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'black peppers', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dash'), (u'1', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dash')]
directions: Combine the tomato juice, clam juice, black pepper, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Blackberry Fizz recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'blackberries', 'quart'), (u'4', u'water', 'cups'), (u'3', u'sugar', 'cups'), (None, u'1 tbspwhole cloves', None), (u'1', u'allspice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'2  cinnamon', None), (None, u'  7-Up\xae soda', None)]
directions: Crush blackberries in a large kettle. Add water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 10 minutes. Strain through a jelly bag, reserving juice and discarding pulp. Add water to juice if necessary to equal 2 quarts; pour into a large kettle. Slowly stir in sugar until dissolved. Place spices in a cheesecloth bag; add to juice. Simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Bring to a boil; remove the spice bag and discard. Pour hot into hot jars, leaving 1/4" headspace. Adjust caps. Process for 15 minutes in a boiling-water bath. To serve, mix about 1/3 concentrate with 2/3 soda. Yield: about 4 pints concentrate

name: Virgin Bullshot recipe
ingredients: [(u'7', u'beef bouillon', 'oz'), (u'1/8', u'black peppers', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dash'), (u'1', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dash')]
directions: Combine the beef bouillon, black pepper, Worcestershire and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Black and White recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'6 darjeeling tea', None), (None, u'4 cupsboiling water', None), (None, u'4 cupswhole milk', None), (None, u' granulated sugar', None)]
directions: This recipe is an elegant interpretation of the classic black tea with milk. Prepare a strong brew of Darjeeling Tea, using 6 tea bags in 4 cups boiling water. Steep for 5 minutes, gently squeeze tea bags and remove. Pour V2 cup plus 2 tablespoons of hot tea into each tea cup. Foam milk in the steamer of Ail espresso machine. Top each cup with foamed milk and sweeten with sugar to taste. Per serving: 100 calories

name: Virgin Bellini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'peach juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Virgin Barefoot and Pregnant recipe

directions: Quickly blend and serve. Garnish with a cherry and fresh mint leaves.

directions: Pour curacao and sloe gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and orange juice, and blend briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Villa Park recipe

directions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, add a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Tequila Bang Bang Mexico Style recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Clasico silver tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Make sure to have a taller shot glass.  Put tequila in, then add the grenadine, then fill the rest of the shot glass with sprite.  Take a short 2x4 piece of wood you might have around, and a napkin.  Place the napkin over the shot glass so it doesnt fizz up.  Take one end of the wood on your table with your left hand and raise it about six inches off the surface.  Take the shot glass in your right hand.  Slam the glass onto the wood and let the wood fall from your hand to the surface.  Remove napkin and drink quick!  Its great fun and tastes real good.

name: Tequila Bay Breeze recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Tequila Rose\xae strawberry cream liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'151 proof rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Blend.

name: Tequila Bang Bang recipe

directions: Pour ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass. Put your hand on it and be sure its hermetic. Slam it on the table, and shoot.

name: Tequila (Straight) recipe

directions: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

name: Tennessee Coffee recipe

name: Zero Gravity recipe

name: Zenmeister recipe

directions: Mix together and enjoy.

name: Zen Saketini recipe

name: Zerg Rush recipe

directions: Add 5 green pearl tea leaves to the bottom of a chilled martini glass.  Twist a spiral of lemon peel over the drink (pith-side inward) and rub the yellow part of the twist around the rim of the glass for added flavour.  Shake and serve.

directions: Pour Hpnotiq first then pour schnapps and malibu. Add juices.  Drizzle grenadine to create a cascade effect. Garnish ith 2 cherries and one Orange wedge.

directions:

Shoot (or sip) and Enjoy!

directions: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up, and add the tonic.

directions: Mix 1 part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.

name: Yarmouth Cadillac recipe

directions: Mix together in large glass..get ready for a truely unique "pride of Yarmouth Nova Scotia" taste.

name: Yapple Dapple recipe
ingredients: [(u'1.5', u'Bacardi\xae Big Apple rum', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Red Bull\xae energy drink', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a shotglass with Bacardi Big Apple. Pour 3 to 4 ounces of Red Bull in a Collins glass. Either drop the shot into or pour it into the Collins Glass and drink as a shot.

name: Yang Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sake rice wine', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with olives, and serve.

name: Yale Cocktail recipe

directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Yaka recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 fifth Absolut\xae vodka', None), (None, u'1 fifth Everclear\xae alcohol', None), (None, u'1 bag lemonade', None), (None, u'7 slices lemons', None), (u'2', u'water', 'qt')]
directions: Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolut vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. Serve cold.

name: Yager's Bloody Mary Jane recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 small can Spicy Hot V8 Juice', None), (u'4', u'clamato juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'water', 'oz'), (u'1', u"McCormick's\xae Hot Shot", 'tbsp'), (u'1/2', u'celery salt', 'tbsp'), (u'1/2', u'greek seasoning', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dash'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'dash')]
directions: Fill large glass with ice and fill with all ingredients, mix and add large green olives or celery stick. You can add more or less vodka but don't forget the 1/4 cup of water or it just won't taste right.

name: Yack recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', None), (None, u"1/2 shot Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", None)]
directions: Make this a 50/50,  1 ounce, or two ounce if you please, I would stick with one.

name: Yabba Dabba Dew recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1  tequila', None), (None, u'1  Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', None)]
directions: Use equal parts in a double bubble glass. Mt Dew on bottom. Tequila on top. NOW SLAM IT!!

name: Ya Rubytini recipe
ingredients: [(u'5', u'Danzka\xae grapefruit vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'1  vanilla', None), (u'6', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (None, u'2 ruby red (sweet) grapefruit', None), (u'2', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions:
Split the vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out insides with knife.  Add the scrapings to a shaker with ice and the grapefruit vodka and cranberry juice.  Shake vigorously until thoroughly chilled. ,
Before you pour it into your martini glasses, rub the vanilla bean pods around the lip of the glasses to add an initial taste of vanilla to the drink.  Then pour in one oz. of seltzer into each of the two glasses and finally pour the contents of the shaker into the glasses gently on top of the seltzer.  Add grapefruit segments last.,
Note: I prefer to add segments of citrus when they are cut into what are called supremes (pronounced soo-prems).  To do this, take a knife and cut the rind of whatever citrus fruit you are using going from top to bottom in strips.  Once the fruit is peeled, cut segments from the citrus in between the white membranes that separate the segments.  That's it.  Very easy and the juice from a segment cut like this can add more depth of flavor to a drink.

name: Y2K Shot #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Mix shot over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glass.

name: Watermelon Slice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'4', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine, then vodka, rum, gin and triple sec. Fill with half orange juice and half cranberry juice. Float with midori. Drink should be presented as is but stirred before drinking.

name: Watermelon Shooter #5 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'creme de noyaux', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass 1/4 of the way full with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into a rocks glass.

name: Watermelon Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vodka', 'part'), (u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'part'), (None, u' fill with orange juice', None), (None, u'  pineapple juice', None), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'dash')]
directions: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into a shot glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #4 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'splash')]
directions: Add ingredients in a shaker tin with ice, stir and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: Pour all ingredients in any order into a sifting glass filled with ice. Shake for 5 seconds and pour the chilled contents into your cocktail glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz')]
directions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain and pour into a glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'part'), (u'1', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'part'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash')]
directions: In a large juice or water pitcher filled with ice cubes, pour equal parts pineapple juice and jack daniels. Stir, then add a splash of grenadine to give the mixture a pink, almost watermelon, tint. Stir until well chilled. Pour into shot glass, straining ice, and enjoy.

name: Watermelon Shirley Temple recipe
ingredients: [(u'6', u'watermelon juice', 'oz'), (u'6', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz'), (None, u"2 tspconfectioner's sugar", None)]
directions:
Place all ingredients in a mixer. Mix, then strain and pour over crushed ice into glass.,
Serves 1.

name: Watermelon Pucker Fucker recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot DeKuyper\xae Watermelon Pucker schnapps', None), (None, u'1 squirt grenadine syrup', None), (None, u'1 shot Malibu\xae coconut rum', None), (None, u' fill with pineapple juice', None)]
directions: Mix in a hurricane glass.

name: Watermelon Martini recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 ozfresh lemon juice', None), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'citrus vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'1 1/2 ozfresh watermelon juice', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Watermelon Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'16 ozseeded, blended watermelons', None), (None, u'1/2  lime', None), (u'6', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'3', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tbsp')]
directions: Cut up a watermelon, removing seeds. Liquify in a blender until you have about 16 oz. Add remaining ingredients, top with ice and blend until smooth. Taste and add sugar if watermelon is not sweet enough. Serve in a margarita glass with a sugar-coated rim.

name: Watermelon Crawl recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'part'), (u'1 1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'watermelon schnapps', 'part'), (None, u'  orange juice', None), (None, u'  pineapple juice', None)]
directions: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice, pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

name: Watermelon Cooler recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 1/2 cupscubed watermelon', None), (None, u' juice of ONE limes', None), (None, u'1 tspgranulated sugar', None)]
directions:
Place watermelon, lime juice and sugar in a blender and process at high speed until smooth. Fill a 12-ounce glass with ice cubes; pour watermelon mixture over the ice and garnish with mint.,
Makes 1 serving.

name: Watermelon Crawl # 2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'  Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', None)]

name: Watermelon #2 recipe

directions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Vietnemese Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'espresso', 'oz'), (None, u'1 ozsweetened condensed milk', None)]
directions: Combine over ice and stir.

name: Victor recipe

name: Victory Collins recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

directions: Layer in order in a pousse-cafe glass.

directions: Pour liquors into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and cranberru juice. Shake, garnish with two cherries, and serve.

directions: Fill shaker glass with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Skake well and strain into a sugar rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge on the edge of the glass.

name: Viagra Shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'green creme de menthe', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Blend, add ice and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Vi's Jamaican Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'750 mlbottle light rum', None), (None, u'750 mlbottle anejo rum', None), (u'16', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'qt'), (u'1 1/2', u'orange juice', 'qt'), (None, u'1 tspgrated nutmeg', None), (None, u'1 tspground cinnamon', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground mace', None), (None, u'1/2 tspground allspice', None), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'superfine sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'1 peeled and chopped pineapple', None), (u'12', u'club soda', 'oz')]
directions: Peel and core a pineapple. Take half and chop finely; thinly slice the other half. Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the chopped pineapple, light rum, anejo rum, dark rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, nutmeg, cinnamon, mace, allspice and club soda. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with pineapple slices. Makes 35 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Veterinary recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'alcohol', 'part'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'parts'), (u'3', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'parts')]
directions: Pour alcohol over ice cubes in a tall glass. Add lime juice and sprite or 7-up. Stir well.

name: Vesuvio recipe

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Veteran recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'cherry brandy', 'oz')]
directions: Pour rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Temptation Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Dubonnet\xae French vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'anis liqueur', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 twist orange', None), (None, u'1 twist lemon', None)]
directions: Shake blended whiskey, Dubonnet, triple sec, and anis with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twists of orange and lemon peel and serve.

name: Tempo Setter recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'rosso vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'anisette', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tsp')]
directions: Shake, strain into a liqueur or cordial glass, and garnish with a speared cherry. Serve.

name: Telegraph recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'RedRum\xae rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Stolichnaya\xae vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'  ginger ale', None)]
directions: In a shaker with ice, combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

name: Teeter-Totter recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'blackberry brandy', 'oz'), (u'2 - 4', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz'), (u'2 - 4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Start with old-fashion glass with ice.  Add shots of Southern Comfort, Vodka and Blackberry Brandy.  Top off with sprite or ginger ale AND cranberry juice...equal parts.  Enjoy.  4 of these and you will be Teeter-tottering.

name: Teddybear recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'root beer schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Teddybear Shooter recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'root beer schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Pour 3/4 oz. Rootbeer Schnapps into a shot glass,then use barspoon to carefully pour 1/4 oz. vodka on top to layer.

name: TEAng! recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Tang\xae powdered soft drink', 'oz'), (None, u'1 Bag of Lipton tea', None), (None, u'8 ozhot water', None)]
directions: Put one serving of Tang into a coffee mug.  Then put one Lipton tea bag in the cup.  Add boiling/hot water and mix.  Let it steep for 2 to 3 minutes.

name: Teal Squeal recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'cup'), (u'1/4', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'cup'), (u'2', u'ice', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'pineapples', 'cup')]
directions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend well. Serve in highball glass. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Teabomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Jagermeister\xae herbal liqueur', 'part'), (u'1', u'AriZona\xae iced tea', 'part')]
directions: Pour the iced tea into a highball glass so that its half full. Then pour the Jagermeister down the side of the glass so that the drink doesn't mix too much. Chug away, the tea at the bottom is the perfect chaser, you won't feel a thing. Easy drink'n.

name: Tea-riffic recipe
ingredients: [(u'6', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (None, u'6 ozsweet tea', None), (None, u'5  ice cubes', None), (None, u'2  lemons', None)]
directions: Pour in the 6 oz. of triple sec to the sweet tea and add the juice of 2 lemon wedges to it. Leave lemon wedges in drink then add 5 ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Teacher's Pet recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet vermouth', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'bitters', 'dashes')]
directions: Pour the whiskey, vermouth and bitters into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Taxidermy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stolichnaya\xae vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash'), (u'3 - 4', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'oz')]
directions:
Fill glass with ice, pour one ounce of Vanilla Stoli. Top off all but 1/4" of the glass with Mountain Dew. Finish off with a hefty splash of Grenadine syrup and garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.,
The amount of grenadine has a large impact on this drink. It is best to not sip the drink, since it is lightly carbonated and will go flat. Do not shake or stir!

name: Tea Toddy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Earl Grey\xae tea', 'cup'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u"1 shot Bailey's\xae Irish cream", None), (u'1', u'Scotch whisky', 'dash')]
directions: Make tea as you usually do. Mix it with the sugar according to taste. Leave room in the cup for a dash of Baileys. Pour the baileys in according to taste, then, if you want, a dash of Whiskey if you want. Not too much though, as the drink won't taste good.

name: Tea Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 partscold tea', None), (u'2', u'apple juice', 'parts'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'part')]
directions: Combine and serve with ice.

name: Tavern Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Bacardi\xae Limon rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Ketel One\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bombay Sapphire\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'splash')]
directions: Add equal amounts of Bicardi Limon, Ketel One Vodka, Cointreau and Blue Sapphire Gin along with a double portion of sweet & sour mix.  Shake well and pour over ice in a highball glass.  Add a splash of Coke.  (should have the appearance of iced tea).

name: Tavastia Forest recipe
ingredients: [(u'2/3', u'sweet sherry', 'oz'), (u'2/3', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'5 - 6', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill the glass with ice cubes, pour sherry curacao into the glass. Pour orange juice to fill the glass and stir.

name: Tattooed Smurf recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Blue Tattoo\xae blueberry schnapps', 'oz'), (u'10', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour sprite over ice, add schnapps and stir.

name: Sauterne recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 bottleschilled Champagne', None), (None, u'1 bottle Chablis\xae white wine', None), (u'3', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Curacao orange liqueur', 'oz')]
directions:
Mix the cognac and curacao several hours ahead of time. When ready to serve, pour the necessary amount of this mixture over a block of ice or ice mold in a cold punch bowl, and add thoroughly chilled champagne. Stir and serve at once.,
*Do not let the mixture ladle back and forth over the ice, as this will eliminate the bubbles.

name: Saucy Sue Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'apple brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'apricot brandy', 'tsp'), (u'1/2', u'Pernod\xae licorice liqueur', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Saurian Brandy recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/4 cupgrated orange', None), (None, u'1 pint100 proof vodka', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'2/3', u'grade A maple syrup', 'cup')]
directions:
Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. ,
-- ,
Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. ,
-- ,
Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. ,
-- ,
Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

name: Savage Car Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Jameson\xae Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 pint root beer', None)]
directions: The root beer is poured in a beer mug and the shots are prepared in a shot glass, just like an Irish Car Bomb.  The shot can either be dropped in the root beer and taken like an Irish Car Bomb, or the shot can be poured in to mix with the root beer.

name: Sauternes House Punch recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 1/2 liters Sauternes white wine', None), (u'1', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Orange Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'maraschino liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4', u'sugar', 'oz')]

directions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into a pint glass. Add Bacardi Breezer and serve.

directions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

directions: Combine in sequence in shot glass, shoot.

name: Saskatchewan Paralyzer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1/2 ozpremium vodka', None), (u'2', u'cola', 'oz'), (None, u'3 oz2% milk', None), (None, u'1  maraschino cherry', None)]
directions:
Fill a chilled highball glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua and vodka. Pour in cola next. Very important otherwise the milk will curdle. Top with cold milk and a cherry for the ladies. Add a straw. The drink should be served unstirred. ,
You can just use 1-oz vodka if you don't have Kahlua. You can also substute the vodka with tequila.

name: Satan's Spawn recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Firewater\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'3 - 4', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dashes')]
directions: Add the Tabasco first, then the Firewater.

directions: Added ice and ingredients in a shaker. Shake well until top becomes frosted. Then poor in a shooter glass. This will be best yet smoothes shot you'll ever taste.

directions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wassail #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'apple cider', 'gal'), (None, u'8  cinnamon', None), (None, u'1 washed, sliced lemon', None), (None, u'1 washed, sliced orange', None), (u'1', u'cloves', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'allspice', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'white wine', 'gal'), (u'2', u'rum', 'cups')]
directions: Simmer the nonalcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours, then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).

name: Wassail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'apple juice', 'gal'), (None, u'2  oranges', None), (None, u'2  lemons', None), (None, u'1  lime', None), (u'1', u'cloves', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'allspice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'2  cinnamon', None), (u'1', u'water', 'qt'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup')]
directions:
1. Heat the water to boiling. Cut the lemons and oranges (and lime if using) in half and squeeze the juice into a separate bowl to save, throw the skins and pulp into the boiling water. Add spices and simmer for one hour. 
,
2. Remove the cinnamon sticks, a few cloves, allspice and save to one side. Using a slotted spoon or strainer remove the citrus peels and pulp and the remaining spices. Return the cinnamon sticks and saved spices to the water. Add the apple juice or cider and return to heat. 
,
3. When boiling remove from heat and add the citrus juice and sugar. Simmer very lightly for another 10 minutes and serve. Delicious!

name: Vesper recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u"Gordon's\xae gin", 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kina\xae Lillet Blanc wine', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well until ice cold, strain into a deep champagne goblet. Add a thin slice of lemon-peel.

name: Water from the River Ganges recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Stolichnaya\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Coca-Cola\xae', 'oz')]
directions: Add 1/4 slice lime to the bottom of a highball glass, along with 2 ice cubes. Pour the Stolichnaya vodka, orange juice and Coca-cola into the glass in that order, and serve.

name: Very Berry Tonic recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Absolut\xae Kurant vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Chambord\xae raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  tonic water', None)]
directions: Pour vodka and chambord into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water, garnish with two fresh raspberries, and serve.

name: Vernon's Grog recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'8', u'water', 'oz'), (None, u'1 tspdemera or muscovado sugar', None), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tbsp')]
directions:
Pour the rum into the container of your choice. A mug is suggested if a hot beverage is desired, but a glass works for a cool drink. Real Jamaican rum has the strong flavor that's desired for grog. Add sugar. Brown sugar can work as a substitute; white sugar is too flavorless to work well. Add a good tablespoon of lemon juice. Add cool or boiling water, depending on choice. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.,
For extra flavor, cinnamon, in the form of a stick or powder, can be added. One stick or a pinch of powdered cinnamon is sufficient.

name: Verno recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Harp\xae lager', 'parts'), (u'1', u'spiced rum', 'part')]
directions: Pour into a beer pilsner, and serve.
