directions: Empty half a can of cherry coke, pour the vodka into the can, then pour in the kool-aid. Alternatively, use a 12oz glass. Stir. A kabob stick works well in the can.

name: Warp Core Breach recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Jack Daniel's\xae Tennessee whiskey", 'oz')]
directions: Pour the goldschlager into a 1 1/2 ounce shot glass. Layer the tequila on top, followed by the jack daniels. Shoot.

name: Warm Woolly Sheep recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Scotch whisky', None), (None, u'1 1/2 shots Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', None), (None, u' fill with warm milk', None)]
directions: Mix scotch and drambuie, then top with warm milk.

name: Warm Witch's Blood recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'cranberry-apple juice', 'cups'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'cups'), (u'1', u'cloves', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  cinnamon', None), (None, u'3 - 4 berries, allspice', None), (u'1 - 2', u'sugar', 'tbsp')]
directions: Bring to a boil in a saucepan and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring and muttering appropriate incantations. Serve in ghoulish glasses, garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Warm and Fuzzy recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'cherry brandy', 'oz')]
directions: Pour southern comfort, triple sec, and then cherry brandy into a shot glass.

name: Warm Apple Pie recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'DeKuyper\xae Sour Apple Pucker schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Goldschlager\xae cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'whipped cream', 'oz')]
directions: Carefully layer the liquors on top of one another in a shot glass. Top with a dollop of whipped cream, and serve.

name: Ward Eight recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'blended whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'powdered sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 slice orange', None), (None, u'1  cherry', None), (None, u' juice of 1/2 lemons', None)]
directions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: War Cloud recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Shake, strain into a cordial or liqueur glass, and serve.

name: Verdi recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/4', u'Pecher Mignon\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'benedictine herbal liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bols\xae Blue Curacao liqueur', 'tsp')]
directions: Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach and a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Venus Rum recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'soda water', 'oz')]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except soda water) and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add soda, add straws, garnish with a slice of starfruit, and serve.

name: Venus on the Rocks recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'3', u'club soda', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass with five ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Verboten recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Forbidden Fruit\xae liqueur', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1  cherry', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Venom recipe
ingredients: [(u'2 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cocoa powder', 'tbsp'), (u'2', u'sugar', 'tbsp')]
directions: Pour gin into a malt shaker or similar. Stir in the cocoa and sugar, mix together and shake. Pour into a champagne flute glass, and serve.

name: Venezia recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'gin', 'parts'), (u'3', u'peach liqueur', 'parts'), (u'3', u'dry vermouth', 'parts'), (None, u'1 drop Blue Curacao liqueur', None)]
directions: Mix, and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest, and serve.

name: Vendome recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Dubonnet\xae Rouge vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dry vermouth', 'oz')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Velvetized(TM) Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'3-4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'0.5-1', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (None, u'2-3  orange bitters', None)]
directions: Add the gin, vermouth and Orange Bitters to a shaker of ice.  Stir (or shake). Pour into a stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Velvet Tongue recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Canadian Club\xae whisky', 'oz'), (None, u'  ginger ale', None)]
directions: Pour southern comfort and canadian club whisky over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Velvet Revolver recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Aftershock\xae Hot & Cool cinnamon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz')]
directions: Preferably poured into a 'twister' shot glass(available from any cheapo booze outlet!), pour the red Aftershock into one side, and the Baileys into the other. Then down in one go,feeling the warmth of the red aftershock and also the cooling flavour of the Baileys.

name: Velvet Presley recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'3 fingers bourbon whiskey', None), (None, u'  chocolate milk', None)]
directions: Pour bourbon over ice, add chocolate milk until creamy, and serve.

name: Velvet Picaso recipe
ingredients: [(None, u"3 ml Stone's\xae ginger wine", None), (None, u'30 ml Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'30-50 ml dry ginger ale', None), (None, u' crushed or frapped ice', None), (None, u' garnish with slice of oranges', None), (None, u' and mint', None)]
directions:
Pour liqueures  over crushed ice into chosen glasswear.,
Add dry ginger ale pouring slowly as to not agitate fizzy head.,
Garnish as prefered.,
EASY AS!,
or try it frapped:,
pour dry ginger ale into glass.,
frappe ice and both liqueurs together.,
pour slowly into glass.,
garnish.

name: Velvet Moose recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'strawberry daiquiri mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'ice', 'cup')]
directions: Pour everything into the blender and blend to desired consistency. Scale everything up by the number of cups your blender holds to do a full batch.  If you plan to make "doubles" I recommend increasing the amount of Daiquiri mix by the same factor to maintain the balance of flavour.

name: Velvet Hammer #4 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 bottles Champagne', None), (None, u'1 liter Sprite\xae soda', None), (None, u'1 liter Sprite\xae Zero soda', None), (None, u'1 fifth vodka', None), (None, u'  gummi bears', None), (None, u' Red Vines candies', None)]
directions: Combine all liquids and mix. Pour into cup and add gummi bears, drink using red vines as a straw. A secret ingredient is usually added to make each batch unique. Use your imagination! (amaretto, lemonade, and rum all make good secret ingredients).

name: Velvet Kilt recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1', u'butterscotch schnapps', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients with ice until chilled, and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or small butterscotch candy.

name: Tarheel shot recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Godiva\xae white chocolate liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients over ice, strain into a shooter glass.  Add blue curacao slowly until the appropriate color is reached. You may need to add a little, shake, pour some to see the color, and then add more.  A small amount of cream can be added if the shot is too blue.

name: Tap That Ass recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Hennessy\xae cognac', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Alize\xae Red Passion liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Alize\xae Gold Passion liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'splash'), (None, u' top with soda water', None)]
directions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice. Pour the Hennessy, Red Alize, and Yellow Alize. Splash in some Cranberry Juice and top it off with soda. For garnish you can add a slice of pineapple and cherries.

name: Tanyahtoo recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Frangelico\xae hazelnut liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream', 'oz'), (None, u'  milk', None)]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

name: Tanzanian Tonic recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'cup'), (u'1', u'apricot nectar', 'cup'), (u'1', u'peach nectar', 'cup'), (u'2', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'oz'), (u'6', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'dark rum', 'dash')]
directions: Combine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour over ice in 4oz glasses, and add a dash of dark rum to each. Garnish with halves orange slices and stemmed maraschino cherries.

name: Tanqueray and Tonic recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Tanqueray\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'3', u'tonic water', 'oz'), (u'0.25', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Tanqueray London Dry, lime juice and tonic water.

name: Tanquergay recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Tanqueray\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'8', u'apple juice', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Put two shots of Tanqueray Gin in a glass. Add apple juice and then Sprite. Mix together. Serve and enjoy. Guaranteed to get you very drunk, very quickly. Seriously, I'm wasted.

name: Tanqueray & Chronic recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Tanqueray\xae gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'2 squeezed lime', None), (u'1.5', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions:
Mix ingredients 1-5 in a shaker with ice (drop the limes in the shaker, the oils add more flavor),
Pour over ice in a chilled highball (the colder the drink, the better),
Top with 1 1/2 oz of 7-up

name: Tannersworth recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Dubonnet\xae Rouge vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Dubonnet, gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tanker recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Grey Goose\xae vodka', 'oz'), (None, u'12 ozcan Keystone\xae Light lager', None)]
directions: Pour a full can of Keystone Light into a beer mug. Add Grey Goose vodka (or any vodka that you might have), and serve.

name: Tango Martini Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Bacardi\xae orange rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'raspberry liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'splash'), (None, u'1  orange', None)]
directions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Squeeze orange juice into the bottom of the glass, and garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Tango Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'dry vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'tsp'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'tbsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: USS Enterprise recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Captain Morgan\xae Silver spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Johnnie Walker\xae Scotch whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Smirnoff\xae vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the Kirk (Captain Morgan) into shot glass. Add Scotty (Scotch) followed by Chekov (Vodka), and serve.

name: Santa Fe recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'tequila', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with 7-Up\xae soda', None), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (None, u'1  lime', None)]
directions: In a highball glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Santa Cruz Fix recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Santa Cruz\xae rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cherry brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'sugar syrup', 'oz')]
directions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with in-season fruit, add short straws and a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: USD Sunset recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'part'), (u'5', u'Mountain Dew\xae citrus soda', 'parts'), (u'2', u'grenadine syrup', 'dashes')]
directions: This drink can be made with ice, but it looks a lot better without it. I recommend just using chilled soda. Add rum first, then soda, then a few dashes of grenadine. Don't stir.

name: Sanoran Desert Sunset recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot Bacardi\xae dark rum', None), (None, u'8 ozSunny Delight orange juice', None), (u'1', u'Dr. Pepper\xae soda', 'splash'), (None, u'8  ice', None)]
directions: Add ice to glass. Pour in shot of Rum. Add Sunny Delight and Splash of Dr. Pepper. Stir.

name: Sangria Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(u'8', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'12', u'margarita mix', 'oz'), (u'2', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz'), (u'3', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3 - 5', u'sangria', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the tequila, margarita mix, lime juice and triple sec into an average sized blender filled with crushed ice, and blend well. Dip rim of a 16-oz. margarita glass in the blender to wet, and apply salt if desired. Pour the blender mixture into the glass until 2/3 full, add the sangria, and serve.

name: Sangrita recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Especial gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'clamato juice', 'oz'), (None, u'3 - 5 drops Tabasco\xae sauce', None), (u'1', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dash')]
directions: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!

name: Sangria Liqueur - The World's Best recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 1/2 liters Cabernet Sauvignon red wine', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (u'3 - 4', u'brandy', 'oz'), (None, u'1 large sliced lemon', None), (None, u'1 large sliced orange', None), (None, u'1 large sectioned apple', None)]
directions:
1. Mix ingredients together in a large container, stir, and let sit in a refrigerator for 18-24 hours. ,
Note: A much more delightful sangria is produced when the fruit juice blends with the wine by osmmosis rather than by stirring.,
2. Before serving, stir again, and add sugar or brandy to taste. It should be fairly strong and fairly sweet, almost syrupy. Then, cut the mixture with some sort of bubbly water, orange or lemon flavored if possibly, but plain bubbly water is fine, until it seems to have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve immediately.

name: Sangria Liqueur Classic recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1  orange', None), (None, u'1  lemon', None), (None, u'1 bottle dry white wine', None), (u'2', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (u'1', u'brandy', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'ice cubes', 'cups'), (u'1', u'club soda', 'cup')]
directions: Cut orance and half (1/2 into thin slices), and juice the other half of the orange. Cut the lemon into thin slices and combine with orange juice, wine, sugar, brandy and contreau. Chill. To serve, add ice and club soda, stir gently.

name: Sangria Liqueur - Sweet recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 bottles red wine', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'cup'), (None, u'2 cans Fresca\xae grapefruit soda', None), (None, u' several apples', None), (None, u' several oranges', None), (None, u' several limes', None), (None, u' several lemons', None)]
directions:
Melt the sugar in a couple of cups of hot water. I do this so I don't end up with a lot of undissolved sugar in the end. Cut apples into small chunks (1" or so)the apples absorb the wine the most, so I tend to use a lot of apples. ,
Peel the citrus fruits (lemons and limes are difficult to peel) and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar, fruit, and Fresca and put in the fridge for a few hours. ,
I tend to take out the lemons and limes before serving because they get slimy and no one wants to munch on them anyway. Serve in an iced tea glass with a straw and one of those cocktail swords so your guests can get at the fruit without getting their fingers sticky.

name: Sangria Liqueur #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'4 - 5', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (None, u'2  oranges', None), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'cup'), (None, u'3  apples', None), (None, u'1 bottle red wine', None), (u'2', u'cognac', 'tbsp'), (u'1/2', u'mandarin', 'cup'), (u'2', u'soda water', 'cups'), (None, u'10  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Peel the apples and cut into small cubes. Peel the oranges, take out the pips and cut them into small cubes. Warm the orange juice, the sugar and the mandarin peels until the sugar dissolves. Mix all the ingredients - except the ice and the soda. The ice and the soda add just before serving.

name: Walker's Revenge recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with iced tea', None)]
directions: Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.

name: Walk the Plank #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Captain Morgan\xae spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Captain Morgan\xae Parrot Bay coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'splash')]
directions:
Mix Equal parts Captain Morgan's, Blue Curacao, and Parrot Bay with a splash of Pineapple Juice in a shaker with ice.,
Shake to mix. Pour into shot glass.,
ENJOY!,
This drink could probably also be served as a drink.  However, due to it's sweet nature it was intended to be a shot.

name: Walk the Plank recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Captain Morgan\xae Original spiced rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'RedRum\xae rum', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with 7-Up\xae soda', None), (None, u'2  cherries', None)]
directions: Pour rum over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Walk Me Down (Sweet Jesus) recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'4 - 6', u'Sprite\xae soda', 'oz')]
directions: Shake ingredients (except Sprite) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and stir. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice, and serve.

name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2  egg', None), (u'1/4', u'cream', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sugar syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'  nutmeg', None), (u'3/4', u'tawny port', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'3 1/2', u'milk', 'oz')]
directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Walk in the Park recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'10 ml Drambuie\xae Scotch whisky', None), (None, u'10 ml benedictine herbal liqueur', None), (None, u'10 ml Green Chartreuse\xae', None)]
directions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. For a bigger shot than 30mls just use 1/3 of each ingredient. Shot into your mouth and gargle for 10 seconds or so before swallowing!

name: Waking to the Call of the Mockingbird recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet vermouth', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'tawny port', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'superfine sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  egg', None)]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Wakey Wakey recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'sambuca', 'oz'), (u'4/5', u'espresso', 'oz'), (u'1/5', u'cream', 'oz')]
directions: Use a 50ml sherry glass. Sambuca first, then layer with espresso and finish off with a top layer of cream.

name: Wakenda Water recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'7-Up\xae soda', 'gallon'), (u'1/4', u'lemonade', 'gallon'), (u'1/4', u'vodka', 'gallon')]
directions: Take all of the above ingredients and mix them all in a one gallon jug. After you have mixed them all together, put the lid on the jug and shake it up. Then pour into your favorite cup or mug. Best served when cold or on ice. If you use the ingredients listed above, you'll probably taste the 7-up more but, if you substitute 1/2 gallon of lemonade instead of 1/2 gallon of 7-up, you'll probably taste the lemonade more. It just depends on which one you like more. Your serving size will vary depending upon how much you want to drink.

name: Wake up Call recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'strawberry vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'mango rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Hpnotiq\xae liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Everclear\xae alcohol', 'oz'), (None, u'  energy soda', None), (None, u'  lemonade', None), (None, u'  grenadine syrup', None)]
directions: Chill everything first. Grab a BIG cup if possible. Or if yur a pro, grap a smaller one.  Pour Liquors in cup.  Pour in lemonade, but leave room for the Energy drink! Now pour in energy drink. Splash with a little grenadine and enjoy!!!

name: Waikiki Beach recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'white rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'coconut cream', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'whipping cream', 'oz'), (u'1', u'passion-fruit juice', 'oz')]
directions: Rim a wine goblet with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'tbsp')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wahoo recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot 151 proof rum', None), (None, u'1 shot amaretto almond liqueur', None), (None, u'  pineapple juice', None)]
directions: Pour 151 proof rum and amaretto over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top off with pineapple juice (to taste), and serve.

name: Waborita recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (None, u'  ice', None)]
directions: In a shaker over ice combine the ingredients, pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Waffles and Syrup recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2/3  Captain Morgan\xae spiced rum', None), (None, u'1/3  butterscotch liqueur', None)]
directions:
This shot is so simple but it tastes just like waffles and syrup!  ,
The shot consists of 2/3 Captain Morgan Rum and 1/3 butterscotch liqueur...just make sure its chilled!!

name: Velvet Hammer #3 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 pint Guinness\xae stout', None), (u'1', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Pour a regular Guinness into a beer pilsner. Wait for head to settle, then add vodka, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'creme de cacao', 'tbsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'cream', 'tbsp'), (None, u'1/2  banana', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Pour creme de cacao, vodka and cream into a blender. Add ice, half a sliced banana, and sugar to taste. Blend until smooth and pureed, and pour into a glass. Serve.

name: Velvet Hammer recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'creme de cacao', 'tbsp'), (u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cream', 'tbsp')]
directions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'half-and-half', 'oz')]
directions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vegas Lemon Drop Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae Citron vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tsp'), (None, u'1/4  lemon', None)]
directions: Slice the 1/4 lemon into two seperate wedges. Place in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour the Absolut Citron into the shaker, and add one teaspoon of sugar. Shake vigorously. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Velvet Crush recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'gin', 'oz'), (None, u'  Kool-Aid\xae', None)]
directions: Pour gin into a glass with ice. Add flavored kool aid (to taste), and serve.

name: Vegas Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Crown Royal\xae Canadian whisky', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae butterscotch liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  Red Bull\xae energy drink', None)]
directions: Pour 1/2 oz of Crown Royal and 1/2 oz DeKuyper Butterscotch Schnapps in a shot glass. Take a glass of Red Bull and fill the glass half full or as much needed to cover the shot glass. Put the shot glass of Crown and Butterscotch in the glass of Red Bull and bottoms up!

name: Vaultovee recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'UV\xae Green Apple vodka', 'oz'), (u'5', u'Vault\xae energy drink', 'oz')]
directions: Stir over ice.

name: Vaughn Purple Haze recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'DeKuyper\xae Razzmatazz liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'  cranberry juice', None)]
directions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and add razzmatazz. Fill with cranberry juice, mix, and serve.

name: Varadero Sunrise recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'100 ml orange juice', None), (None, u'20 ml grenadine syrup', None), (None, u'30 ml white rum', None), (None, u'5 ml Blue Curacao liqueur', None)]
directions: Pour orange juice into a highball glass. Add grenadine carefully so that it will stay at the bottom. Carefully add some ice cubes. Seperately combine and mix the rum and blue curacao, and layer the mixture into the highball glass so that it floats or remains on top. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Vanilla-Banana Smoothie recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'2 chunked bananas', None), (None, u'1 cupvanilla ice cream', None), (u'1/2', u'vanilla extract', 'tsp'), (None, u'1/2 cupfresh orange juice', None), (u'1', u'milk', 'cup')]
directions: Place banana and vanilla ice cream into a blender. Pour in vanilla extract, orange juice, and milk. Puree until thick and smooth.

name: Vanilla Vargas recipe

directions: Pour liquors, in order, into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Top with pepsi, stir well with a barspoon, and serve.

name: Vanilla Creamsicle recipe

directions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add cold milk, stir, and serve immediately.

name: Vanilla Coke recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'vanilla liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 can Coca-Cola\xae', None)]
directions: Pour southern comfort and vanilla liqueur over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke, and serve.

name: Vanilla Coke Syrup recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 1/2 cupsgranulated sugar', None), (u'1 1/2', u'water', 'cups'), (u'1/2', u'salt', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'vanilla extract', 'tbsp')]
directions:
Mix sugar, water and salt in a small saucepan. Heat to boil, then boil gently for 5 minutes.,
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Use one shot per can of coke over ice for vanilla coke.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a salted rim. Serve.

name: Tangerine Dream recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'50 ml Mandarine Napoleon\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'25 ml Tia Maria\xae coffee liqueur', None), (None, u'50 mlfresh cream', None), (None, u'5  ice cubes', None)]
directions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

directions: Pour sweet and sour, Red Bull and OJ in a pint glass.  In a shot glass pour your favorite orange vodka.  Drop the vodka bomb into the pint glass and chug-a-lug.

name: Tan Nipple recipe

directions: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

name: Tampon String recipe

directions: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

directions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with a lot of ice. Shake until shaker is frozen, and strain into martini glass. You can add a rim of chili powder mixed with sugar if desired.

name: Talos Coffee recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'parts'), (u'1', u'coffee', 'part')]
directions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

name: Tall Blonde recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Southern Comfort\xae peach liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'peach schnapps', 'oz'), (u'3', u'orange juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake well fill into chilled martini glass.

name: Talon recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 3/4', u'gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'Grand Marnier\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'3/4 ozfresh lemon juice', None), (None, u'1/4 ozfresh lime juice', None), (None, u'3/4 - 1 ozpremium Champagne', None)]
directions:
Set a chilled Martini Glass down and rub a fresh lime wedge around the rim. ,
Fill a regular-sized cocktail shaker with a generous scoop of ice and pour in the tequila.  Leave it for 60 seconds; whilst this is happening, rim 1/2-3/4 of the chilled glass with sugar, taking care to tap off any excess.,
Return to the shaker and add the Cointreau and Grand Marnier and stir vigourously, making sure they are combined.  Now add the fresh juice, top the shaker and shake vigourously until the shaker itself starts to frost.,
Strain the mixture into the glass, top off with the chilled champagne; finish by placing a small lime wedge into the drink, although this is optional.

name: Talbot's Dream recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Godiva\xae white chocolate liqueur', 'parts'), (u'2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'parts')]
directions: Add godiva and bailey's to a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well, pour into champagne saucer(s), and serve.

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Take Me Home recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1', u'white tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lemon juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake everything with ice, pour into glass.

ingredients: [(None, u'1/2 shot Aftershock\xae Hot & Cool cinnamon schnapps', None), (None, u'1/2 shot chocolate liqueur', None)]
directions: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

directions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve. (An olive may be substituted for the cherry, if preferred.)

directions:
Fill a shaker with ice, and pour all of the ingredients into the shaker, cover and shake for 5 to 10 seconds. Serve by straining into a Shot Glass.,
Careful these can sneak up on you.

name: Urine Sample recipe

directions: Just pour it in.

directions: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Urban Violence recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Tropicana\xae orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 shot Malibu\xae coconut rum', None), (None, u'1 shot vodka', None), (None, u'3/4 shot Blue Curacao liqueur', None)]
directions:
Use strawberry, orange or banana tropicana.,
Put some ice in your favorite glass. Add liquor. Fill up remainder with the tropicana, stir, and serve.

name: Urban Bourbon recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Jim Beam\xae bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'4', u'Dr. Pepper\xae soda', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice lime', None)]
directions: Pour desired amount of Jim Beam (usually 2-3 shots). Add Dr. Pepper to desired level. Squeeze and then drop slice of lime in drink.

name: Upstate Manhattan recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'bourbon whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'apricot brandy', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'vermouth', 'oz'), (None, u'1 dashAngostura bitter', None), (None, u'  orange', None)]
directions:
Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice and add - in order - the bitters, bourbon/whiskey, vermouth and brandy. This should only require a little stir to mix the ingredients enough. Twist the orange peel over the drink and drop in: voilá!,
Note: As with all bourbon or whiskey drinks, DO NOT use SoCo; it is not at all related to bourbon or whiskey and makes this and any other drink taste COMPLETELY different.

name: Upsidedown Pineapple Cake recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Stolichnaya\xae vanilla vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1 tspfloat grenadine syrup', None)]
directions: Pour 1 oz stoli vanilla vodka in old fashioned glass. Fill with pineapple juice, then spoon float grenadine to the bottom of the drink till it settles almost like a tequila sunrise.

name: Upside-Down Martini recipe

directions: Mix together, stir and serve in a highball glass.

name: Upper Cut recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'4 cl Irish whiskey', None), (None, u'4 cl espresso', None), (None, u'4 cl coffee', None), (u'4', u'brown sugar', 'tsp')]
directions: Just like an irish coffey. Wait till it has cooled a bit. Drink all in one move.

name: Up the IRA! recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Jameson\xae Irish whiskey', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Celtic Crossing\xae honey liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Smucker's\xae caramel syrup", 'tsp'), (u't', u'cream', 'tbsp')]
directions:
Using a shaker can, pour in:,
Kahlua 1.5oz,
Celtic Crossing 1oz,
Jameson's Gold Label Irish Whiskey 1.5oz,
Smucker's Caramel Syrup 1t,
Cream 1T,
Shake well, and pour over ice into a highball glass. This drink packs a serious punch, just like the Bold IRA! One other thing. Chicks dig it!

directions: Pour Red Bull into a Collins Glass. Pour a shot of Jí¤germeister into a shot glass. When ready to drink, drop the shot into the collins glass and drink.

directions: Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted, use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.

directions: Mix all together and put in the refrigerator till cold. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste.

directions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

name: San Salvador recipe

directions: Pour vanilla vodka into a cocktail glass. Top with coke or diet coke, add ice cubes if desired, and serve.

directions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add a twist of lemon, and serve.

directions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Van Nuys (aka Dirty Margarita) recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]

name: Vampiro #2 recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'Milagro\xae blanco tequila', 'oz'), (u'3', u'Spicy Hot V8 Juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'celery salt', 'dashes'), (u'2', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'dashes'), (u'2', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'dashes'), (u'3', u'club soda', 'oz')]
directions: Combine the first 6 ingredients and shake; stir in club soda and serve in a glass with a salted rim.

name: Vampiro recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'  tequila', None), (None, u'  limes', None), (None, u'  salt', None), (None, u'  Squirt\xae citrus soda', None), (None, u'  Viuda de Sanchez', None)]
directions:
You can play with the proportion to your taste, but these are the portions I use for me.,
In a tall Glass, first rim the Glass with Kosher Salt, add about half or more Ice, a shot or two of Good quality Tequila, squeeze a Lime add a pinch of Kosher Salt if you like now, add Squirt till about four fifths of the glass full and now depending on how spicy you want it add Viuda de Sanchez stir it and Enjoy!!!,
If you can't find Viuda de Sanchez, I've substituted it with a good quality Orange juice, a lime, and Pico de Gallo seasoning a good brand is Via nueva, but is won't make your drink red like Viuda de Sanchez mix will and that’s why the drink is call Vampiro (In English it translates to Vampire) because its looks red.

directions: Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake. Serve in salted (optional) margarita glasses.

name: Ultimate Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (None, u' juice of 1/4 limes', None)]
directions: Pour tequila, cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

name: Ultimate June Bug recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'banana liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Blend all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Ultimate Chocolate Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'Godiva\xae chocolate liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Godiva\xae white chocolate liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Stoli\xae Vanil vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Bailey's\xae Irish cream", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Kahlua\xae coffee liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously.  Strain into a martini glass and serve.  To enhance appearance, drizzle chocolate syrup into glass before pouring martini.  Note: do not substitute creme de cocoa or any other chocolate flavored liquor for the Godiva liquors, as they are the key to the drink and well-worth the added expense.  After this chocolate martini, cheap imitations made with creme de cocoa are unacceptable.

name: Ultimate Bloody Mary recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'Absolut\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'7', u'V8\xae vegetable juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Worcestershire sauce', 'tsp'), (None, u'1  lemon', None), (u'1/4', u'Tabasco\xae sauce', 'tsp'), (u'1/8', u'salt', 'tsp'), (u'1/8', u'black peppers', 'tsp'), (None, u'  olives', None), (None, u'  banana pepper', None), (None, u'  celery', None), (None, u' pickled okra', None), (u'1/8', u"Tony Chachere's\xae Creole Seasoning", 'tsp')]
directions: Pour vodka, V-8, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, black pepper, and squeeze lemon wedge into glass; shake.  Serve over rocks.  Garnish with 4 - 5 olives on a toothpick, 1 banana pepper, 1 pod pickled okra, 1 celery stalk, and sprinkle with approx. 1/8 tsp Tony's.

name: Ultimate Mai Tai recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Malibu\xae coconut rum', 'oz'), (u'0.5', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1.5', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1.5', u'guava juice', 'oz'), (None, u'1.5 ozno pulp orange juice', None), (u'', u'syrup', 'dash'), (u'', u'orgeat syrup', 'dash')]
directions: Prepare your highball or other type glass by loading it half full of ice (at least 1/2 a cup). Crushed is best since it chills the drink quickly and lightens the taste. Build the ingredients with the alcohol first (except the dark rum) and then the juice and syrups. Stir all the ingredients with a straw (except dark rum). Slowly pour the dark rum on the surface in order to float it on the rest of the drink. As you consume the drink with a straw, the dark rum trickles down and gives a cool appearance.

name: Ugly Virgin recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'mandarin juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lemonade', 'oz')]
directions: Shake juices and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade, garnish with a slice of Ugli fruit, add straws and serve.

name: Ugly Buddy recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Smirnoff\xae vodka', 'oz'), (u'1', u'blackberry brandy', 'oz'), (None, u'  orange juice', None), (None, u'1  orange', None), (None, u'1  maraschino cherry', None)]
directions: Fill cocktail shaker with orange juice, brandy and vodka and crushed ice.  Now shake it, pour into a cocktail glass,  garnish with orange slice twist and cherry. Now drink it.

name: Ultimate Blue Frozen Margarita recipe
ingredients: [(u'3', u'tequila', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Blue Curacao liqueur', 'oz'), (u'2', u'lime juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'ice', 'cup')]
directions: Pour ingredient into a blender, over the ice, in order listed. Blend on "high" for a few seconds until drink has a consistancy a bit icier than a slurpee. Take lime wedge and run it over the edges of the margarita glass, then, upturned, place the wetted rims into course salt. Pour the now ready margarita into the now salted glasses and serve.

name: Ulanda Cocktail recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'anis liqueur', 'tsp'), (u'3/4', u'triple sec', 'oz')]
directions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ugly recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'tomato juice', 'oz'), (u'6', u'beer', 'oz')]
directions: Fill beer glass 3/4 full of beer, slowly pour tomato juice down the side so it settles on the bottom. Shake salt in the palm of your hand. Throw salt into the glass and wait until the top foams up. Chug the drink and then scream "UGLY"!

name: Ugandan Ginger Tea recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'milk', 'cup'), (None, u'1/2 - 1 tsploose black tea', None), (u'1', u'sugar', 'tbsp'), (None, u'  ginger', None)]
directions: Set the milk, tea and sugar to boil. Wash a thumb-sized piece of fresh ginger. Pound until flat, where juice should begin to ooze. Add the ginger to the milk-tea mixture when it begins to boil. Reduce the heat, letting it all simmer for 2-3 minutes.

name: Salty Balls recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with grapefruit juice', None), (u'1', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 pinch salt', None)]
directions: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice, pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice, and float midori melon liqueur on top.

name: UFO recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1/3 glass genever gin', None), (None, u'2/3 glass bitter lemon soda', None)]
directions: Pour genever gin into a glass, and fill with bitter lemon. Add ice cubes, and serve.

name: Salt and Pepper Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/8', u'vermouth', 'oz'), (u'2', u'Absolut\xae Peppar vodka', 'oz')]
directions: Combine vermouth and absolut peppar in a mixing glass over ice. Stir, strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Salt-and-Pepper Highball recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (None, u'3/4 ozfresh lemon juice', None), (u'1', u'simple syrup', 'oz'), (None, u'3 ozfresh grapefruit juice', None), (u'3', u'Angostura\xae bitters', 'dashes')]
directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rimmed, ice-filled highball glass.

name: Sally Fudpucker recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Jose Cuervo\xae Especial gold tequila', 'oz'), (u'4', u'pink grapefruit juice', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Galliano\xae herbal liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Pour the tequila and pink grapefuit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the galliano on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Salt Lick recipe
ingredients: [(u'1 1/4', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'2', u'bitter lemon soda', 'oz'), (u'2', u'grapefruit juice', 'oz')]
directions: Pour ingredients into a white wine glass filled with ice cubes and rimmed with salt. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Salisbury Special recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'150 ml Coca-Cola\xae', None), (None, u'150 ml orange juice', None), (None, u'30 ml raspberry cordial', None), (None, u'1 shot Stolichnaya\xae vodka', None)]
directions: Pour coke into an old-fashioned glass, then orange juice, then vodka. Stir it about a bit, then add cordial. Enjoy.

name: Sakura Sake Blue recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'Sho Chiku Bai Sake', 'oz'), (u'1', u'Bacardi\xae white rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae blue raspberry mixer", 'oz'), (u'1/2', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'oz')]
directions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake hard. Pour into shot glass.   Makes roughly 4 shots.

name: Salem Witch recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'raspberry schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'lime juice', 'splash'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash'), (None, u' fill with 2/3 sweet and sour mix', None), (None, u' fill with soda water', None)]
directions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

name: Saki Surprise recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 bottle sake rice wine', None), (None, u'1 L root beer', None), (None, u'1  ice', None)]
directions: Mix Cold Saki, Liter of A&W Rootbeer, and Bucket of Ice in a bucket.  Pour into a glass of your choice.

name: Saketini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2 1/2', u'gin', 'oz'), (u'1 1/2', u'sake rice wine', 'tsp'), (None, u'1 cocktail olive', None)]
directions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

name: Sake Tsunami recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'sake rice wine', 'oz'), (u'1', u'vodka', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'watermelon schnapps', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (None, u' fill with orange juice', None)]
directions: Shaken and served straight up.

name: Sake O Martini recipe
ingredients: [(u'2', u'Bacardi\xae orange rum', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'sake rice wine', 'oz'), (u'1/4', u'cranberry juice', 'oz')]
directions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Sake Bomb recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 shot sake rice wine', None), (None, u'1 glass beer', None)]
directions: It's real easy. Drop the shot of Sake into a glass of beer and the just slam it.

name: Sake Bomb #2 recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'1 pint beer', None), (None, u'1 ozhot sake rice wine', None)]
directions: Pour beer into a beer mug, then put chopsticks over the top of the mug. Balance the shot of sake on the chopsticks over the beer. When everyone is ready, hit the table which separates the chopsticks and drops the shot into the beer. Then chug.

name: Safari Juice recipe
ingredients: [(None, u'30 ml Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', None), (None, u'30 ml Midori\xae melon liqueur', None), (None, u'140 ml orange juice', None), (None, u'6 drops grenadine syrup', None)]
directions: Pour cointreau and midori melon liqueur into a mixing glass and add orange juice. Stir rapidly, three to four times, and pour into a cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time. Garnish with tropical fruits, and serve.

name: Sacrilicious recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/3', u'Bacardi\xae Limon rum', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'Midori\xae melon liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1/3', u'lime juice', 'oz')]
directions: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

name: Saint Thomas Smile recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'sweet and sour mix', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'amaretto almond liqueur', 'oz'), (u'1', u'triple sec', 'oz'), (u'6 - 8', u'pineapple juice', 'oz')]
directions: Add 1 shot of everything, except the Amaretto (1/2 a shot) and the Pineapple Juice.  Put everything in first before the pineapple juice and then fill the rest of a regular glass or those red party cups with pineapple juice.  You can always add a little bit of ice too!

name: Sacrifice recipe
ingredients: [(u'1', u'dark rum', 'oz'), (u'1', u'light rum', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'white creme de cacao', 'oz'), (u'1', u'coconut cream', 'tsp'), (u'2', u'pineapple juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'orange juice', 'oz'), (u'2', u'orange bitters', 'dashes'), (u'1', u'crushed ice', 'cup')]
directions: Pour the rums, creme de cacao, coconut cream, juices and bitters into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Sabra recipe
ingredients: [(u'3/4', u'Absolut\xae Mandrin vodka', 'oz'), (u'3/4', u'Godiva\xae chocolate liqueur', 'oz')]
directions: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: SA Red Draw recipe
ingredients: [(u'12', u'Budweiser\xae lager', 'oz'), (None, u"2 ozCampbell's tomato juice", None), (None, u'2 Spanish Queen olives', None), (None, u'1  lime', None), (u'1', u'salt', 'dash')]
directions: Pour tomato juice into frosted beer mug. Pour in Budweiser. Drop in 2 olives. Squeeze lime wedge into glass and drop in wedge. Dash of salt. Stir and serve.

name: S.O.B. recipe
ingredients: [(u'1/2', u'cognac', 'oz'), (u'1/2', u'Cointreau\xae orange liqueur', 'oz'), (None, u'1 slice lemon', None), (None, u'  sugar', None)]
directions: Drink this just like a shot of tequila. Mix the cognac and cointreau together in the shot glass. Lick between your thumb and forefinger and sprinkle sugar on it. Then lick the sugar, drink the shot, and suck on the lemon wedge when you're done.

name: S2C3 recipe
ingredients: [(u'4', u'Absolut\xae Mandrin vodka', 'oz'), (u'7', u'ginger ale', 'oz'), (u'3', u'cranberry juice', 'oz'), (u'1', u'grenadine syrup', 'splash'), (u'1', u"Rose's\xae lime juice", 'splash')]
directions: Pour into tall glass and serve.
